name: ClassesOfEntitysOwnEquityInstrumentsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Classes of financial assets [axis]
name: ClassesOfFinancialAssetsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Classes of financial instruments [axis]
name: ClassesOfFinancialInstrumentsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Classes of financial liabilities [axis]
name: ClassesOfFinancialLiabilitiesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

name: ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsAndGoodwillAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Classes of intangible assets other than goodwill [axis]
name: ClassesOfIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

name: ClassesOfLiabilitiesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

name: ClassesOfOrdinarySharesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Classes of other provisions [abstract]
name: ClassesOfOtherProvisionsAbstract

label: Classes of other provisions [axis]
name: ClassesOfProvisionsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

name: ClassesOfPlanAssetsFairValueMonetaryAmountsAbstract

label: Classes of plan assets, fair value percentage amounts [abstract]
name: ClassesOfPlanAssetsFairValuePercentageAmountsAbstract

label: Classes of property, plant and equipment [axis]
name: ClassesOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Classes of regulatory deferral account balances [axis]
name: ClassesOfRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Classes of regulatory deferral account balances [member]
name: ClassesOfRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesMember
documentation: This member stands for all classes (ie types of cost or income) of regulatory deferral account balances. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of regulatory deferral account balances' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]]

label: Classes of share capital [axis]
name: ClassesOfShareCapitalAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Classification of Liabilities as Current or Non-current [member]
name: ClassificationOfLiabilitiesAsCurrentOrNoncurrentMember
documentation: This member stands for Classification of Liabilities as Current or Non-current (Amendments to IAS 1) issued in January 2020 and later amended in July 2020.

label: Classification of assets as held for sale [member]
name: ClassificationOfAssetsAsHeldForSaleMember
documentation: This member stands for classification of assets as held for sale. [Refer: Non-current assets held for sale [member]]

label: Closing foreign exchange rate
name: ClosingForeignExchangeRate
documentation: The spot exchange rate at the end of the reporting period. Exchange rate is the ratio of exchange for two currencies. Spot exchange rate is the exchange rate for immediate delivery.

label: Collateral held permitted to be sold or repledged in absence of default by owner of collateral, at fair value
name: AssetsHeldAsCollateralPermittedToBeSoldOrRepledgedAtFairValue
documentation: The fair value of collateral held that is permitted to be sold or repledged in the absence of default by the owner of the collateral. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Collateral sold or repledged in absence of default by owner of collateral, at fair value
name: AssetsSoldOrRepledgedAsCollateralAtFairValue
documentation: The fair value of collateral sold or repledged that was permitted to be sold or repledged in the absence of default by the owner of the collateral. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Commencement of major litigation [member]
name: CommencementOfMajorLitigationMember
documentation: This member stands for the commencement of major litigation.

label: Commentary by management on significant cash and cash equivalent balances held by entity that are not available for use by group
name: CommentaryByManagementOnSignificantCashAndCashEquivalentBalancesHeldByEntityThatAreNotAvailableForUseByGroup
documentation: The commentary by management on significant cash and cash equivalent balances held by the entity that are not available for use by the group. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

label: Commercial papers issued
name: CommercialPapersIssued
documentation: The amount of commercial paper issued by the entity.

label: Commitments for development or acquisition of biological assets
name: CommitmentsForDevelopmentOrAcquisitionOfBiologicalAssets
documentation: The amount of commitments for the development or acquisition of biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

label: Commitments in relation to joint ventures
name: CommitmentsInRelationToJointVentures
documentation: The commitments that the entity has relating to its joint ventures as specified in paragraphs B18-B20 of IFRS 12. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Commitments made by entity, related party transactions
name: CommitmentsMadeByEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of related-party commitments made by the entity to do something if a particular event occurs or does not occur in the future, including executory contracts (recognised and unrecognised). [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Commitments made on behalf of entity, related party transactions
name: CommitmentsMadeOnBehalfOfEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of related-party commitments made on behalf of the entity to do something if a particular event occurs or does not occur in the future, including executory contracts (recognised and unrecognised). [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Commodity price risk [member]
name: CommodityPriceRiskMember
documentation: This member stands for a component of other price risk that represents the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in commodity prices. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Communication and network equipment [member]
name: CommunicationAndNetworkEquipmentMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing communications and network equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Communication expense
name: CommunicationExpense
documentation: The amount of expense arising from communication.

label: Compensation from third parties for items of property, plant and equipment that were impaired, lost or given up
name: CompensationFromThirdPartiesForItemsOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment
documentation: The amount of compensation from third parties for items of property, plant and equipment that were impaired, lost or given up that is included in profit or loss. [Refer: Profit (loss); Property, plant and equipment]

label: Components of equity [axis]
name: ComponentsOfEquityAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Components of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax [abstract]
name: ComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTaxAbstract

label: Components of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax [abstract]
name: ComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTaxAbstract

label: Components of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax [abstract]
name: ComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTaxAbstract

label: Components of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax [abstract]
name: ComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTaxAbstract

label: Comprehensive income
name: ComprehensiveIncome
documentation: The amount of change in equity resulting from transactions and other events, other than those changes resulting from transactions with owners in their capacity as owners.

label: Comprehensive income [abstract]
name: ComprehensiveIncomeAbstract

label: Comprehensive income attributable to [abstract]
name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToAbstract

label: Comprehensive income attributable to non-controlling interests, continuing and discontinued operations [abstract]
name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterestsContinuingAndDiscontinuedOperationsAbstract

label: Comprehensive income attributable to owners of parent, continuing and discontinued operations [abstract]
name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParentContinuingAndDiscontinuedOperationsAbstract

label: Comprehensive income from continuing operations
name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromContinuingOperations
documentation: The comprehensive income from continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Comprehensive income]

label: Comprehensive income from continuing operations, attributable to non-controlling interests
name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The comprehensive income from continuing operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Comprehensive income from continuing operations; Non-controlling interests]

label: Comprehensive income from continuing operations, attributable to owners of parent
name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToOwnersOfParent
documentation: The comprehensive income from continuing operations attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Comprehensive income from continuing operations]

label: Comprehensive income from discontinued operations
name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromDiscontinuedOperations
documentation: The comprehensive income from discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Comprehensive income]

label: Comprehensive income from discontinued operations, attributable to non-controlling interests
name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The comprehensive income from discontinued operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Comprehensive income from discontinued operations; Non-controlling interests]

label: Comprehensive income from discontinued operations, attributable to owners of parent
name: ComprehensiveIncomeFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToOwnersOfParent
documentation: The comprehensive income from discontinued operations attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Comprehensive income from discontinued operations]

label: Comprehensive income, attributable to non-controlling interests
name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The amount of comprehensive income attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Comprehensive income; Non-controlling interests]

label: Comprehensive income, attributable to owners of parent
name: ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent
documentation: The amount of comprehensive income attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Comprehensive income]

label: Comprehensive income, continuing and discontinued operations [abstract]
name: ComprehensiveIncomeContinuingAndDiscontinuedOperationsAbstract

label: Computer equipment [member]
name: ComputerEquipmentMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing computer equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Computer software
name: ComputerSoftware
documentation: The amount of intangible assets representing computer software. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Computer software [member]
name: ComputerSoftwareMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of intangible assets representing computer software. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Concentrations of risk [axis]
name: ConcentrationsOfRiskAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Concentrations of risk [member]
name: ConcentrationsOfRiskMember
documentation: This member stands for the concentrations of risk. It also represents the standard value for the 'Concentrations of risk' axis if no other member is used.

label: Confidence level corresponding to results of technique other than confidence level technique used for determining risk adjustment for non-financial risk
name: ConfidenceLevelCorrespondingToResultsOfTechniqueOtherThanConfidenceLevelTechniqueUsedForDeterminingRiskAdjustmentForNonfinancialRisk
documentation: The confidence level corresponding to the results of a technique other than the confidence level technique used for determining the risk adjustment for non-financial risk. [Refer: Risk adjustment for non-financial risk [member]]

label: Confidence level used to determine risk adjustment for non-financial risk
name: ConfidenceLevelUsedToDetermineRiskAdjustmentForNonfinancialRisk
documentation: The confidence level used to determine the risk adjustment for non-financial risk. [Refer: Risk adjustment for non-financial risk [member]]

label: Consensus pricing [member]
name: ConsensusPricingMember
documentation: This member stands for a specific valuation technique consistent with the market approach that involves analysing inputs from consensus prices (for example, offered quotes, comparability adjustments) in the market. [Refer: Market approach [member]]

label: Consideration paid (received)
name: ConsiderationPaidReceived
documentation: The amount of consideration paid or received in respect of both obtaining and losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Consideration transferred, acquisition-date fair value
name: AcquisitiondateFairValueOfTotalConsiderationTransferred
documentation: The fair value, at acquisition date, of the consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

label: Consolidated [member]
name: ConsolidatedMember
documentation: This member stands for the financial statements of a group in which the assets, liabilities, equity, income, expenses and cash flows of the parent and its subsidiaries are presented as those of a single economic entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Consolidated and separate financial statements' axis if no other member is used.

label: Consolidated and separate financial statements [axis]
name: ConsolidatedAndSeparateFinancialStatementsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Consolidated structured entities [axis]
name: ConsolidatedStructuredEntitiesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Consolidated structured entities [member]
name: ConsolidatedStructuredEntitiesMember
documentation: This member stands for consolidated structured entities. A structured entity is an entity that has been designed so that voting or similar rights are not the dominant factor in deciding who controls the entity, such as when any voting rights relate to administrative tasks only and the relevant activities are directed by means of contractual arrangements. [Refer: Consolidated [member]]

label: Constant prepayment rate, measurement input [member]
name: ConstantPrepaymentRateMeasurementInputMember
documentation: This member stands for the constant prepayment rate used as a measurement input.

label: Construction in progress
name: ConstructionInProgress
documentation: The amount of expenditure capitalised during the construction of non-current assets that are not yet available for use. [Refer: Non-current assets]

label: Construction in progress [member]
name: ConstructionInProgressMember
documentation: This member stands for expenditure capitalised during the construction of items of property, plant and equipment that are not yet available for use (ie not yet in the location and condition necessary for it to be capable of operating in the manner intended by the management). [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Consumable biological assets [member]
name: ConsumableBiologicalAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for consumable biological assets. Consumable biological assets are those that are to be harvested as agricultural produce or sold as biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

label: Contingent consideration [member]
name: ContingentConsiderationMember
documentation: This member stands for an obligation of the acquirer to transfer additional assets or equity interests to the former owners of an acquiree as part of the exchange for control of the acquiree if specified future events occur or conditions are met.

label: Contingent consideration recognised as of acquisition date
name: ContingentConsiderationRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
documentation: The amount, at acquisition date, of contingent consideration arrangements recognised as consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

label: Contingent liabilities [member]
name: ContingentLiabilitiesMember
documentation: This member stands for possible obligations that arise from past events and whose existence will be confirmed only by the occurrence or non-occurrence of one or more uncertain future events not wholly within the control of the entity; or, present obligations that arise from past events but are not recognised because (a) it is probable that an outflow of resources embodying economic benefits will be required to settle the obligations; or (b) the amount of the obligations cannot be measured with sufficient reliability. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of contingent liabilities' axis if no other member is used.

label: Contingent liabilities incurred in relation to interests in associates
name: ContingentLiabilitiesIncurredInRelationToInterestsInAssociates
documentation: The amount of contingent liabilities incurred relating to the entity's interests in associates. [Refer: Associates [member]; Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Contingent liabilities incurred in relation to interests in joint ventures
name: ContingentLiabilitiesIncurredByVenturerInRelationToInterestsInJointVentures
documentation: The amount of contingent liabilities incurred in relation to interests in joint ventures. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Joint ventures [member]]

label: Contingent liabilities recognised as of acquisition date
name: ContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
documentation: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised as of the acquisition date in a business combination. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Business combinations [member]]

label: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination
name: ContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
documentation: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Business combinations [member]]

label: Contingent liabilities related to joint ventures [member]
name: ContingentLiabilitiesOfJointVentureMember
documentation: This member stands for contingent liabilities that are related to joint ventures. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Joint ventures [member]]

label: Contingent liability arising from post-employment benefit obligations [member]
name: ContingentLiabilityArisingFromPostemploymentBenefitObligationsMember
documentation: This member stands for a contingent liability arising from post-employment benefit obligations. Post-employment benefits are employee benefits (other than termination benefits and short-term employee benefits) that are payable after the completion of employment. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Contingent liability for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs [member]
name: ContingentLiabilityForDecommissioningRestorationAndRehabilitationCostsMember
documentation: This member stands for a contingent liability relating to decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Contingent liability for guarantees [member]
name: ContingentLiabilityForGuaranteesMember
documentation: This member stands for a contingent liability for guarantees. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Guarantees [member]]

label: Continuing and discontinued operations [axis]
name: ContinuingAndDiscontinuedOperationsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of instrument [axis]
name: ContinuingInvolvementInDerecognisedFinancialAssetsByTypeOfInstrumentAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets by type of transfer [axis]
name: ContinuingInvolvementInDerecognisedFinancialAssetsByTypeOfTransferAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Continuing operations [member]
name: ContinuingOperationsMember
documentation: This member stands for components of the entity that are not discontinued operations. A component of an entity comprises operations and cash flows that can be clearly distinguished, operationally and for financial reporting purposes, from the rest of the entity. This member also represents the standard value for the 'Continuing and discontinued operations' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Aggregate continuing and discontinued operations [member]]

label: Contract assets
name: ContractAssets
documentation: The amount of an entity’s right to consideration in exchange for goods or services that the entity has transferred to a customer, when that right is conditioned on something other than the passage of time (for example, the entity’s future performance).

label: Contract assets [abstract]
name: ContractAssetsAbstract

label: Contract assets [member]
name: ContractAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for contract assets. [Refer: Contract assets]

label: Contract duration [axis]
name: ContractDurationAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Contract duration [member]
name: ContractDurationMember
documentation: This member stands for all durations of contracts with customers. It also represents the standard value for the 'Contract duration' axis if no other member is used.

label: Contract liabilities
name: ContractLiabilities
documentation: The amount of an entity’s obligation to transfer goods or services to a customer for which the entity has received consideration (or the amount is due) from the customer.

label: Contract liabilities [abstract]
name: ContractLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied over time
name: ContractLiabilitiesForPerformanceObligationsSatisfiedOverTime
documentation: The amount of contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied over time. [Refer: Contract liabilities; Performance obligations satisfied over time [member]]

label: Contract liabilities recognised as of acquisition date
name: ContractLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
documentation: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for contract liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Contract liabilities; Business combinations [member]]

label: Contractual amounts to be exchanged in derivative financial instrument for which gross cash flows are exchanged
name: ContractualAmountsToBeExchangedInDerivativeFinancialInstrumentForWhichGrossCashFlowsAreExchanged
documentation: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to contractual amounts to be exchanged in a derivative financial instrument for which gross cash flows are exchanged. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

label: Contractual capital commitments
name: ContractualCapitalCommitments
documentation: The amount of capital commitments for which the entity has entered into a contract. [Refer: Capital commitments]

label: Contractual commitments for acquisition of intangible assets
name: ContractualCommitmentsForAcquisitionOfIntangibleAssets
documentation: The amount of contractual commitments for the acquisition of intangible assets.

label: Contractual commitments for acquisition of property, plant and equipment
name: ContractualCommitmentsForAcquisitionOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment
documentation: The amount of contractual commitments for the acquisition of property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Contractual service margin
name: ContractualServiceMargin
documentation: The amount of the contractual service margin. [Refer: Contractual service margin [member]]

label: Contractual service margin [member]
name: ContractualServiceMarginMember
documentation: This member stands for a component of the carrying amount of the asset or liability for a group of insurance contracts representing the unearned profit the entity will recognise as it provides insurance contract services under the insurance contracts in the group.

label: Contractual service margin not related to contracts that existed at transition date to which modified retrospective approach or fair value approach has been applied [member]
name: ContractualServiceMarginNotRelatedToContractsThatExistedAtTransitionDateToWhichModifiedRetrospectiveApproachOrFairValueApproachHasBeenAppliedMember
documentation: This member stands for the contractual service margin not related to contracts that existed at the transition date to which the modified retrospective approach (as described in paragraphs C6-C19A of IFRS 17) or the fair value approach (as described in paragraphs C20-C24B of IFRS 17) has been applied. [Refer: Contractual service margin [member]]

label: Contractual service margin related to contracts that existed at transition date to which fair value approach has been applied [member]
name: ContractualServiceMarginRelatedToContractsThatExistedAtTransitionDateToWhichFairValueApproachHasBeenAppliedMember
documentation: This member stands for the contractual service margin related to contracts that existed at the transition date to which the fair value approach (as described in paragraphs C20-C24B of IFRS 17) has been applied. [Refer: Contractual service margin [member]]

label: Contractual service margin related to contracts that existed at transition date to which modified retrospective approach has been applied [member]
name: ContractualServiceMarginRelatedToContractsThatExistedAtTransitionDateToWhichModifiedRetrospectiveApproachHasBeenAppliedMember
documentation: This member stands for the contractual service margin related to contracts that existed at the transition date to which the modified retrospective approach (as described in paragraphs C6-C19A of IFRS 17) has been applied. [Refer: Contractual service margin [member]]

label: Contributions to plan, net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
name: ContributionsToPlanNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAssetAbstract

label: Copyrights, patents and other industrial property rights, service and operating rights
name: CopyrightsPatentsAndOtherIndustrialPropertyRightsServiceAndOperatingRights
documentation: The amount of intangible assets representing copyrights, patents and other industrial property rights, service and operating rights. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Copyrights, patents and other industrial property rights, service and operating rights [member]
name: CopyrightsPatentsAndOtherIndustrialPropertyRightsServiceAndOperatingRightsMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of intangible assets representing copyrights, patents and other industrial property rights, service and operating rights. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Corporate debt instruments held
name: CorporateDebtInstrumentsHeld
documentation: The amount of debt instruments held by the entity that were issued by a corporate entity. [Refer: Debt instruments held]

label: Cost approach [member]
name: CostApproachMember
documentation: This member stands for a valuation technique that reflects the amount that would be required currently to replace the service capacity of an asset (often referred to as 'current replacement cost').

label: Cost included in profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 20A of IAS 16 that relates to items produced that are not output of entity's ordinary activities
name: CostIncludedInProfitOrLossInAccordanceWithParagraph20AOfIAS16ThatRelatesToItemsProducedThatAreNotOutputOfEntitysOrdinaryActivities
documentation: The amount of cost included in profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 20A of IAS 16 that relates to items produced that are not an output of the entity's ordinary activities and are produced while bringing an item of property, plant and equipment to the location and condition necessary for it to be capable of operating in the manner intended by management.

label: Cost of hedging [abstract]
name: CostOfHedgingAbstract

label: Cost of inventories recognised as expense during period
name: CostOfInventoriesRecognisedAsExpenseDuringPeriod
documentation: The amount of inventories recognised as an expense during the period. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Cost of merchandise sold
name: CostOfMerchandiseSold
documentation: The amount of merchandise that was sold during the period and recognised as an expense.

label: Cost of purchased energy sold
name: CostOfPurchasedEnergySold
documentation: The amount of purchased energy that was sold during the period and recognised as an expense.

label: Cost of sales
name: CostOfSales
documentation: The amount of all expenses directly or indirectly attributed to the goods or services sold. Attributed expenses include, but are not limited to, costs previously included in the measurement of inventory that has now been sold, such as depreciation and maintenance of factory buildings and equipment used in the production process, unallocated production overheads, and abnormal amounts of production costs of inventories.

label: Cost of sales [member]
name: CostOfSalesMember
documentation: This member stands for the amount of all expenses directly or indirectly attributed to goods or services sold. This member is used to attribute an expense by nature to a functional line item in the statement of profit or loss.

label: Cost of sales, food and beverage
name: CostOfSalesFoodAndBeverage
documentation: The amount of cost of sales attributed to food and beverage. [Refer: Cost of sales]

label: Cost of sales, hotel operations
name: CostOfSalesHotelOperations
documentation: The amount of cost of sales attributed to hotel operations. [Refer: Cost of sales]

label: Cost of sales, room occupancy services
name: CostOfSalesRoomOccupancyServices
documentation: The amount of cost of sales attributed to room occupancy services. [Refer: Cost of sales]

label: Costs to obtain contracts with customers [member]
name: CostsToObtainContractsWithCustomersMember
documentation: This member stands for a category of assets recognised from the costs to obtain or fulfil contracts with customers representing the costs to obtain contracts with customers. [Refer: Assets recognised from costs to obtain or fulfil contracts with customers]

label: Counterparties [axis]
name: CounterpartiesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Counterparties [member]
name: CounterpartiesMember
documentation: This member stands for the parties to the transaction other than the entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Counterparties' axis if no other member is used.

label: Country of domicile [member]
name: CountryOfDomicileMember
documentation: This member stands for the country in which the entity is registered and where it has its legal address or registered office.

label: Country of incorporation
name: CountryOfIncorporation
documentation: The country in which the entity is incorporated.

label: Country of incorporation of associate
name: CountryOfIncorporationOrResidenceOfAssociate
documentation: The country in which an associate of the entity is incorporated. [Refer: Associates [member]]

label: Country of incorporation of entity whose consolidated financial statements have been produced for public use
name: CountryOfIncorporationOfEntityWhoseConsolidatedFinancialStatementsHaveBeenProducedForPublicUse
documentation: The country in which the entity's ultimate, or any intermediate, parent, whose consolidated financial statements that comply with IFRSs have been produced for public use, has been incorporated. [Refer: Consolidated [member]; IFRSs [member]]

label: Country of incorporation of joint operation
name: CountryOfIncorporationOfJointOperation
documentation: The country in which a joint operation of the entity is incorporated. [Refer: Joint operations [member]]

label: Country of incorporation of joint venture
name: CountryOfIncorporationOfJointVenture
documentation: The country in which a joint venture of the entity is incorporated. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Country of incorporation of subsidiary
name: CountryOfIncorporationOrResidenceOfSubsidiary
documentation: The country in which a subsidiary of the entity is incorporated. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Creation date [axis]
name: CreationDateAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Credit derivative, fair value
name: CreditDerivativeFairValue
documentation: The fair value of a credit derivative. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Derivatives [member]]

label: Credit derivative, nominal amount
name: CreditDerivativeNominalAmount
documentation: The nominal amount of a credit derivative. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

label: Credit exposure
name: CreditExposure
documentation: The amount of exposure to loss resulting from credit risk. [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

label: Credit impairment of financial instruments [axis]
name: CreditImpairmentOfFinancialInstrumentsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Credit impairment of financial instruments [member]
name: CreditImpairmentOfFinancialInstrumentsMember
documentation: This member stands for all statuses of credit impairment of financial instruments. A financial instrument is credit-impaired when one or more events that have a detrimental impact on the estimated future cash flows of that financial instrument have occurred. This member also represents the standard value for the 'Credit impairment of financial instruments' axis if no other member is used.

label: Credit risk [member]
name: CreditRiskMember
documentation: This member stands for the risk that one party to a financial instrument will cause a financial loss for the other party by failing to discharge an obligation. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Credit spread, measurement input [member]
name: CreditSpreadMeasurementInputMember
documentation: This member stands for the credit spread used as a measurement input.

label: Credit-related fee and commission income
name: CreditrelatedFeeAndCommissionIncome
documentation: The amount of income recognised from credit-related fees and commissions. [Refer: Fee and commission income]

label: Cumulative change in fair value recognised in profit or loss on sales of investment property between pools of assets measured using different models
name: CumulativeChangeInFairValueRecognisedInProfitOrLossOnSalesOfInvestmentPropertyBetweenPoolsOfAssetsMeasuredUsingDifferentModels
documentation: The cumulative change in fair value recognised in profit or loss on sales of investment property from a pool of assets in which the cost model is used into a pool in which the fair value model is used. [Refer: Fair value model [member]; Investment property]

label: Cumulative effect at date of initial application [axis]
name: CumulativeEffectAtDateOfInitialApplicationAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Cumulative gain (loss) on disposal of investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
name: CumulativeGainLossOnDisposalOfInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
documentation: The cumulative gain (loss) on disposal of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

label: Cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from reclassification of financial assets out of fair value through other comprehensive income into fair value through profit or loss measurement category
name: CumulativeGainLossPreviouslyRecognisedInOtherComprehensiveIncomeArisingFromReclassificationOfFinancialAssetsOutOfFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeIntoFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMeasurementCategory
documentation: The cumulative gain (loss) previously recognised in other comprehensive income arising from the reclassification of financial assets out of the fair value through other comprehensive income into the fair value through profit or loss measurement category. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss; Other comprehensive income]

label: Cumulative preference dividends not recognised
name: CumulativePreferenceDividendsNotRecognised
documentation: The amount of cumulative preference dividends not recognised.

label: Cumulative unrecognised share of losses of associates
name: CumulativeUnrecognisedShareOfLossesOfAssociates
documentation: The cumulative amount of the unrecognised share of losses of associates if the entity has stopped recognising its share of losses when applying the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Unrecognised share of losses of associates]

label: Cumulative unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures
name: CumulativeUnrecognisedShareOfLossesOfJointVentures
documentation: The cumulative amount of the unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures if the entity has stopped recognising its share of losses when applying the equity method. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]; Unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures]

label: Cumulative unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures, transition from proportionate consolidation to equity method
name: CumulativeUnrecognisedShareOfLossesOfJointVenturesTransitionFromProportionateConsolidationToEquityMethod
documentation: The entity's cumulative unrecognised share of losses of its joint ventures for which transition from proportionate consolidation to the equity method was performed. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]; Cumulative unrecognised share of losses of joint ventures]

label: Currency in which information is displayed [axis]
name: CurrencyInWhichInformationIsDisplayedAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Currency in which supplementary information is displayed [member]
name: CurrencyInWhichSupplementaryInformationIsDisplayedMember
documentation: This member indicates information displayed in a currency that is different from either the entity’s functional currency or its presentation currency.

label: Currency risk [member]
name: CurrencyRiskMember
documentation: This member stands for a type of market risk representing the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in foreign exchange rates. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Currency swap contract [member]
name: CurrencySwapContractMember
documentation: This member stands for a currency swap contract. [Refer: Swap contract [member]]

label: Current [member]
name: CurrentMember
documentation: This member stands for a current time band.

label: Current accruals and current deferred income including current contract liabilities
name: CurrentAccrualsAndCurrentDeferredIncomeIncludingCurrentContractLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current accruals and current deferred income including current contract liabilities. [Refer: Accruals; Deferred income including contract liabilities]

label: Current accruals and current deferred income including current contract liabilities [abstract]
name: CurrentAccrualsAndCurrentDeferredIncomeIncludingCurrentContractLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Current accrued expenses and other current liabilities
name: CurrentAccruedExpensesAndOtherCurrentLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current accrued expenses and other current liabilities. [Refer: Accruals; Other current liabilities]

label: Current accrued income including current contract assets
name: CurrentAccruedIncomeIncludingCurrentContractAssets
documentation: The amount of current accrued income including current contract assets. [Refer: Accrued income including contract assets]

label: Current accrued income including current contract assets [abstract]
name: CurrentAccruedIncomeIncludingCurrentContractAssetsAbstract

label: Current accrued income other than current contract assets
name: CurrentAccruedIncomeOtherThanCurrentContractAssets
documentation: The amount of current accrued income other than current contract assets. [Refer: Accrued income other than contract assets]

label: Current advances received, representing current contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied at point in time
name: CurrentAdvances
documentation: The amount of current advances received representing current contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied at a point in time. [Refer: Advances received, representing contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied at point in time]

label: Current advances to suppliers
name: CurrentAdvancesToSuppliers
documentation: The amount of current advances made to suppliers before goods or services are received.

label: Current agricultural produce
name: CurrentAgriculturalProduce
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of harvested produce of the entity's biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets; Inventories]

label: Current and deferred tax relating to items charged or credited directly to equity [abstract]
name: CurrentAndDeferredTaxRelatingToItemsChargedOrCreditedDirectlyToEquityAbstract

label: Current and deferred tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity
name: CurrentAndDeferredTaxRelatingToItemsChargedOrCreditedDirectlyToEquity
documentation: The aggregate current and deferred tax relating to particular items that are charged or credited directly to equity, for example: (a) an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings resulting from either a change in accounting policy that is applied retrospectively or the correction of an error; and (b) amounts arising on initial recognition of the equity component of a compound financial instrument. [Refer: Deferred tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity; Retained earnings; Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Current assets
name: CurrentAssets
documentation: The amount of assets that the entity (a) expects to realise or intends to sell or consume in its normal operating cycle; (b) holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) expects to realise within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) classifies as cash or cash equivalents (as defined in IAS 7) unless the asset is restricted from being exchanged or used to settle a liability for at least twelve months after the reporting period. [Refer: Assets]

label: Current assets (liabilities)
name: CurrentAssetsLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current assets less the amount of current liabilities.

label: Current assets [abstract]
name: CurrentAssetsAbstract

label: Current assets other than non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners
name: CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners
documentation: The amount of current assets other than non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale or as held for distribution to owners. [Refer: Current assets; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for distribution to owners]

label: Current assets recognised as of acquisition date
name: CurrentAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
documentation: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for current assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Current assets; Business combinations [member]]

label: Current biological assets
name: CurrentBiologicalAssets
documentation: The amount of current biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

label: Current biological assets [member]
name: CurrentBiologicalAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for current biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

label: Current bonds issued and current portion of non-current bonds issued
name: CurrentBondsIssuedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentBondsIssued
documentation: The amount of current bonds issued and the current portion of non-current bonds issued. [Refer: Bonds issued]

label: Current borrowings
name: ShorttermBorrowings
documentation: The amount of current borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

label: Current borrowings and current portion of non-current borrowings
name: CurrentBorrowingsAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentBorrowings
documentation: The amount of current borrowings and current portion of non-current borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

label: Current borrowings and current portion of non-current borrowings [abstract]
name: CurrentBorrowingsAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentBorrowingsAbstract

label: Current borrowings and current portion of non-current borrowings, by type [abstract]
name: CurrentBorrowingsAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentBorrowingsByTypeAbstract

label: Current commercial papers issued and current portion of non-current commercial papers issued
name: CurrentCommercialPapersIssuedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentCommercialPapersIssued
documentation: The amount of current commercial paper issued and the current portion of non-current commercial paper issued. [Refer: Commercial papers issued]

label: Current contract assets
name: CurrentContractAssets
documentation: The amount of current contract assets. [Refer: Contract assets]

label: Current contract liabilities
name: CurrentContractLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current contract liabilities. [Refer: Contract liabilities]

label: Current contract liabilities [abstract]
name: CurrentContractLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Current contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied over time
name: CurrentContractLiabilitiesForPerformanceObligationsSatisfiedOverTime
documentation: The amount of current contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied over time. [Refer: Contract liabilities for performance obligations satisfied over time]

label: Current crude oil
name: CurrentCrudeOil
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of unrefined, unprocessed oil. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current debt instruments issued
name: CurrentDebtInstrumentsIssued
documentation: The amount of current debt instruments issued. [Refer: Debt instruments issued]

label: Current deferred income including current contract liabilities
name: CurrentDeferredIncomeIncludingCurrentContractLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current deferred income including current contract liabilities. [Refer: Deferred income including contract liabilities]

label: Current deferred income including current contract liabilities [abstract]
name: CurrentDeferredIncomeIncludingCurrentContractLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Current deferred income other than current contract liabilities
name: CurrentDeferredIncomeOtherThanCurrentContractLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current deferred income other than current contract liabilities. [Refer: Deferred income other than contract liabilities]

label: Current deposits from customers
name: CurrentDepositsFromCustomers
documentation: The amount of current deposits from customers. [Refer: Deposits from customers]

label: Current derivative financial assets
name: CurrentDerivativeFinancialAssets
documentation: The amount of current derivative financial assets. [Refer: Derivative financial assets]

label: Current derivative financial liabilities
name: CurrentDerivativeFinancialLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current derivative financial liabilities. [Refer: Derivative financial liabilities]

label: Current dividend payables
name: CurrentDividendPayables
documentation: The amount of current dividend payables. [Refer: Dividend payables]

label: Current estimate of future cash outflows to be paid to fulfil obligation, measurement input [member]
name: CurrentEstimateOfFutureCashOutflowsToBePaidToFulfilObligationMeasurementInputMember
documentation: This member stands for the current estimate of future cash outflows to be paid to fulfil obligation, used as a measurement input.

label: Current excise tax payables
name: CurrentExciseTaxPayables
documentation: The amount of current excise tax payables. [Refer: Excise tax payables]

label: Current finance lease receivables
name: CurrentFinanceLeaseReceivables
documentation: The amount of current finance lease receivables. [Refer: Finance lease receivables]

label: Current financial assets
name: CurrentFinancialAssets
documentation: The amount of current financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Current financial assets at amortised cost
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtAmortisedCost
documentation: The amount of current financial assets measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

label: Current financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
documentation: The amount of current financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income]

label: Current financial assets at fair value through other comprehensive income [abstract]
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeAbstract

label: Current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of current financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss]

label: Current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss [abstract]
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossAbstract

label: Current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, classified as held for trading
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading
documentation: The amount of current financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss classified as held for trading. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, classified as held for trading]

label: Current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognition
documentation: The amount of current financial assets measured at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

label: Current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, mandatorily measured at fair value
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMandatorilyMeasuredAtFairValue
documentation: The amount of current financial assets mandatorily measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, mandatorily measured at fair value]

label: Current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, measured as such in accordance with exemption for reacquisition of own equity instruments
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMeasuredAsSuchInAccordanceWithExemptionForReacquisitionOfOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The amount of current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss measured as such in accordance with the exemption for reacquisition of own equity instruments. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, measured as such in accordance with exemption for reacquisition of own equity instruments]

label: Current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, measured as such in accordance with exemption for repurchase of own financial liabilities
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossMeasuredAsSuchInAccordanceWithExemptionForRepurchaseOfOwnFinancialLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current financial assets at fair value through profit or loss measured as such in accordance with the exemption for repurchase of own financial liabilities. [Refer: Financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, measured as such in accordance with exemption for repurchase of own financial liabilities]

label: Current financial assets available-for-sale
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsAvailableforsale
documentation: The amount of current financial assets available-for-sale. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Current financial assets]

label: Current financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income
name: CurrentFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
documentation: The amount of current financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income]

label: Current financial liabilities
name: CurrentFinancialLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current financial liabilities. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

label: Current financial liabilities at amortised cost
name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtAmortisedCost
documentation: The amount of current financial liabilities measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial liabilities at amortised cost]

label: Current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss
name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of current financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

label: Current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss [abstract]
name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossAbstract

label: Current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, classified as held for trading
name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossClassifiedAsHeldForTrading
documentation: The amount of current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss that meet the definition of held for trading. [Refer: Current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

label: Current financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently
name: CurrentFinancialLiabilitiesAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossDesignatedUponInitialRecognition
documentation: The amount of current financial liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss that were designated as such upon initial recognition or subsequently. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss, designated upon initial recognition or subsequently]

label: Current finished goods
name: FinishedGoods
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of goods that have completed the production process and are held for sale in the ordinary course of business. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current food and beverage
name: CurrentFoodAndBeverage
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of food and beverage. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current fuel
name: CurrentFuel
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of fuel. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current government grants
name: CurrentGovernmentGrants
documentation: The amount of current government grants recognised in the statement of financial position as deferred income. [Refer: Government [member]; Government grants]

label: Current held-to-maturity investments
name: CurrentHeldtomaturityInvestments
documentation: The amount of current held-to-maturity investments. [Refer: Held-to-maturity investments]

label: Current interest payable
name: CurrentInterestPayable
documentation: The amount of current interest payable. [Refer: Interest payable]

label: Current interest receivable
name: CurrentInterestReceivable
documentation: The amount of current interest receivable. [Refer: Interest receivable]

label: Current inventories
name: Inventories
documentation: The amount of current inventories. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current inventories arising from extractive activities [abstract]
name: CurrentInventoriesArisingFromExtractiveActivitiesAbstract

label: Current inventories held for sale
name: CurrentInventoriesHeldForSale
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of inventories held for sale in the ordinary course of business. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current inventories in transit
name: CurrentInventoriesInTransit
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of inventories in transit. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current investments
name: CurrentInvestments
documentation: The amount of current investments.

label: Current investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
name: CurrentInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
documentation: The amount of current investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income]

label: Current lease liabilities
name: CurrentLeaseLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current lease liabilities. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

label: Current legal proceedings provision
name: ShorttermLegalProceedingsProvision
documentation: The amount of current provision for legal proceedings. [Refer: Legal proceedings provision]

label: Current liabilities
name: CurrentLiabilities
documentation:
Expiry date 2023-01-01: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have an unconditional right to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.
Effective 2023-01-01: The amount of liabilities that: (a) the entity expects to settle in its normal operating cycle; (b) the entity holds primarily for the purpose of trading; (c) are due to be settled within twelve months after the reporting period; or (d) the entity does not have the right at the end of the reporting period to defer settlement for at least twelve months after the reporting period.

label: Current liabilities [abstract]
name: CurrentLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Current liabilities other than liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale
name: CurrentLiabilitiesOtherThanLiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale
documentation: The amount of current liabilities other than liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale. [Refer: Current liabilities; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale]

label: Current liabilities recognised as of acquisition date
name: CurrentLiabilitiesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
documentation: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for current liabilities assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Current liabilities; Business combinations [member]]

label: Current loans and receivables
name: CurrentLoansAndReceivables
documentation: The amount of current loans and receivables. [Refer: Loans and receivables]

label: Current loans received and current portion of non-current loans received
name: CurrentLoansReceivedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentLoansReceived
documentation: The amount of current loans received and the current portion of non-current loans received. [Refer: Loans received]

label: Current materials and supplies to be consumed in production process or rendering services
name: CurrentMaterialsAndSuppliesToBeConsumedInProductionProcessOrRenderingServices
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of materials and supplies to be consumed in a production process or while rendering services. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current merchandise
name: Merchandise
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of goods acquired for resale. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current miscellaneous other provisions
name: ShorttermMiscellaneousOtherProvisions
documentation: The amount of miscellaneous current other provisions. [Refer: Miscellaneous other provisions]

label: Current natural gas
name: CurrentNaturalGas
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of a naturally occurring hydrocarbon gas mixture. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current net defined benefit asset
name: CurrentRecognisedAssetsDefinedBenefitPlan
documentation: The amount of current net defined benefit asset. [Refer: Net defined benefit asset]

label: Current net defined benefit liability
name: CurrentRecognisedLiabilitiesDefinedBenefitPlan
documentation: The amount of current net defined benefit liability. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability]

label: Current non-cash assets pledged as collateral for which transferee has right by contract or custom to sell or repledge collateral
name: CurrentNoncashAssetsPledgedAsCollateralForWhichTransfereeHasRightByContractOrCustomToSellOrRepledgeCollateral
documentation: The amount of current non-cash collateral assets (such as debt or equity instruments) provided to a transferee, for which the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or repledge the collateral.

label: Current notes and debentures issued and current portion of non-current notes and debentures issued
name: CurrentNotesAndDebenturesIssuedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentNotesAndDebenturesIssued
documentation: The amount of current notes and debentures issued and the current portion of non-current notes and debentures issued. [Refer: Notes and debentures issued]

label: Current onerous contracts provision
name: ShorttermOnerousContractsProvision
documentation: The amount of current provision for onerous contracts. [Refer: Onerous contracts provision]

label: Current ore stockpiles
name: CurrentOreStockpiles
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of ore stockpiles. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current packaging and storage materials
name: CurrentPackagingAndStorageMaterials
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of packaging and storage materials. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current payables for purchase of energy
name: CurrentPayablesForPurchaseOfEnergy
documentation: The amount of current payables for the purchase of energy. [Refer: Payables for purchase of energy]

label: Current payables for purchase of non-current assets
name: CurrentPayablesForPurchaseOfNoncurrentAssets
documentation: The amount of current payables for the purchase of non-current assets. [Refer: Payables for purchase of non-current assets]

label: Current payables on social security and taxes other than income tax
name: CurrentPayablesOnSocialSecurityAndTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
documentation: The amount of current payables on social security and taxes other than incomes tax. [Refer: Payables on social security and taxes other than income tax]

label: Current payables to related parties
name: TradeAndOtherCurrentPayablesToRelatedParties
documentation: The amount of current payables due to related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]; Payables to related parties]

label: Current petroleum and petrochemical products
name: CurrentPetroleumAndPetrochemicalProducts
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of products derived from crude oil and natural gas. [Refer: Current crude oil; Current natural gas]

label: Current portion of non-current borrowings
name: CurrentPortionOfLongtermBorrowings
documentation: The current portion of non-current borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

label: Current prepaid expenses
name: CurrentPrepaidExpenses
documentation: The amount recognised as a current asset for expenditures made prior to the period when the economic benefit will be realised.

label: Current prepayments
name: CurrentPrepayments
documentation: The amount of current prepayments. [Refer: Prepayments]

label: Current prepayments [abstract]
name: CurrentPrepaymentsAbstract

label: Current prepayments and current accrued income including current contract assets
name: CurrentPrepaymentsAndCurrentAccruedIncomeIncludingCurrentContractAssets
documentation: The amount of current prepayments and current accrued income including current contract assets. [Refer: Prepayments; Accrued income including contract assets]

label: Current prepayments and current accrued income including current contract assets [abstract]
name: CurrentPrepaymentsAndCurrentAccruedIncomeIncludingCurrentContractAssetsAbstract

label: Current prepayments and current accrued income other than current contract assets
name: CurrentPrepaymentsAndCurrentAccruedIncomeOtherThanCurrentContractAssets
documentation: The amount of current prepayments and current accrued income, other than current contract assets. [Refer: Prepayments; Accrued income other than contract assets]

label: Current prepayments and current accrued income other than current contract assets [abstract]
name: CurrentPrepaymentsAndCurrentAccruedIncomeOtherThanCurrentContractAssetsAbstract

label: Current prepayments and other current assets
name: CurrentPrepaymentsAndOtherCurrentAssets
documentation: The amount of current prepayments and other current assets. [Refer: Other current assets; Current prepayments]

label: Current production supplies
name: ProductionSupplies
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of supplies to be used for the production process. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current programming assets
name: CurrentProgrammingAssets
documentation: The amount of current programming assets. [Refer: Programming assets]

label: Current provision for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs
name: ShorttermProvisionForDecommissioningRestorationAndRehabilitationCosts
documentation: The amount of current provision for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs. [Refer: Provision for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs]

label: Current provisions
name: CurrentProvisions
documentation: The amount of current provisions, including provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

label: Current provisions [abstract]
name: CurrentProvisionsAbstract

label: Current provisions for employee benefits
name: CurrentProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits
documentation: The amount of current provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions for employee benefits]

label: Current raw materials
name: RawMaterials
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of assets to be consumed in the production process or in the rendering of services. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current raw materials and current production supplies
name: CurrentRawMaterialsAndCurrentProductionSupplies
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of current raw materials and current production supplies. [Refer: Current production supplies; Current raw materials]

label: Current raw materials and current production supplies [abstract]
name: CurrentRawMaterialsAndCurrentProductionSuppliesAbstract

label: Current receivables due from associates
name: CurrentReceivablesDueFromAssociates
documentation: The amount of current receivables due from associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

label: Current receivables due from joint ventures
name: CurrentReceivablesDueFromJointVentures
documentation: The amount of current receivables due from joint ventures. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Current receivables due from related parties
name: TradeAndOtherCurrentReceivablesDueFromRelatedParties
documentation: The amount of current receivables due from related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Current receivables from contracts with customers
name: CurrentReceivablesFromContractsWithCustomers
documentation: The amount of current receivables from contracts with customers. [Refer: Receivables from contracts with customers]

label: Current receivables from rental of properties
name: CurrentReceivablesFromRentalOfProperties
documentation: The amount of current receivables from rental of properties. [Refer: Receivables from rental of properties]

label: Current receivables from sale of properties
name: CurrentReceivablesFromSaleOfProperties
documentation: The amount of current receivables from sale of properties. [Refer: Receivables from sale of properties]

label: Current receivables from taxes other than income tax
name: CurrentReceivablesFromTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
documentation: The amount of current receivables from taxes other than income tax. [Refer: Receivables from taxes other than income tax]

label: Current refunds provision
name: CurrentRefundsProvision
documentation: The amount of current provision for refunds. [Refer: Refunds provision]

label: Current restricted cash and cash equivalents
name: CurrentRestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents
documentation: The amount of current restricted cash and cash equivalents. [Refer: Restricted cash and cash equivalents]

label: Current restructuring provision
name: ShorttermRestructuringProvision
documentation: The amount of current provision for restructuring. [Refer: Restructuring provision]

label: Current retention payables
name: CurrentRetentionPayables
documentation: The amount of current retention payables. [Refer: Retention payables]

label: Current secured bank loans received and current portion of non-current secured bank loans received
name: CurrentSecuredBankLoansReceivedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentSecuredBankLoansReceived
documentation: The amount of current secured bank loans received and the current portion of non-current secured bank loans received. [Refer: Secured bank loans received]

label: Current service cost, defined benefit plans
name: CurrentServiceCostDefinedBenefitPlans
documentation: The expense of employee service in the current period arising from defined benefit plans. [Refer: Post-employment benefit expense in profit or loss, defined benefit plans] [Contrast: Increase in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from current service cost]

label: Current spare parts
name: SpareParts
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of interchangeable parts that are kept in an inventory and are used for the repair or replacement of failed parts. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Current tax assets
name: CurrentTaxAssets
documentation: The excess of amount paid for current tax in respect of current and prior periods over the amount due for those periods. Current tax is the amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

label: Current tax assets, current
name: CurrentTaxAssetsCurrent
documentation: The current amount of current tax assets. [Refer: Current tax assets]

label: Current tax assets, non-current
name: CurrentTaxAssetsNoncurrent
documentation: The non-current amount of current tax assets. [Refer: Current tax assets]

label: Current tax expense (income)
name: CurrentTaxExpenseIncome
documentation: The amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

label: Current tax expense (income) and adjustments for current tax of prior periods
name: CurrentTaxExpenseIncomeAndAdjustmentsForCurrentTaxOfPriorPeriods
documentation: The amount of current tax expense (income) and adjustments for the current tax of prior periods. [Refer: Current tax expense (income); Adjustments for current tax of prior periods]

label: Current tax expense (income) and adjustments for current tax of prior periods [abstract]
name: CurrentTaxExpenseIncomeAndAdjustmentsForCurrentTaxOfPriorPeriodsAbstract

label: Current tax liabilities
name: CurrentTaxLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current tax for current and prior periods to the extent unpaid. Current tax is the amount of income taxes payable (recoverable) in respect of the taxable profit (tax loss) for a period.

label: Current tax liabilities, current
name: CurrentTaxLiabilitiesCurrent
documentation: The current amount of current tax liabilities. [Refer: Current tax liabilities]

label: Current tax liabilities, non-current
name: CurrentTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent
documentation: The non-current amount of current tax liabilities. [Refer: Current tax liabilities]

label: Current tax relating to items credited (charged) directly to equity
name: CurrentTaxRelatingToItemsChargedOrCreditedDirectlyToEquity
documentation: The amount of current tax relating to particular items that are charged or credited directly to equity, for example: (a) an adjustment to the opening balance of retained earnings resulting from either a change in accounting policy that is applied retrospectively or the correction of an error; and (b) amounts arising on initial recognition of the equity component of a compound financial instrument. [Refer: Retained earnings; Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Current trade payables
name: TradeAndOtherCurrentPayablesToTradeSuppliers
documentation: The current amount of payment due to suppliers for goods and services used in entity's business. [Refer: Current liabilities; Trade payables]

label: Current trade receivables
name: CurrentTradeReceivables
documentation: The amount of current trade receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables]

label: Current unsecured bank loans received and current portion of non-current unsecured bank loans received
name: CurrentUnsecuredBankLoansReceivedAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentUnsecuredBankLoansReceived
documentation: The amount of current unsecured bank loans received and the current portion of non-current unsecured bank loans received. [Refer: Unsecured bank loans received]

label: Current value added tax payables
name: CurrentValueAddedTaxPayables
documentation: The amount of current value added tax payables. [Refer: Value added tax payables]

label: Current value added tax receivables
name: CurrentValueAddedTaxReceivables
documentation: The amount of current value added tax receivables. [Refer: Value added tax receivables]

label: Current warrant liability
name: CurrentWarrantLiability
documentation: The amount of current warrant liabilities. [Refer: Warrant liability]

label: Current warranty provision
name: ShorttermWarrantyProvision
documentation: The amount of current provision for warranties. [Refer: Warranty provision]

label: Current work in progress
name: WorkInProgress
documentation: A classification of current inventory representing the amount of assets currently in production, which require further processes to be converted into finished goods or services. [Refer: Current finished goods; Inventories]

label: Currently stated [member]
name: RestatedMember
documentation: This member stands for the information currently stated in the financial statements. It also represents the standard value for the 'Retrospective application and retrospective restatement' and 'Departure from requirement of IFRS' axes if no other member is used.

label: Customer-related intangible assets [member]
name: CustomerrelatedIntangibleAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of intangible assets representing assets related to customers. Such assets may include customer lists, order or production backlog, customer contracts and related customer relationships as well as non-contractual customer relationships.

label: Customer-related intangible assets recognised as of acquisition date
name: CustomerrelatedIntangibleAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
documentation: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for customer-related intangible assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Customer-related intangible assets [member]; Business combinations [member]]

label: Customers [member]
name: MajorCustomersMember
documentation: This member stands for customers. It also represents the standard value for the 'Major customers' axis if no other member is used.

label: Date as at which entity plans to apply new IFRS initially
