documentation: The amount of interest income on reverse repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities borrowed. [Refer: Interest income; Reverse repurchase agreements and cash collateral on securities borrowed]

label: Interest income, defined benefit plans
name: InterestIncomeDefinedBenefitPlans
documentation: The amount of interest income arising from defined benefit plans. [Refer: Interest income; Post-employment benefit expense in profit or loss, defined benefit plans] [Contrast: Increase (decrease) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from interest expense (income)]

label: Interest paid, classified as financing activities
name: InterestPaidClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow for interest paid, classified as financing activities.

label: Interest paid, classified as investing activities
name: InterestPaidClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow for interest paid, classified as investing activities.

label: Interest paid, classified as operating activities
name: InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow for interest paid, classified as operating activities.

label: Interest payable
name: InterestPayable
documentation: The amount of interest recognised as a liability.

label: Interest rate benchmarks [axis]
name: InterestRateBenchmarksAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Interest rate benchmarks [member]
name: InterestRateBenchmarksMember
documentation: This member stands for all interest rate benchmarks. It also represents the standard value for the 'Interest rate benchmarks' axis if no other member is used.

label: Interest rate risk [member]
name: InterestRateRiskMember
documentation: This member stands for the type of risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market interest rates. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Interest rate swap contract [member]
name: InterestRateSwapContractMember
documentation: This member stands for an interest rate swap contract. [Refer: Swap contract [member]]

label: Interest rate types [member]
name: InterestRateTypesMember
documentation: This member stands for all types of interest rates. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of interest rates' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Interest rate risk [member]]

label: Interest rate, measurement input [member]
name: InterestRateMeasurementInputMember
documentation: This member stands for an interest rate used as a measurement input.

label: Interest receivable
name: InterestReceivable
documentation: The amount of interest recognised as a receivable.

label: Interest received, classified as investing activities
name: InterestReceivedClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from interest received, classified as investing activities.

label: Interest received, classified as operating activities
name: InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from interest received, classified as operating activities.

label: Interest revenue (expense) recognised for financial assets reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category, initial application of IFRS 9
name: InterestIncomeExpenseRecognisedForFinancialAssetsReclassifiedIntoMeasuredAtAmortisedCostFirstApplicationOfIFRS9
documentation: The amount of interest revenue (expense) recognised for financial assets that have been reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Interest revenue (expense) recognised for financial liabilities reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category, initial application of IFRS 9
name: InterestIncomeExpenseRecognisedForFinancialLiabilitiesReclassifiedIntoMeasuredAtAmortisedCostFirstApplicationOfIFRS9
documentation: The amount of interest revenue (expense) recognised for financial liabilities that have been reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category as a result of the transition to IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

label: Interest revenue calculated using effective interest method
name: InterestRevenueCalculatedUsingEffectiveInterestMethod
documentation: The amount of interest revenue calculated using the effective interest method. Effective interest method is the method that is used in the calculation of the amortised cost of a financial asset or a financial liability and in the allocation and recognition of the interest revenue or interest expense in profit or loss over the relevant period. [Refer: Revenue]

label: Interest revenue for financial assets measured at amortised cost
name: InterestIncomeForFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
documentation: The amount of revenue arising from interest for financial assets that are measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Interest income; Financial assets at amortised cost]

label: Interest revenue for financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income
name: InterestRevenueForFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
documentation: The amount of interest revenue arising on financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Revenue; Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income]

label: Interest revenue recognised for assets reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category into amortised cost or fair value through other comprehensive income category
name: InterestIncomeExpenseRecognisedForAssetsReclassifiedIntoMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
documentation: The amount of revenue arising from interest recognised for assets reclassified out of fair value through profit or loss category into amortised cost or fair value through other comprehensive income category. [Refer: Interest income (expense); Financial assets at amortised cost]

label: Internal credit grades [axis]
name: InternalCreditGradesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Internal credit grades [member]
name: InternalCreditGradesMember
documentation: This member stands for credit grades that have been developed by the entity itself.

label: Internally generated [member]
name: InternallyGeneratedMember
documentation: This member stands for items that have been internally generated by the entity.

label: Intrinsic value of liabilities from share-based payment transactions for which counterparty's right to cash or other assets vested
name: IntrinsicValueOfLiabilitiesFromSharebasedPaymentTransactionsForWhichCounterpartysRightToCashOrOtherAssetsVested2011
documentation: The intrinsic value of liabilities arising from share-based transactions for which the counterparty's right to cash or other assets had vested by the end of the period (for example, vested share appreciation rights). The intrinsic value is the difference between the fair value of the shares to which the counterparty has the (conditional or unconditional) right to subscribe, or which it has the right to receive, and the price (if any) that the counterparty is (or will be) required to pay for those shares. Share-based payment transactions are transactions in which the entity: (a) receives goods or services from the supplier of those goods or services (including an employee) in a share-based payment arrangement; or (b) incurs an obligation to settle the transaction with the supplier in a share-based payment arrangement when another group entity receives those goods or services, for which the counterparty's right to cash or other assets had vested by the end of the period (for example, vested share appreciation rights).

label: Inventories
name: InventoriesTotal
documentation: The amount of assets: (a) held for sale in the ordinary course of business; (b) in the process of production for such sale; or (c) in the form of materials or supplies to be consumed in the production process or in the rendering of services. Inventories encompass goods purchased and held for resale including, for example, merchandise purchased by a retailer and held for resale, or land and other property held for resale. Inventories also encompass finished goods produced, or work in progress being produced, by the entity and include materials and supplies awaiting use in the production process. [Refer: Current finished goods; Current merchandise; Current work in progress; Land]

label: Inventories pledged as security for liabilities
name: InventoriesPledgedAsSecurityForLiabilities
documentation: The amount of inventories pledged as security for liabilities. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Inventories, at fair value less costs to sell
name: InventoriesAtFairValueLessCostsToSell
documentation: The amount of inventories carried at fair value less costs to sell. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Inventories, at net realisable value
name: InventoriesAtNetRealisableValue
documentation: The amount of inventories carried at net realisable value. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Inventory recognised as of acquisition date
name: InventoryRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
documentation: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for inventory acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Inventories; Business combinations [member]]

label: Inventory write-down
name: InventoryWritedown2011
documentation: The amount of expense recognised related to the write-down of inventories to net realisable value. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Investment contracts liabilities
name: InvestmentContractsLiabilities
documentation: The amount of liabilities relating to investment contracts that fall within the scope of IAS 39 or IFRS 9.

label: Investment funds [member]
name: InvestmentFundsMember
documentation: This member stands for investment funds.

label: Investment funds, amount contributed to fair value of plan assets
name: InvestmentFundsAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The amount investment funds contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]; Investment funds [member]]

label: Investment funds, percentage contributed to fair value of plan assets
name: InvestmentFundsPercentageContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The percentage investment funds contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]; Investment funds [member]] [Contrast: Investment funds, amount contributed to fair value of plan assets]

label: Investment income
name: InvestmentIncome
documentation: The amount of investment income, such as interest and dividends.

label: Investment property
name: InvestmentProperty
documentation: The amount of property (land or a building - or part of a building - or both) held (by the owner or by the lessee as a right-of-use asset) to earn rentals or for capital appreciation or both, rather than for: (a) use in the production or supply of goods or services or for administrative purposes; or (b) sale in the ordinary course of business.

label: Investment property [abstract]
name: InvestmentPropertyAbstract

label: Investment property [member]
name: InvestmentPropertyMember
documentation: This member stands for investment property. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of investment property' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Investment property]

label: Investment property carried at cost or in accordance with IFRS 16 within fair value model, at time of sale
name: InvestmentPropertyCarriedAtCostOrInAccordanceWithIFRS16WithinFairValueModelAtTimeOfSale
documentation: The amount at the time of the sale of investment property carried at cost or in accordance with IFRS 16 within fair value model. [Refer: At cost or in accordance with IFRS 16 within fair value model [member]; Investment property]

label: Investment property completed
name: InvestmentPropertyCompleted
documentation: The amount of investment property whose construction or development is complete. [Refer: Investment property]

label: Investment property completed [member]
name: InvestmentPropertyCompletedMember
documentation: This member stands for completed investment property. [Refer: Investment property completed]

label: Investment property fair value used as deemed cost
name: InvestmentPropertyFairValueUsedAsDeemedCost
documentation: The amount of investment property, for which fair value was used as deemed cost in the opening IFRS statement of financial position. [Refer: Investment property]

label: Investment property under construction or development
name: InvestmentPropertyUnderConstructionOrDevelopment
documentation: The amount of property that is being constructed or developed for future use as investment property. [Refer: Investment property]

label: Investment property under construction or development [member]
name: InvestmentPropertyUnderConstructionOrDevelopmentMember
documentation: This member stands for investment property under construction or development. [Refer: Investment property under construction or development]

label: Investments accounted for using equity method
name: InvestmentAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The amount of investments accounted for using the equity method. The equity method is a method of accounting whereby the investment is initially recognised at cost and adjusted thereafter for the post-acquisition change in the investor's share of net assets of the investee. The investor's profit or loss includes its share of the profit or loss of the investee. The investor's other comprehensive income includes its share of the other comprehensive income of the investee. [Refer: At cost [member]]

label: Investments accounted for using equity method [abstract]
name: InvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethodAbstract

label: Investments accounted for using equity method [member]
name: InvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethodMember
documentation: This member stands for investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method]

label: Investments for risk of policyholders
name: InvestmentsForRiskOfPolicyholders
documentation: The amount of investments against insurance liabilities where all risk is borne by the policyholders.

label: Investments in associates accounted for using equity method
name: InvestmentsInAssociatesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The amount of investments in associates accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method]

label: Investments in associates reported in separate financial statements
name: InvestmentsInAssociates
documentation: The amount of investments in associates in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Associates [member]]

label: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income
name: FairValueOfInvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsDesignatedAsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
documentation: The amount of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

label: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [axis]
name: InvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income [member]
name: InvestmentsInEquityInstrumentsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncomeMember
documentation: This member stands for investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. It also represents the standard value for the 'Investments in equity instruments designated at fair value through other comprehensive income' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Other comprehensive income]

label: Investments in joint ventures accounted for using equity method
name: InvestmentsInJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The amount of investments in joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method]

label: Investments in joint ventures reported in separate financial statements
name: InvestmentsInJointVentures
documentation: The amount of investments in joint ventures in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Investments in subsidiaries reported in separate financial statements
name: InvestmentsInSubsidiaries
documentation: The amount of investments in subsidiaries in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates reported in separate financial statements
name: InvestmentsInSubsidiariesJointVenturesAndAssociates
documentation: The amount of investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates in an entity's separate financial statements. [Refer: Associates [member]; Joint ventures [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Investments in subsidiaries reported in separate financial statements]

label: Investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates reported in separate financial statements [abstract]
name: InvestmentsInSubsidiariesJointVenturesAndAssociatesAbstract

label: Investments other than investments accounted for using equity method
name: InvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The amount of investments other than investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method]

label: Issue costs not recognised as expense for transaction recognised separately from acquisition of assets and assumption of liabilities in business combination
name: IssueCostsNotRecognisedAsExpenseForTransactionRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
documentation: The amount of issue costs not recognised as an expense for transactions recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and assumption of liabilities in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

label: Issue of convertible instruments
name: IssueOfConvertibleInstruments
documentation: The change in equity resulting from the issuing of convertible instruments.

label: Issue of equity
name: IssueOfEquity
documentation: The increase in equity through the issue of equity instruments.

label: Issued capital
name: IssuedCapital
documentation: The nominal value of capital issued.

label: Issued capital [abstract]
name: IssuedCapitalAbstract

label: Issued capital [member]
name: IssuedCapitalMember
documentation: This member stands for a component of equity representing issued capital.

label: Issued capital, ordinary shares
name: IssuedCapitalOrdinaryShares
documentation: The nominal value of capital arising from issuing ordinary shares. [Refer: Issued capital]

label: Issued capital, preference shares
name: IssuedCapitalPreferenceShares
documentation: The nominal value of capital arising from issuing preference shares. [Refer: Issued capital]

label: Issues, fair value measurement, assets
name: IssuesFairValueMeasurementAssets
documentation: The increase in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from issues of those assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Issues, fair value measurement, entity's own equity instruments
name: IssuesFairValueMeasurementEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The increase in the fair value measurement of the entity's own equity instruments resulting from issues of those equity instruments. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Entity's own equity instruments [member]]

label: Issues, fair value measurement, liabilities
name: IssuesFairValueMeasurementLiabilities
documentation: The increase in fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from issues of those liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Items are further detailed in section [800100] Subclassifications of assets, liabilities and equities
name: ItemsAreFurtherDetailedInSection800100SubclassificationsOfAssetsLiabilitiesAndEquities

label: Items are further detailed in section [800200] Analysis of income and expense
name: ItemsAreFurtherDetailedInSection800200AnalysisOfIncomeAndExpense

label: Items are further detailed in section [800300] Statement of cash flows, additional disclosures
name: ItemsAreFurtherDetailedInSection800300StatementOfCashFlowsAdditionalDisclosures

label: Items are further detailed in section [800400] Statement of changes in equity, additional disclosures
name: ItemsAreFurtherDetailedInSection800400StatementOfChangesInEquityAdditionalDisclosures

label: Items for presentation of regulatory deferral accounts [abstract]
name: ItemsForPresentationOfRegulatoryDeferralAccountsAbstract

label: Items in course of collection from other banks
name: ItemsInCourseOfCollectionFromOtherBanks
documentation: The amount of items that have been transmitted from other banks but not yet been received and processed by the entity.

label: Items in course of transmission to other banks
name: ItemsInCourseOfTransmissionToOtherBanks
documentation: The amount of items that have been transmitted to but not yet received and processed by other banks.

label: Items of contingent liabilities [axis]
name: ItemsOfContingentLiabilitiesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Items of contingent liabilities [member]
name: ItemsOfContingentLiabilitiesMember
documentation: This member stands for aggregated individual items of contingent liabilities. It also represents the standard value for the 'Items of contingent liabilities' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Joint operations [axis]
name: JointOperationsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Joint operations [member]
name: JointOperationsMember
documentation: This member stands for joint arrangements whereby the parties that have joint control of the arrangement have rights to the assets, and obligations for the liabilities, relating to the arrangement.

label: Joint ventures [axis]
name: JointVenturesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Joint ventures [member]
name: JointVenturesMember
documentation: This member stands for joint arrangements whereby the parties that have joint control of the arrangement have rights to the net assets of the arrangement.

label: Joint ventures where entity is venturer [member]
name: JointVenturesWhereEntityIsVenturerMember
documentation: This member stands for joint ventures in which the entity is a joint venturer. A venturer is a party to a joint venture and has joint control over that joint venture. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Key management personnel compensation
name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensation
documentation: The amount of compensation to key management personnel. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

label: Key management personnel compensation, other long-term employee benefits
name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationOtherLongtermBenefits
documentation: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of other long-term employee benefits. [Refer: Other long-term employee benefits; Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

label: Key management personnel compensation, post-employment benefits
name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationPostemploymentBenefits
documentation: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of post-employment benefits. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

label: Key management personnel compensation, share-based payment
name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationSharebasedPayment
documentation: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of share-based payments. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

label: Key management personnel compensation, short-term employee benefits
name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationShorttermEmployeeBenefits
documentation: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of short-term employee benefits. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

label: Key management personnel compensation, termination benefits
name: KeyManagementPersonnelCompensationTerminationBenefits
documentation: The amount of compensation to key management personnel in the form of termination benefits. [Refer: Termination benefits expense; Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

label: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]
name: KeyManagementPersonnelOfEntityOrParentMember
documentation: This member stands for those persons having authority and responsibility for planning, directing and controlling the activities of the entity, directly or indirectly, including any director (whether executive or otherwise) of that entity.

label: LTE licences [member]
name: LTELicencesMember
documentation: This member stands for Long Term Evolution licenses. [Refer: Licences and franchises]

label: Land
name: Land
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing land held by the entity for use in operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Land [member]
name: LandMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing land held by the entity for use in operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Land and buildings
name: LandAndBuildings
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing land and depreciable buildings and similar structures for use in operations. [Refer: Buildings; Land; Property, plant and equipment]

label: Land and buildings [abstract]
name: LandAndBuildingsAbstract

label: Land and buildings [member]
name: LandAndBuildingsMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing land and depreciable buildings and similar structures for use in operations. [Refer: Buildings; Land; Property, plant and equipment]

label: Later than fifteen years and not later than twenty years [member]
name: LaterThanFifteenYearsAndNotLaterThanTwentyYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than fifteen years and not later than twenty years.

label: Later than five years [member]
name: LaterThanFiveYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than five years.

label: Later than five years and not later than seven years [member]
name: LaterThanFiveYearsAndNotLaterThanSevenYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than five years and not later than seven years.

label: Later than five years and not later than ten years [member]
name: LaterThanFiveYearsAndNotLaterThanTenYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than five years and not later than ten years.

label: Later than four months [member]
name: LaterThanFourMonthsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than four months.

label: Later than four years and not later than five years [member]
name: LaterThanFourYearsAndNotLaterThanFiveYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than four years and not later than five years.

label: Later than one month and not later than six months [member]
name: LaterThanOneMonthAndNotLaterThanSixMonthsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than one month and not later than six months.

label: Later than one month and not later than three months [member]
name: LaterThanOneMonthAndNotLaterThanThreeMonthsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than one month and not later than three months.

label: Later than one month and not later than two months [member]
name: LaterThanOneMonthAndNotLaterThanTwoMonthsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than one month and not later than two months.

label: Later than one year [member]
name: LaterThanOneYearMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than one year.

label: Later than one year and not later than five years [member]
name: LaterThanOneYearAndNotLaterThanFiveYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than one year and not later than five years.

label: Later than one year and not later than three years [member]
name: LaterThanOneYearAndNotLaterThanThreeYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than one year and not later than three years.

label: Later than one year and not later than two years [member]
name: LaterThanOneYearAndNotLaterThanTwoYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than one year and not later than two years.

label: Later than seven years and not later than ten years [member]
name: LaterThanSevenYearsAndNotLaterThanTenYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than seven years and not later than ten years.

label: Later than six months [member]
name: LaterThanSixMonthsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than six months.

label: Later than six months and not later than one year [member]
name: LaterThanSixMonthsAndNotLaterThanOneYearMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than six months and not later than one year.

label: Later than ten years [member]
name: LaterThanTenYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than ten years.

label: Later than ten years and not later than fifteen years [member]
name: LaterThanTenYearsAndNotLaterThanFifteenYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than ten years and not later than fifteen years.

label: Later than three months [member]
name: LaterThanThreeMonthsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than three months.

label: Later than three months and not later than four months [member]
name: LaterThanThreeMonthsAndNotLaterThanFourMonthsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than three months and not later than four months.

label: Later than three months and not later than one year [member]
name: LaterThanThreeMonthsAndNotLaterThanOneYearMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than three months and not later than one year.

label: Later than three months and not later than six months [member]
name: LaterThanThreeMonthsAndNotLaterThanSixMonthsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than three months and not later than six months.

label: Later than three years [member]
name: LaterThanThreeYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than three years.

label: Later than three years and not later than five years [member]
name: LaterThanThreeYearsAndNotLaterThanFiveYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than three years and not later than five years.

label: Later than three years and not later than four years [member]
name: LaterThanThreeYearsAndNotLaterThanFourYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than three years and not later than four years.

label: Later than twenty years and not later than twenty-five years [member]
name: LaterThanTwentyYearsAndNotLaterThanTwentyfiveYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than twenty years and not later than twenty-five years.

label: Later than two months and not later than three months [member]
name: LaterThanTwoMonthsAndNotLaterThanThreeMonthsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than two months and not later than three months.

label: Later than two years and not later than five years [member]
name: LaterThanTwoYearsAndNotLaterThanFiveYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than two years and not later than five years.

label: Later than two years and not later than three years [member]
name: LaterThanTwoYearsAndNotLaterThanThreeYearsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of later than two years and not later than three years.

label: Lease commitments for short-term leases for which recognition exemption has been used
name: LeaseCommitmentsForShorttermLeasesForWhichRecognitionExemptionHasBeenUsed
documentation: The amount of the lease commitments for short-term leases accounted for applying paragraph 6 of IFRS 16. Short-term lease is a lease that, at the commencement date, has a lease term of 12 months or less. A lease that contains a purchase option is not a short-term lease.

label: Lease liabilities
name: LeaseLiabilities
documentation: The amount of liabilities related to the entity's leases. Lease is a contract, or part of a contract, that conveys the right to use an underlying asset for a period of time in exchange for consideration.

label: Lease liabilities [abstract]
name: LeaseLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Lease liabilities [member]
name: LeaseLiabilitiesMember
documentation: This member stands for lease liabilities. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

label: Lease receivables [member]
name: LeaseReceivablesMember
documentation: This member stands for receivables related to leases.

label: Leasehold improvements [member]
name: LeaseholdImprovementsMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing improvements to assets held under a lease agreement.

label: Leases as lessee, related party transactions
name: LeasesAsLesseeRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of leases where the entity was the lessee in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Leases as lessor, related party transactions
name: LeasesAsLessorRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of leases where the entity was the lessor in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Legal Entity Identifier
name: LEI
documentation: Legal Entity Identifier (LEI) for the reporting entity.

label: Legal form of entity
name: LegalFormOfEntity
documentation: Information about the legal structure under which the entity operates.

label: Legal proceedings contingent liability [member]
name: LegalProceedingsContingentLiabilityMember
documentation: This member stands for a contingent liability for legal proceedings. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Legal proceedings provision
name: LegalProceedingsProvision
documentation: The amount of provision for legal proceedings. [Refer: Other provisions]

label: Legal proceedings provision [abstract]
name: LegalProceedingsProvisionAbstract

label: Legal proceedings provision [member]
name: LegalProceedingsProvisionMember
documentation: This member stands for a provision for legal proceedings. [Refer: Other provisions [member]]

label: Length of life of limited life entity
name: LengthOfLifeOfLimitedLifeEntity
documentation: Information about the length of the entity's life if it is a limited life entity.

label: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]
name: Level1OfFairValueHierarchyMember
documentation: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are quoted prices (unadjusted) in active markets for identical assets or liabilities that the entity can access at the measurement date.

label: Level 2 and 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]
name: Level2And3OfFairValueHierarchyMember
documentation: This member stands for combined Level 2 and Level 3 categories of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

label: Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]
name: Level2OfFairValueHierarchyMember
documentation: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are inputs other than quoted prices included within Level 1 that are observable for the asset or liability, either directly or indirectly.

label: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]
name: Level3OfFairValueHierarchyMember
documentation: This member stands for a category of the fair value hierarchy where inputs to the valuation techniques are unobservable inputs for the asset or liability. Unobservable inputs are inputs for which market data are not available and that are developed using the best information available about the assumptions that the market participants would use when pricing the asset or liability.

label: Level of participation of entity compared with other participating entities
name: LevelOfParticipationOfEntityComparedWithOtherParticipatingEntities
documentation: The description of an indication of the level of participation of the entity in a defined benefit plan compared with other participating entities. Examples of measures that might provide such an indication include the entity's proportion of the total contributions to the plan or the entity's proportion of the total number of active members, retired members, and former members entitled to benefits, if that information is available. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Level of price index
name: LevelOfPriceIndex
documentation: The value of the level of the general price index used to restate financial statement information of an entity whose functional currency is the currency of a hyperinflationary economy.

label: Level of rounding used in financial statements
name: LevelOfRoundingUsedInFinancialStatements
documentation: Information about the level of rounding used in the presentation of amounts in the financial statements.

label: Levels of fair value hierarchy [axis]
name: LevelsOfFairValueHierarchyAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Liabilities
name: Liabilities
documentation: The amount of a present obligation of the entity to transfer an economic resource as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits.

label: Liabilities [abstract]
name: LiabilitiesAbstract

label: Liabilities [member]
name: LiabilitiesMember
documentation: This member stands for a present obligation of the entity to transfer an economic resource as a result of past events. Economic resource is a right that has the potential to produce economic benefits. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of liabilities' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Liabilities]

label: Liabilities arising from exploration for and evaluation of mineral resources
name: LiabilitiesArisingFromExplorationForAndEvaluationOfMineralResources
documentation: The amount of liabilities arising from the search for mineral resources, including minerals, oil, natural gas and similar non-regenerative resources after the entity has obtained legal rights to explore in a specific area, as well as the determination of the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting the mineral resource.

label: Liabilities arising from financing activities
name: LiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivities
documentation: The amount of liabilities for which cash flows were, or future cash flows will be, classified in the statement of cash flows as cash flows from financing activities. [Refer: Cash flows from (used in) financing activities; Liabilities]

label: Liabilities arising from financing activities [axis]
name: LiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Liabilities arising from financing activities [member]
name: LiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesMember
documentation: This member stands for liabilities arising from financing activities. It also represents the standard value for the 'Liabilities arising from financing activities' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Liabilities arising from financing activities]

label: Liabilities due to central banks
name: LiabilitiesDueToCentralBanks
documentation: The amount of liabilities due to central banks.

label: Liabilities for incurred claims [member]
name: LiabilitiesForIncurredClaimsMember
documentation: This member stands for an entity’s obligation to: (a) investigate and pay valid claims for insured events that have already occurred, including events that have occurred but for which claims have not been reported, and other incurred insurance expenses; and (b) pay amounts that are not included in (a) and that relate to: (i) insurance contract services that have already been provided; or (ii) any investment components or other amounts that are not related to the provision of insurance contract services and that are not in the liability for remaining coverage.

label: Liabilities for incurred claims that arise from contracts within scope of IFRS 17
name: LiabilitiesForIncurredClaimsThatAriseFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS17
documentation: The amount of the liabilities for incurred claims that arise from contracts within the scope of IFRS 17. [Refer: Liabilities for incurred claims [member]]

label: Liabilities from share-based payment transactions
name: LiabilitiesFromSharebasedPaymentTransactions2011
documentation: The amount of liabilities arising from share-based payment transactions. Share-based payment transactions are transactions in which the entity: (a) receives goods or services from the supplier of those goods or services (including an employee) in a share-based payment arrangement; or (b) incurs an obligation to settle the transaction with the supplier in a share-based payment arrangement when another group entity receives those goods or services. [Refer: Share-based payment arrangements [member]]

label: Liabilities in subsidiary or businesses acquired or disposed
name: LiabilitiesInSubsidiaryOrBusinessesAcquiredOrDisposed2013
documentation: The amount of liabilities in subsidiaries or other businesses over which control is obtained or lost. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale
name: LiabilitiesIncludedInDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSale
documentation: The amount of liabilities included in disposal groups classified as held for sale. [Refer: Liabilities; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]]

label: Liabilities incurred
name: LiabilitiesIncurred
documentation: The fair value, at acquisition date, of liabilities incurred (for example, a liability for contingent consideration) as consideration transferred in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

label: Liabilities measured at fair value and issued with inseparable third-party credit enhancement [axis]
name: LiabilitiesMeasuredAtFairValueAndIssuedWithInseparableThirdpartyCreditEnhancementAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Liabilities measured at fair value and issued with inseparable third-party credit enhancement [member]
name: LiabilitiesMeasuredAtFairValueAndIssuedWithInseparableThirdpartyCreditEnhancementMember
documentation: This member stands for liabilities measured at fair value and issued with inseparable third-party credit enhancement. It also represents the standard value for the 'Liabilities measured at fair value and issued with inseparable third-party credit enhancement' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Liabilities; At fair value [member]]

label: Liabilities or components of equity relating to discretionary participation features
name: LiabilitiesOrComponentsOfEquityRelatingToDiscretionaryParticipationFeatures
documentation: The amount of liabilities or components of equity relating to discretionary participation features. Discretionary participation features are contractual rights to receive, as a supplement to guaranteed benefits, additional benefits: (a) that are likely to be a significant portion of the total contractual benefits; (b) whose amount or timing is contractually at the discretion of the issuer; and (c) that are contractually based on: (i) the performance of a specified pool of contracts or a specified type of contract; (ii) realised and/or unrealised investment returns on a specified pool of assets held by the issuer; or (iii) the profit or loss of the company, fund or other entity that issues the contract.

label: Liabilities other than actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits
name: LiabilitiesOtherThanActuarialPresentValueOfPromisedRetirementBenefits
documentation: The amount of liabilities other than the actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits in retirement benefit plans. [Refer: Actuarial present value of promised retirement benefits]

label: Liabilities recognised in entity's financial statements in relation to structured entities
name: LiabilitiesRecognisedInEntitysFinancialStatementsInRelationToStructuredEntities
documentation: The amount of liabilities recognised in the entity's financial statements relating to its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Liabilities; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

label: Liabilities that arise because insurer issues or fulfils obligations arising from contracts within scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts
name: LiabilitiesThatAriseBecauseInsurerIssuesOrFulfilsObligationsArisingFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS4AndNonderivativeInvestmentContracts
documentation: The amount of liabilities that arise because an insurer issues, or fulfils obligations arising from, the contracts within the scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts.

label: Liabilities to which significant restrictions apply
name: LiabilitiesToWhichSignificantRestrictionsApply
documentation: The amount in the consolidated financial statements of the liabilities of the group to which significant restrictions (for example, statutory, contractual and regulatory restrictions) apply on the entity's ability to settle the liabilities of the group.

label: Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued
name: LiabilitiesArisingFromInsuranceContracts
documentation: The amount of liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

label: Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued [abstract]
name: LiabilitiesUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssuedAbstract

label: Liabilities with significant risk of material adjustments within next financial year
name: LiabilitiesWithSignificantRiskOfMaterialAdjustmentsWithinNextFinancialYear
documentation: The amount of liabilities subject to assumptions that have a significant risk of resulting in a material adjustment to the amounts of those liabilities within the next financial year.

label: Licence fee income
name: LicenceFeeIncome
documentation: The amount of income arising from licence fees.

label: Licences [member]
name: LicencesMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of intangible assets representing the right to use certain intangible assets owned by another entity. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Licences and franchises
name: LicencesAndFranchises
documentation: The amount of intangible assets representing the right to use certain intangible assets owned by another entity and the right to operate a business using the name, merchandise, services, methodologies, promotional support, marketing and supplies granted by another entity. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Licences and franchises [member]
name: LicencesAndFranchisesMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of intangible assets representing the right to use certain intangible assets owned by another entity and the right to operate a business using the name, merchandise, services, methodologies, promotional support, marketing and supplies granted by another entity. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Life insurance contracts [member]
name: LifeInsuranceContractsMember
documentation: This member stands for life insurance contracts. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

label: Lifetime expected credit losses [member]
name: LifetimeExpectedCreditLossesMember
documentation: This member stands for the expected credit losses that result from all possible default events over the expected life of a financial instrument. [Refer: Type of measurement of expected credit losses [member]]

label: Line items by function [member]
name: LineItemsByFunctionMember
documentation: This member stands for the standard value of the ‘Attribution of expenses by nature to their function' axis if no other member is used.

label: Line items not dimensionally qualified
name: LineItemsNotDimensionallyQualified

label: Line items not dimensionally qualified placeholder
name: LineItemsNotDimensionallyQualifiedPlaceholder

label: Liquidity risk [member]
name: LiquidityRiskMember
documentation: This member stands for the risk that an entity will encounter difficulty in meeting obligations associated with financial liabilities that are settled by delivering cash or another financial asset. [Refer: Financial assets; Financial liabilities]

label: Living animals [member]
name: LivingAnimalsMember
documentation: This member stands for living animals.

label: Loan commitments [member]
name: LoanCommitmentsMember
documentation: This member stands for firm commitments to provide credit under pre-specified terms and conditions.

label: Loans acquired in business combination [member]
name: LoansAcquiredInBusinessCombinationMember
documentation: This member stands for loans that are acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

label: Loans and advances to banks
name: LoansAndAdvancesToBanks
documentation: The amount of loans and advances the entity has made to banks.

label: Loans and advances to customers
name: LoansAndAdvancesToCustomers
documentation: The amount of loans and advances the entity has made to customers.

label: Loans and receivables
name: LoansAndReceivables
documentation: The amount of non-derivative financial assets with fixed or determinable payments that are not quoted in an active market, other than: (a) those that the entity intends to sell immediately or in the near term, which shall be classified as held for trading, and those that the entity, upon initial recognition, designates as at fair value through profit or loss; (b) those that the entity, upon initial recognition, designates as available for sale; or (c) those for which the holder may not recover substantially all of its initial investment, other than because of credit deterioration, which shall be classified as available for sale. An interest acquired in a pool of assets that are not loans or receivables (for example, an interest in a mutual fund or a similar fund) is not a loan or receivable. [Refer: Derivative financial assets]

label: Loans and receivables, category [member]
name: LoansAndReceivablesCategoryMember
documentation: This member stands for the loans and receivables category of financial assets. [Refer: Loans and receivables]

label: Loans payable in breach which permitted lender to demand accelerated repayment
name: LoansPayableInBreachWhichPermittedLenderToDemandAcceleratedRepayment
documentation: The amount of loans payable in breach of the terms that permitted the lender to demand accelerated repayment.

label: Loans payable in default
name: LoansPayableInDefault
documentation: The amount of loans payable in default.

label: Loans received
name: LoansReceived
documentation: The amount of loans received.

label: Loans to consumers
name: ConsumerLoans
documentation: The amount of consumer loans made by the entity. [Refer: Loans to consumers [member]]

label: Loans to consumers [member]
name: ConsumerLoansMember
documentation: This member stands for loans that are made to individuals for personal use.

label: Loans to corporate entities
name: CorporateLoans
documentation: The amount of corporate loans made by the entity. [Refer: Loans to corporate entities [member]]

label: Loans to corporate entities [member]
name: CorporateLoansMember
documentation: This member stands for loans made to corporate entities.

label: Loans to government
name: LoansToGovernment
documentation: The amount of loans to government made by the entity.

label: Loans to government [member]
name: LoansToGovernmentMember
documentation: This member stands for loans made to government.

label: Long-term borrowings [member]
name: LongtermBorrowingsMember
documentation: This member stands for long-term borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

label: Long-term contracts [member]
name: LongtermContractsMember
documentation: This member stands for long-term contracts with customers.

label: Long-term deposits
name: LongtermDeposits
documentation: The amount of long-term deposits held by the entity.

label: Loss component [member]
name: LossComponentMember
documentation: This member stands for the loss component of the liability for remaining coverage. An entity shall establish (or increase) a loss component of the liability for remaining coverage for an onerous group depicting the losses recognised applying paragraphs 47–48 of IFRS 17. The loss component determines the amounts that are presented in profit or loss as reversals of losses on onerous groups and are consequently excluded from the determination of insurance revenue. [Refer: Insurance contracts [member]; Net liabilities or assets for remaining coverage excluding loss component [member]]

label: Losses arising from derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost
name: LossesArisingFromDerecognitionOfFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtAmortisedCost
documentation: The loss recognised in the statement of comprehensive income arising from the derecognition of financial assets measured at amortised cost. [Refer: Financial assets at amortised cost]

label: Losses incurred in relation to interests in structured entities
name: LossesIncurredInRelationToInterestsInStructuredEntities
documentation: The amount of losses incurred by the entity relating to its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

label: Losses on change in fair value of derivatives
name: LossesOnChangeInFairValueOfDerivatives
documentation: The losses resulting from changes in the fair value of derivatives recognised in profit or loss. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

label: Losses on disposals of investment properties
name: LossesOnDisposalsOfInvestmentProperties
documentation: The losses on disposals of investment properties. [Refer: Investment property]

label: Losses on disposals of investments
name: LossesOnDisposalsOfInvestments
documentation: The losses on the disposal of investments.

label: Losses on disposals of non-current assets
name: LossesOnDisposalsOfNoncurrentAssets
documentation: The losses on disposals of non-current assets. [Refer: Non-current assets]

label: Losses on disposals of property, plant and equipment
name: LossesOnDisposalsOfPropertyPlantAndEquipment
documentation: The losses on the disposal of property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Losses on litigation settlements
name: LossesOnLitigationSettlements
documentation: The losses on settlements of litigation.

label: Machinery
name: Machinery
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing long-lived, depreciable machinery used in operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Machinery [member]
name: MachineryMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing long-lived, depreciable machinery used in operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Major business combination [member]
name: MajorBusinessCombinationMember
documentation: This member stands for major business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

label: Major components of tax expense (income) [abstract]
name: MajorComponentsOfTaxExpenseIncomeAbstract

label: Major customers [axis]
name: MajorCustomersAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Major ordinary share transactions [member]
name: MajorOrdinaryShareTransactionsMember
documentation: This member stands for major ordinary share transactions. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

label: Major purchases of assets [member]
name: MajorPurchasesOfAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for major purchases of assets.

label: Management conclusion on fair presentation as consequence of departure
name: ManagementConclusionOnFairPresentationAsConsequenceOfDeparture
documentation: The conclusion by management that the financial statements present fairly the entity's financial position, financial performance and cash flows, when the entity has departed from a requirement of an IFRS.

label: Mandatory reserve deposits at central banks
name: MandatoryReserveDepositsAtCentralBanks
documentation: The amount of reserve that is kept in deposit at a central bank to fulfil regulatory reserve requirements.

label: Market approach [member]
name: MarketApproachMember
documentation: This member stands for a valuation technique that uses prices and other relevant information generated by market transactions involving identical or comparable (ie similar) assets, liabilities or a group of assets and liabilities, such as a business.

label: Market comparable companies [member]
name: MarketComparableCompaniesMember
documentation: This member stands for a specific valuation technique consistent with the market approach that involves analysing inputs from comparable entities (for example, EBITDA multiple, revenue multiple, discount for lack of marketability, control premium) in the current market. [Refer: Market approach [member]]

label: Market comparable prices [member]
name: MarketComparablePricesMember
documentation: This member stands for a specific valuation technique consistent with the market approach that involves analysing inputs from comparable prices (for example, price per square metre) in the current market. [Refer: Market approach [member]]

label: Market risk [member]
name: MarketRiskMember
documentation: This member stands for the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market prices. Market risk comprises three types of risk: currency risk, interest rate risk and other price risk. [Refer: Currency risk [member]; Interest rate risk [member]; Other price risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Markets of customers [axis]
name: MarketsOfCustomersAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Markets of customers [member]
name: MarketsOfCustomersMember
documentation: This member stands for all markets of customers. It also represents the standard value for the 'Markets of customers' axis if no other member is used.

label: Mastheads and publishing titles
name: MastheadsAndPublishingTitles
documentation: The amount of intangible assets representing rights acquired through registration to use mastheads and publishing titles. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Mastheads and publishing titles [member]
name: MastheadsAndPublishingTitlesMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of intangible assets representing rights acquired through registration to use mastheads and publishing titles. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Material income and expense [abstract]
name: MaterialIncomeAndExpenseAbstract

label: Material reconciling items [member]
name: MaterialReconcilingItemsMember
documentation: This member stands for material adjustments used to reconcile items in the entity's financial statements.

label: Matrix pricing [member]
name: MatrixPricingMember
documentation: This member stands for a specific mathematical valuation technique that is consistent with the market approach that is used principally to value some types of financial instruments, such as debt instruments, without relying exclusively on quoted prices for the specific securities, but rather relying on the securities' relationship to other benchmark quoted securities. [Refer: Market approach [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Mature biological assets [member]
name: MatureBiologicalAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for mature biological assets. Mature biological assets are those that have attained harvestable specifications (for consumable biological assets) or are able to sustain regular harvests (for bearer biological assets). [Refer: Biological assets]

label: Maturity [axis]
name: MaturityAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Maximum exposure to credit risk
name: MaximumExposureToCreditRisk
documentation: The amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk without taking into account any collateral held or other credit enhancements (for example, netting agreements that do not qualify for offset in accordance with IAS 32). [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

label: Maximum exposure to credit risk of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss
name: MaximumExposureToCreditRiskOfFinancialAssets
documentation: The maximum exposure to the credit risk of financial assets designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss. [Refer: Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk]

label: Maximum exposure to credit risk of loans or receivables
name: MaximumExposureToCreditRiskOfLoansOrReceivables
documentation: The maximum exposure to the credit risk of loans or receivables. [Refer: Loans and receivables; Credit risk [member]; Maximum exposure to credit risk]

label: Maximum exposure to credit risk that arises from contracts within scope of IFRS 17
name: MaximumExposureToCreditRiskThatArisesFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS17
documentation: The amount that best represents the maximum exposure at the end of the reporting period to credit risk that arises from contracts within the scope of IFRS 17. [Refer: Credit risk [member]]

label: Maximum exposure to credit risk, financial instruments to which impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are not applied
name: MaximumExposureToCreditRiskFinancialInstrumentsToWhichImpairmentRequirementsInIFRS9AreNotApplied
documentation: The amount that best represents the maximum exposure to credit risk in relation to financial instruments to which impairment requirements in IFRS 9 are not applied. [Refer: Maximum exposure to credit risk]

label: Maximum exposure to loss from continuing involvement
name: MaximumExposureToLossFromContinuingInvolvement
documentation: The amount that best represents the entity's maximum exposure to loss from its continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets.

label: Maximum exposure to loss from interests in structured entities
name: MaximumExposureToLossFromInterestsInStructuredEntities
documentation: The amount that best represents the entity's maximum exposure to loss from its interests in structured entities. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

label: Maximum limit of losses of structured entities which entity is required to absorb before other parties
name: MaximumLimitOfLossesOfStructuredEntitiesWhichEntityIsRequiredToAbsorbBeforeOtherParties
documentation: The maximum limit of losses of structured entities that the entity is required to absorb before other parties. [Refer: Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

label: Measurement [axis]
name: MeasurementAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Measurement bases, property, plant and equipment
name: MeasurementBasesPropertyPlantAndEquipment
documentation: The measurement bases used for determining the gross carrying amount for a class of property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Gross carrying amount [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

label: Measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration
name: MeasurementPeriodAdjustmentsRecognisedForParticularAssetsLiabilitiesNoncontrollingInterestsOrItemsOfConsideration
documentation: The amount of measurement period adjustments recognised for particular assets, liabilities, non-controlling interests or items of consideration if the initial accounting for a business combination is incomplete. The measurement period is the period after the acquisition date during which the acquirer may adjust the provisional amounts recognised for a business combination. [Refer: Non-controlling interests; Business combinations [member]]

label: Media production expense
name: MediaProductionExpense
documentation: The amount of expense arising from media production.

label: Merger reserve
name: MergerReserve
documentation: A component of equity that may result in relation to a business combination outside the scope of IFRS 3.

label: Merger reserve [member]
name: MergerReserveMember
documentation: This member stands for a component of equity that may result in relation to a business combination outside the scope of IFRS 3.

label: Method of assessment of expected credit losses [axis]
name: MethodOfAssessmentOfExpectedCreditLossesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Method of assessment of expected credit losses [member]
name: MethodOfAssessmentOfExpectedCreditLossesMember
documentation: This member stands for all methods of assessment of expected credit losses. Expected credit losses are the weighted average of credit losses with the respective risks of a default occurring as the weights. This member also represents the standard value for the 'Method of assessment of expected credit losses' axis if no other member is used.

label: Method used to account for investments in associates
name: MethodUsedToAccountForInvestmentsInAssociates
documentation: The description of the method used to account for investments in associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

label: Method used to account for investments in joint ventures
name: MethodUsedToAccountForInvestmentsInJointVentures
documentation: The description of the method used to account for investments in joint ventures. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Method used to account for investments in subsidiaries
name: MethodUsedToAccountForInvestmentsInSubsidiaries
documentation: The description of the method used to account for investments in subsidiaries. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Method used to determine settlement amount for pre-existing relationship for transaction recognised separately from acquisition of assets and assumption of liabilities in business combination
name: MethodUsedToDetermineSettlementAmountForPreexistingRelationshipForTransactionRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombination
documentation: The description of the method used to determine the settlement amount for pre-existing relationships for transactions recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and the assumption of liabilities in business combinations. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

label: Methods of generation [axis]
name: MethodsOfGenerationAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Methods of generation [member]
name: MethodsOfGenerationMember
documentation: This member stands for all methods of generation. It also represents the standard value for the 'Methods of generation' axis if no other member is used.

label: Methods used to measure contracts within scope of IFRS 17 [axis]
name: MethodsUsedToMeasureContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS17Axis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Methods used to measure contracts within scope of IFRS 17 [member]
name: MethodsUsedToMeasureContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS17Member
documentation: This member stands for the methods used to measure contracts within the scope of IFRS 17. It also represents the standard value for the 'Methods used to measure contracts within scope of IFRS 17' axis if no other member is used.

label: Methods used to measure risk
name: MethodsUsedToMeasureRisk
documentation: The description of the methods used to measure risks arising from financial instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Mining assets
name: MiningAssets
documentation: The amount of assets related to mining activities of the entity.

label: Mining assets [member]
name: MiningAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for mining assets. [Refer: Mining assets]

label: Mining property [member]
name: MiningPropertyMember
documentation: This member stands for property related to mining activities.

label: Mining rights [member]
name: MiningRightsMember
documentation: This member stands for rights related to mining activities.

label: Miscellaneous assets [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousAssetsAbstract

label: Miscellaneous components of equity [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousComponentsOfEquityAbstract

label: Miscellaneous current assets [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousCurrentAssetsAbstract

label: Miscellaneous current liabilities [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousCurrentLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Miscellaneous equity [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousEquityAbstract

label: Miscellaneous liabilities [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Miscellaneous non-current assets [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousNoncurrentAssetsAbstract

label: Miscellaneous non-current liabilities [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousNoncurrentLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Miscellaneous other comprehensive income [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousOtherComprehensiveIncomeAbstract

label: Miscellaneous other operating expense
name: MiscellaneousOtherOperatingExpense
documentation: The amount of miscellaneous other operating expenses. [Refer: Other operating income (expense)]

label: Miscellaneous other operating income
name: MiscellaneousOtherOperatingIncome
documentation: The amount of miscellaneous other operating income. [Refer: Other operating income (expense)]

label: Miscellaneous other provisions
name: MiscellaneousOtherProvisions
documentation: The amount of miscellaneous other provisions. [Refer: Other provisions]

label: Miscellaneous other provisions [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousOtherProvisionsAbstract

label: Miscellaneous other provisions [member]
name: MiscellaneousOtherProvisionsMember
documentation: This member stands for miscellaneous other provisions. [Refer: Other provisions [member]]

label: Miscellaneous other reserves [member]
name: MiscellaneousOtherReservesMember
documentation: This member stands for a component of equity representing miscellaneous reserves that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other reserves [member]]

label: Miscellaneous time bands [abstract]
name: MiscellaneousTimeBandsAbstract

label: Mortgages [member]
name: MortgagesMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of financial assets that represents loans to finance the purchase of assets where the asset acts as collateral to secure the loan.

label: Motor vehicles
name: MotorVehicles
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing self-propelled ground vehicles used in the entity's operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Motor vehicles [member]
name: MotorVehiclesMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing self-propelled ground vehicles used in the entity's operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Multi-employer defined benefit plans [member]
name: MultiemployerDefinedBenefitPlansMember
documentation: This member stands for defined benefit plans (other than state plans) that: (a) pool the assets contributed by various entities that are not under common control; and (b) use those assets to provide benefits to employees of more than one entity, on the basis that contribution and benefit levels are determined without regard to the identity of the entity that employs the employees. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Multi-period excess earnings method [member]
name: MultiperiodExcessEarningsMethodMember
documentation: This member stands for a specific valuation technique consistent with the income approach that involves analysing the excess earnings over periods of time, and is used to measure the fair value of some intangible assets. [Refer: Income approach [member]]

label: Name of acquiree
name: NameOfAcquiree
documentation: The name of the business or businesses that the acquirer obtains control of in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

label: Name of associate
name: NameOfAssociate
documentation: The name of an associate. [Refer: Associates [member]]

label: Name of entity whose consolidated financial statements have been produced for public use
name: NameOfEntityWhoseConsolidatedFinancialStatementsHaveBeenProducedForPublicUse
documentation: The name of the entity's ultimate or any intermediate parent whose consolidated financial statements that comply with IFRSs have been produced for public use. [Refer: Consolidated [member]; IFRSs [member]]

label: Name of government and nature of relationship with government
name: NameOfGovernmentAndNatureOfRelationshipWithGovernment
documentation: The name of the government and the nature of its relationship with the reporting entity (ie control, joint control or significant influence). [Refer: Government [member]]

label: Name of joint operation
name: NameOfJointOperation
documentation: The name of a joint operation. [Refer: Joint operations [member]]

label: Name of joint venture
name: NameOfJointVenture
documentation: The name of a joint venture. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Name of most senior parent entity producing publicly available financial statements
name: NameOfMostSeniorParentEntityProducingPubliclyAvailableFinancialStatements
documentation: The name of most senior parent entity producing publicly available financial statements.

label: Name of parent entity
name: NameOfParentEntity
documentation: The name of the entity's parent. [Refer: Parent [member]]

label: Name of reporting entity or other means of identification
name: NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification
documentation: The name of the reporting entity or other means of identification.

label: Name of subsidiary
name: NameOfSubsidiary
documentation: The name of a subsidiary. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Name of ultimate parent of group
name: NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup
documentation: The name of the ultimate controlling party of the group.

label: Names of employers and employee groups covered
name: NamesOfEmployersAndEmployeeGroupsCovered
documentation: The names of employers and employee groups covered in retirement benefit plans.

label: Net amount arising from insurance contracts [member]
name: NetAmountArisingFromInsuranceContractsMember
documentation: This member stands for the net amount arising from insurance contracts. It also represents the standard value for the 'Amounts arising from insurance contracts' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

label: Net amounts for pay-floating (receive-fixed) interest rate swaps for which net cash flows are exchanged
name: NetAmountsForPayfloatingReceivefixedInterestRateSwapsForWhichNetCashFlowsAreExchanged
documentation: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to net amounts for pay-floating (receive-fixed) interest rate swaps for which net cash flows are exchanged. [Refer: Swap contract [member]]

label: Net asset value [member]
name: NetAssetValueMember
documentation: This member stands for a valuation technique that compares the value of assets and liabilities.

label: Net assets (liabilities) [abstract]
name: NetAssetsLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Net current assets (liabilities) [abstract]
name: NetCurrentAssetsLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Net debt
name: NetDebt
documentation: The amount of net debt of the entity.

label: Net deferred tax assets
name: NetDeferredTaxAssets
documentation: The amount of deferred tax assets net of deferred tax liabilities, when the absolute amount of deferred tax assets is greater than the absolute amount of deferred tax liabilities. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax liabilities]

label: Net deferred tax assets and liabilities [abstract]
name: NetDeferredTaxAssetsAndLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Net deferred tax liabilities
name: NetDeferredTaxLiabilities
documentation: The amount of deferred tax liabilities net of deferred tax assets, when the absolute amount of deferred tax liabilities is greater than the absolute amount of deferred tax assets. [Refer: Deferred tax assets; Deferred tax liabilities]

label: Net defined benefit asset
name: RecognisedAssetsDefinedBenefitPlan
documentation: The amount of surplus in a defined benefit plan, adjusted for any effect of limiting a net defined benefit asset to the asset ceiling. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Net defined benefit liability
name: RecognisedLiabilitiesDefinedBenefitPlan
documentation: The amount of deficit in a defined benefit plan. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Net defined benefit liability (asset)
name: LiabilityAssetOfDefinedBenefitPlans
documentation: The amount of deficit or surplus in a defined benefit plan, adjusted for any effect of limiting a net defined benefit asset to the asset ceiling. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Net defined benefit liability (asset) [axis]
name: NetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAssetAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Net defined benefit liability (asset) [member]
name: NetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAssetMember
