documentation: This member stands for the net defined benefit liability (asset). It also represents the standard value for the 'Net defined benefit liability (asset)' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Net defined benefit liability (asset)]

label: Net earned premium
name: NetEarnedPremium
documentation: The amount of premiums earned on insurance contracts net of reinsurance premiums. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

label: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements
name: NetFinancialAssetsSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreements
documentation: The amount remaining after deducting the amounts subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement that were not set off against financial assets, from the net amount of financial assets subject to offsetting or subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement presented in the statement of financial position.

label: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements [abstract]
name: NetFinancialAssetsSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreementsAbstract

label: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements in statement of financial position
name: NetFinancialAssetsSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreementsInStatementOfFinancialPosition
documentation: The net amount of financial assets that are subject either to offsetting or to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement, presented in the statement of financial position. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Net financial assets subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements in statement of financial position [abstract]
name: NetFinancialAssetsSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreementsInStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract

label: Net financial liabilities subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements
name: NetFinancialLiabilitiesSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreements
documentation: The amount remaining after deducting the amounts subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement that were not set off against financial liabilities, from the net amount of financial liabilities subject to offsetting or subject to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement presented in the statement of financial position.

label: Net financial liabilities subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements [abstract]
name: NetFinancialLiabilitiesSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreementsAbstract

label: Net financial liabilities subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements in statement of financial position
name: NetFinancialLiabilitiesSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreementsInStatementOfFinancialPosition
documentation: The net amount of financial liabilities that are subject either to offsetting or to an enforceable master netting arrangement or similar agreement, presented in the statement of financial position. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

label: Net financial liabilities subject to offsetting, enforceable master netting arrangements or similar agreements in statement of financial position [abstract]
name: NetFinancialLiabilitiesSubjectToOffsettingEnforceableMasterNettingArrangementsOrSimilarAgreementsInStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract

label: Net foreign exchange gain
name: NetForeignExchangeGain
documentation: The net gain arising from exchange differences recognised in profit or loss, excluding those arising on financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9. [Refer: Foreign exchange gain (loss)]

label: Net foreign exchange loss
name: NetForeignExchangeLoss
documentation: The net loss arising from exchange differences recognised in profit or loss, excluding those arising on financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with IFRS 9. [Refer: Foreign exchange gain (loss)]

label: Net investment in finance lease
name: NetInvestmentInFinanceLease
documentation: The gross investment in the finance lease discounted at the interest rate implicit in the lease. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset. Gross investment in the finance lease is the sum of: (a) the lease payments receivable by a lessor under a finance lease; and (b) any unguaranteed residual value accruing to the lessor. Interest rate implicit in the lease is the rate of interest that causes the present value of (a) the lease payments and (b) the unguaranteed residual value to equal to the sum of (i) the fair value of the underlying asset and (ii) the initial direct costs of the lessor.

label: Net liabilities or assets for remaining coverage excluding loss component [member]
name: NetLiabilitiesOrAssetsForRemainingCoverageExcludingLossComponentMember
documentation: This member stands for the net liabilities or assets for the remaining coverage component, excluding any loss component. A liability for remaining coverage is an entity’s obligation to: (a) investigate and pay valid claims under existing insurance contracts for insured events that have not yet occurred (ie the obligation that relates to the unexpired portion of the insurance coverage); and (b) pay amounts under existing insurance contracts that are not included in (a) and that relate to: (i) insurance contract services not yet provided (ie the obligations that relate to future provision of insurance contract services); or (ii) any investment components or other amounts that are not related to the provision of insurance contract services and that have not been transferred to the liability for incurred claims. [Refer: Insurance contracts [member]; Loss component [member]]

label: Net movement in deferred tax arising from regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss
name: NetMovementInDeferredTaxArisingFromRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of the net movement in deferred tax arising from regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss. [Refer: Deferred tax asset associated with regulatory deferral account balances; Deferred tax liability associated with regulatory deferral account balances; Profit (loss)]

label: Net movement in other regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss

documentation: The amount of non-current retention payables. [Refer: Retention payables]

label: Non-current trade payables
name: NoncurrentPayablesToTradeSuppliers
documentation: The non-current amount of payment due to suppliers for goods and services used in the entity's business. [Refer: Trade payables]

label: Non-current trade receivables
name: NoncurrentTradeReceivables
documentation: The amount of non-current trade receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables]

label: Non-current value added tax payables
name: NoncurrentValueAddedTaxPayables
documentation: The amount of non-current value added tax payables. [Refer: Value added tax payables]

label: Non-current value added tax receivables
name: NoncurrentValueAddedTaxReceivables
documentation: The amount of non-current value added tax receivables. [Refer: Value added tax receivables]

label: Non-current warrant liability
name: NoncurrentWarrantLiability
documentation: The amount of non-current warrant liabilities. [Refer: Warrant liability]

label: Non-current warranty provision
name: LongtermWarrantyProvision
documentation: The amount of non-current provision for warranties. [Refer: Warranty provision]

label: Non-derivative financial liabilities, undiscounted cash flows
name: NonderivativeFinancialLiabilitiesUndiscountedCashFlows
documentation: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to non-derivative financial liabilities.

label: Non-derivative investment contract liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss applying IAS 39
name: NonderivativeInvestmentContractLiabilitiesMeasuredAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossApplyingIAS39
documentation: The amount of non-derivative investment contract liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss applying IAS 39. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

label: Non-government customers [member]
name: NongovernmentCustomersMember
documentation: This member stands for non-government customers. [Refer: Government [member]]

label: Non-insurance assets acquired by exercising rights to recoveries
name: NoninsuranceAssetsAcquiredByExercisingRightsToRecoveries
documentation: The amount of non-insurance assets acquired by exercising rights to recoveries.

label: Non-life insurance contracts [member]
name: NonlifeInsuranceContractsMember
documentation: This member stands for non-life insurance contracts. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

label: Non-recurring fair value measurement [member]
name: NonrecurringFairValueMeasurementMember
documentation: This member stands for fair value measurements which other IFRSs require or permit in the statement of financial position in particular circumstances. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

label: Non-subscription circulation revenue
name: NonsubscriptionCirculationRevenue
documentation: The amount of circulation revenue that is not derived from subscriptions. [Refer: Revenue; Circulation revenue]

label: Not internally generated [member]
name: NotInternallyGeneratedMember
documentation: This member stands for items that have not been internally generated by the entity.

label: Not later than one month [member]
name: NotLaterThanOneMonthMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of not later than one month.

label: Not later than one year [member]
name: NotLaterThanOneYearMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of not later than one year.

label: Not later than three months [member]
name: NotLaterThanThreeMonthsMember
documentation: This member stands for a time band of not later than three months.

label: Not measured at fair value in statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed [member]
name: NotMeasuredAtFairValueInStatementOfFinancialPositionButForWhichFairValueIsDisclosedMember
documentation: This member stands for items not measured at fair value in the statement of financial position but for which fair value is disclosed. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Notes and debentures issued
name: NotesAndDebenturesIssued
documentation: The amount of notes and debentures issued by the entity.

label: Notes, accounting policies and mandatory core taxonomy elements placeholder – this item MUST be used as a starting point for markups of disclosures in the notes to the financial statements
name: NotesAccountingPoliciesAndMandatoryTags

label: Notional amount
name: NotionalAmount
documentation: The nominal or face amount of a financial instrument, used to calculate payments made on that instrument.

label: Number and average number of employees [abstract]
name: NumberAndAverageNumberOfEmployeesAbstract

label: Number of employees
name: NumberOfEmployees
documentation: The number of personnel employed by the entity at a date.

label: Number of instruments granted in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfInstrumentsGrantedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of instruments granted in share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of instruments or interests issued or issuable
name: NumberOfInstrumentsOrInterestsIssuedOrIssuable
documentation: The number of instruments or interests issued or issuable at acquisition date for equity interests of the acquirer transferred as consideration in a business combination.

label: Number of living animals
name: NumberOfLivingAnimals
documentation: The number of entity's living animals.

label: Number of other equity instruments exercisable in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfOtherEquityInstrumentsExercisableInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) exercisable in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of other equity instruments exercised or vested in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfOtherEquityInstrumentsExercisedOrVestedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) exercised or vested in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of other equity instruments expired in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfOtherEquityInstrumentsExpiredInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) expired in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of other equity instruments forfeited in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfOtherEquityInstrumentsForfeitedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) forfeited in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of other equity instruments granted in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfInstrumentsOtherEquityInstrumentsGranted
documentation: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) granted in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of other equity instruments outstanding in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfOtherEquityInstrumentsOutstandingInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of other equity instruments (ie other than share options) outstanding in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of other participants of retirement benefit plan
name: NumberOfOtherParticipantsOfRetirementBenefitPlan
documentation: The number of other participants in a retirement benefit plan.

label: Number of participants of retirement benefit plan receiving benefits
name: NumberOfParticipantsOfRetirementBenefitPlanReceivingBenefits
documentation: The number of participants in a retirement benefit plan receiving benefits.

label: Number of share options exercisable in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfShareOptionsExercisableInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of share options exercisable in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of share options exercised in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfShareOptionsExercisedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of share options exercised in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of share options expired in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfShareOptionsExpiredInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of share options expired in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of share options forfeited in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfShareOptionsForfeitedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of share options forfeited in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of share options granted in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfShareOptionsGrantedInSharebasedPaymentArrangement
documentation: The number of share options granted in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of share options outstanding in share-based payment arrangement
name: NumberOfOutstandingShareOptions
documentation: The number of share options outstanding in a share-based payment arrangement.

label: Number of shares authorised
name: NumberOfSharesAuthorised
documentation: The number of shares authorised.

label: Number of shares in entity held by entity or by its subsidiaries or associates
name: SharesInEntityHeldByEntityOrByItsSubsidiariesOrAssociates
documentation: The number of shares in the entity held by the entity or by its subsidiaries or associates. [Refer: Associates [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Number of shares issued
name: NumberOfSharesIssued
documentation: The number of shares issued by the entity.

label: Number of shares issued [abstract]
name: NumberOfSharesIssuedAbstract

label: Number of shares issued and fully paid
name: NumberOfSharesIssuedAndFullyPaid
documentation: The number of shares issued by the entity, for which full payment has been received.

label: Number of shares issued but not fully paid
name: NumberOfSharesIssuedButNotFullyPaid
documentation: The number of shares issued by the entity, for which full payment has not been received.

label: Number of shares outstanding
name: NumberOfSharesOutstanding
documentation: The number of shares that have been authorised and issued, reduced by treasury shares held. [Refer: Treasury shares]

label: Number of shares represented by one depositary receipt
name: NumberOfSharesRepresentedByOneDepositaryReceipt
documentation: The number of shares represented by one depositary receipt.

label: Number of shares reserved for issue under options and contracts for sale of shares
name: SharesReservedForIssueUnderOptionsAndContractsForSaleOfShares
documentation: The number of shares reserved for issue under options and contracts for the sale of shares.

label: Occupancy expense
name: OccupancyExpense
documentation: The amount of expense arising from occupancy services received by the entity.

label: Office equipment
name: OfficeEquipment
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing equipment used to support office functions, not specifically used in the production process. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Office equipment [member]
name: OfficeEquipmentMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing equipment used to support office functions, not specifically used in the production process. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Oil and gas assets
name: OilAndGasAssets
documentation: The amount of assets related to the exploration, evaluation, development or production of oil and gas.

label: Oil and gas assets [member]
name: OilAndGasAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for oil and gas assets. [Refer: Oil and gas assets]

label: On demand [member]
name: OnDemandMember
documentation: This member stands for an on demand time band.

label: One year before reporting year [member]
name: OneYearBeforeReportingYearMember
documentation: This member stands for a year that ended one year before the end of the reporting year.

label: Onerous Contracts-Cost of Fulfilling Contract [member]
name: OnerousContractsCostOfFulfillingContractMember
documentation: This member stands for Onerous Contracts-Cost of Fulfilling a Contract (Amendments to IAS 37) issued in May 2020.

label: Onerous contracts contingent liability [member]
name: OnerousContractsContingentLiabilityMember
documentation: This member stands for a contingent liability for onerous contracts. An onerous contract is a contract in which the unavoidable costs of meeting the obligation under the contract exceed the economic benefits expected to be received under it. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Onerous contracts provision
name: OnerousContractsProvision
documentation: The amount of provision for onerous contracts. An onerous contract is a contract in which the unavoidable costs of meeting the obligation under the contract exceed the economic benefits expected to be received under it. [Refer: Other provisions]

label: Onerous contracts provision [abstract]
name: OnerousContractsProvisionAbstract

label: Onerous contracts provision [member]
name: OnerousContractsProvisionMember
documentation: This member stands for a provision for onerous contracts. [Refer: Onerous contracts provision]

label: Opening balance after adjustment, cumulative effect at date of initial application [member]
name: OpeningBalanceAfterAdjustmentCumulativeEffectAtDateOfInitialApplicationMember
documentation: This member indicates the opening balance after the cumulative effect adjustment in the financial statements at the date of initial application of a new or amended IFRS Standard.

label: Opening balance before adjustment, cumulative effect at date of initial application [member]
name: OpeningBalanceBeforeAdjustmentCumulativeEffectAtDateOfInitialApplicationMember
documentation: This member indicates the opening balance before the cumulative effect adjustment in the financial statements at the date of initial application of a new or amended IFRS Standard. It also represents the standard value for the ‘Cumulative effect at date of initial application’ axis if no other member is used.

label: Operating expense
name: OperatingExpense
documentation: The amount of all operating expenses.

label: Operating expense excluding cost of sales
name: OperatingExpenseExcludingCostOfSales
documentation: The amount of operating expense excluding the cost of sales. [Refer: Cost of sales]

label: Operating lease income
name: OperatingLeaseIncome
documentation: The amount of operating lease income. Operating lease is a lease that does not transfer substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

label: Operating segments [member]
name: OperatingSegmentsMember
documentation: This member stands for operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an entity: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same entity); (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the entity’s chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance; and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. [Refer: Revenue]

label: Option contract [member]
name: OptionContractMember
documentation: This member stands for a derivative financial instrument that gives the holder the right, but not the obligation, to purchase or sell an underlying asset for a specified price determined in advance. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

label: Option life, share options granted
name: DescriptionOfOptionLifeShareOptionsGranted
documentation: The option life of share options granted.

label: Option pricing model [member]
name: OptionPricingModelMember
documentation: This member stands for a specific valuation technique consistent with the income approach that involves analysing future amounts with option pricing models, such as the Black-Scholes-Merton formula or a binominal model (ie a lattice model), that incorporate present value techniques and reflect both the time value and intrinsic value of an option. [Refer: Income approach [member]]

label: Ordinary shares [member]
name: OrdinarySharesMember
documentation: This member stands for equity instruments that are subordinate to all other classes of equity instruments. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of ordinary shares' axis if no other member is used.

label: Original assets before transfer
name: OriginalAssetsBeforeTransfer
documentation: The amount of the original assets before transfer for transferred assets that the entity continues to recognise to the extent of its continuing involvement.

label: Other adjustments for non-cash items
name: OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItems
documentation: Adjustments for non-cash items to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Other adjustments for which cash effects are investing or financing cash flow
name: OtherAdjustmentsForWhichCashEffectsAreInvestingOrFinancingCashFlow
documentation: Adjustments to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities for which cash effects are investing or financing cash flow, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Other adjustments to reconcile profit (loss)
name: OtherAdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLoss
documentation: Adjustments to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Adjustments to reconcile profit (loss)]

label: Other amounts payable to transferee in respect of transferred assets
name: AmountsPayableToTransfereeInRespectOfTransferredAssets
documentation: The amounts payable to the transferee in respect of transferred financial assets other than the undiscounted cash outflows that would or may be required to repurchase derecognised financial assets (for example, the strike price in an option agreement). [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Other assets
name: OtherAssets
documentation: The amount of assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other assets [member]
name: OtherAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other assets used by entity included in fair value of plan assets
name: DescriptionOfAmountsOfOtherAssetsUsedByEntityIncludedInFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The fair value of other assets used by the entity that are included in the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Other assets, amount contributed to fair value of plan assets
name: OtherAssetsAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The amount other types of assets not separately disclosed contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Other assets, percentage contributed to fair value of plan assets
name: OtherAssetsPercentageContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The percentage other types of assets not separately disclosed contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]] [Contrast: Other assets, amount contributed to fair value of plan assets]

label: Other banking arrangements, classified as cash equivalents
name: BankingArrangementsClassifiedAsCashEquivalents
documentation: A classification of cash equivalents representing banking arrangements that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Cash equivalents]

label: Other borrowings
name: OtherBorrowings
documentation: The amount of borrowings that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Borrowings]

label: Other cash and cash equivalents
name: OtherCashAndCashEquivalents
documentation: The amount of cash and cash equivalents that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

label: Other cash payments from operating activities
name: OtherCashPaymentsFromOperatingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow for operating activities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other cash payments to acquire equity or debt instruments of other entities, classified as investing activities
name: OtherCashPaymentsToAcquireEquityOrDebtInstrumentsOfOtherEntitiesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow to acquire equity or debt instruments of other entities (other than payments for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents or those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities.

label: Other cash payments to acquire interests in joint ventures, classified as investing activities
name: OtherCashPaymentsToAcquireInterestsInJointVenturesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow to acquire interests in joint ventures (other than payments for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents or those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Other cash receipts from operating activities
name: OtherCashReceiptsFromOperatingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from operating activities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other cash receipts from sales of equity or debt instruments of other entities, classified as investing activities
name: OtherCashReceiptsFromSalesOfEquityOrDebtInstrumentsOfOtherEntitiesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of equity or debt instruments of other entities (other than receipts for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents and those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities.

label: Other cash receipts from sales of interests in joint ventures, classified as investing activities
name: OtherCashReceiptsFromSalesOfInterestsInJointVenturesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of interests in joint ventures (other than receipts for those instruments considered to be cash equivalents and those held for dealing or trading purposes), classified as investing activities. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Other components of deferred tax expense (income)
name: OtherComponentsOfDeferredTaxExpenseIncome
documentation: The amount of components of deferred tax expense or income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Deferred tax expense (income)]

label: Other comprehensive income
name: OtherComprehensiveIncome
documentation: The amount of income and expense (including reclassification adjustments) that is not recognised in profit or loss as required or permitted by IFRSs. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

label: Other comprehensive income [abstract]
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAbstract

label: Other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, attributable to non-controlling interests
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Non-controlling interests; Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, attributable to owners of parent
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income attributable to owners of the parent.

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTax
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, application of overlay approach
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxApplicationOfOverlayApproach
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to the application of the overlay approach. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, application of overlay approach [abstract]
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxApplicationOfOverlayApproachAbstract

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, available-for-sale financial assets
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, cash flow hedges
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxCashFlowHedges
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]; Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxChangeInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangeInCreditRiskOfLiability
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to change in the fair value of financial liability attributable to change in the credit risk of the liability. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax; Credit risk [member]]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, change in value of foreign currency basis spreads
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreads
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, change in value of forward elements of forward contracts
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContracts
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, change in value of time value of options
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptions
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of time value of options. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, exchange differences on translation of foreign operations
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to exchange differences on translation of financial statements of foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, exchange differences on translation of foreign operations and hedges of net investments in foreign operations
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOfForeignOperationsAndHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, that is the aggregate of exchange differences on translation of financial statements of foreign operations and hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, exchange differences on translation of foreign operations and hedges of net investments in foreign operations [abstract]
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOfForeignOperationsAndHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperationsAbstract

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, exchange differences on translation, other than translation of foreign operations
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOtherThanTranslationOfForeignOperations
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to exchange differences on translation of the financial statements of a parent company or a stand-alone entity to a different presentation currency. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, finance income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held excluded from profit or loss
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxFinanceIncomeExpensesFromReinsuranceContractsHeldExcludedFromProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to finance income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 4.1.2A of IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, gains (losses) from investments in equity instruments
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, gains (losses) on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnHedgingInstrumentsThatHedgeInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans, which comprise actuarial gains and losses; the return on plan assets, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset); and any change in the effect of the asset ceiling, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset). [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Defined benefit plans [member]; Plan assets [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset)] [Contrast: Decrease (increase) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from gain (loss) on remeasurement in other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans [abstract]
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlansAbstract

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, gains (losses) on revaluation of property, plant and equipment, right-of-use assets and intangible assets
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxGainsLossesOnRevaluation
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to gains (losses) in relation to changes in the revaluation surplus of property, plant and equipment, right-of-use assets and intangible assets. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax; Revaluation surplus]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, hedges of net investments in foreign operations
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued excluded from profit or loss that will be reclassified to profit or loss
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that will be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Insurance contracts issued [member]]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued excluded from profit or loss that will not be reclassified to profit or loss
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that will not be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Insurance contracts issued [member]]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to items that will be reclassified to profit or loss
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToItemsThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances that is related to items that will be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]; Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to items that will be reclassified to profit or loss [abstract]
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToItemsThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossAbstract

label: Other comprehensive income, before tax, net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to items that will not be reclassified to profit or loss
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTaxNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToItemsThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, before tax, related to the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances that is related to items that will not be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]; Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, application of overlay approach
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxApplicationOfOverlayApproach
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to the application of the overlay approach. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, application of overlay approach [abstract]
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxApplicationOfOverlayApproachAbstract

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, available-for-sale financial assets
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale; Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, cash flow hedges
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxCashFlowHedges
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to cash flow hedges. [Refer: Cash flow hedges [member]; Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in fair value of financial liability attributable to change in credit risk of liability
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInFairValueOfFinancialLiabilityAttributableToChangeInCreditRiskOfLiability
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to changes in the fair value of financial liabilities attributable to the changes in the credit risk of those liabilities. [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Credit risk [member]; Financial liabilities]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of foreign currency basis spreads
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreads
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge time-period related hedged items
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreadsThatHedgeTimeperiodRelatedHedgedItems
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge time-period related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge transaction related hedged items
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForeignCurrencyBasisSpreadsThatHedgeTransactionRelatedHedgedItems
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of foreign currency basis spreads that hedge transaction related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of forward elements of forward contracts
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContracts
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge time-period related hedged items
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContractsThatHedgeTimeperiodRelatedHedgedItems
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge time-period related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge transaction related hedged items
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfForwardElementsOfForwardContractsThatHedgeTransactionRelatedHedgedItems
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of forward elements of forward contracts that hedge transaction related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of time value of options
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptions
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to change in value of time value of options. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of time value of options that hedge time-period related hedged items
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptionsThatHedgeTimeperiodRelatedHedgedItems
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of time value of options that hedge time-period related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, change in value of time value of options that hedge transaction related hedged items
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxChangeInValueOfTimeValueOfOptionsThatHedgeTransactionRelatedHedgedItems
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to change in value of time value of options that hedge transaction related hedged items. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, exchange differences on translation of foreign operations
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to exchange differences when financial statements of foreign operations are translated. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, exchange differences on translation of foreign operations and hedges of net investments in foreign operations
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOfForeignOperationsAndHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, that is the aggregate of exchange differences on translation of financial statements of foreign operations and hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, exchange differences on translation of foreign operations and hedges of net investments in foreign operations [abstract]
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOfForeignOperationsAndHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperationsAbstract

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, exchange differences on translation, other than translation of foreign operations
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxExchangeDifferencesOnTranslationOtherThanTranslationOfForeignOperations
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to exchange differences on translation of the financial statements of a parent company or a stand-alone entity to a different presentation currency. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, finance income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held excluded from profit or loss
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxFinanceIncomeExpensesFromReinsuranceContractsHeldExcludedFromProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to finance income (expenses) from reinsurance contracts held. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Reinsurance contracts held [member]]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxFinancialAssetsMeasuredAtFairValueThroughOtherComprehensiveIncome
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 4.1.2A of IFRS 9. [Refer: Financial assets measured at fair value through other comprehensive income; Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) from investments in equity instruments
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesFromInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) from changes in the fair value of investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income applying paragraph 5.7.5 of IFRS 9. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnHedgingInstrumentsThatHedgeInvestmentsInEquityInstruments
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) on hedging instruments that hedge investments in equity instruments that the entity has designated at fair value through other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlans
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans, which comprise actuarial gains and losses; the return on plan assets, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset); and any change in the effect of the asset ceiling, excluding amounts included in net interest on the net defined benefit liability (asset). [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Defined benefit plans [member]; Plan assets [member]; Net defined benefit liability (asset)] [Contrast: Decrease (increase) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from gain (loss) on remeasurement in other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on remeasurements of defined benefit plans [abstract]
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnRemeasurementsOfDefinedBenefitPlansAbstract

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, gains (losses) on revaluation of property, plant and equipment, right-of-use assets and intangible assets
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxGainsLossesOnRevaluation
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to gains (losses) in relation to changes in the revaluation surplus of property, plant and equipment, right-of-use assets and intangible assets. [Refer: Other comprehensive income; Revaluation surplus]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, hedges of net investments in foreign operations
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxHedgesOfNetInvestmentsInForeignOperations
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to hedges of net investments in foreign operations. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued excluded from profit or loss that will be reclassified to profit or loss
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, after reclassification adjustments, related to insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that will be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Insurance contracts issued [member]]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued excluded from profit or loss that will not be reclassified to profit or loss
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxInsuranceFinanceIncomeExpensesFromInsuranceContractsIssuedExcludedFromProfitOrLossThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to insurance finance income (expenses) from insurance contracts issued that will not be reclassified subsequently to profit or loss. [Refer: Insurance finance income (expenses); Insurance contracts issued [member]]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to items that will be reclassified to profit or loss
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToItemsThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances that is related to items that will be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]; Other comprehensive income]

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to items that will be reclassified to profit or loss [abstract]
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToItemsThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossAbstract

label: Other comprehensive income, net of tax, net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to items that will not be reclassified to profit or loss
name: OtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToItemsThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of other comprehensive income, net of tax, related to the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances that is related to items that will not be reclassified to profit or loss. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]; Other comprehensive income]

label: Other contingent liabilities [member]
name: OtherContingentLiabilitiesMember
documentation: This member stands for contingent liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Other current assets
name: OtherCurrentAssets
documentation: The amount of current assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Current assets]

label: Other current borrowings and current portion of other non-current borrowings
name: OtherCurrentBorrowingsAndCurrentPortionOfOtherNoncurrentBorrowings
documentation: The amount of current other borrowings and the current portion of non-current other borrowings. [Refer: Other borrowings]

label: Other current financial assets
name: OtherCurrentFinancialAssets
documentation: The amount of current financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial assets; Current financial assets]

label: Other current financial liabilities
name: OtherCurrentFinancialLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities; Current financial liabilities]

label: Other current inventories
name: OtherInventories
documentation: The amount of inventory that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Inventories]

label: Other current liabilities
name: OtherCurrentLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Current liabilities]

label: Other current non-financial assets
name: OtherCurrentNonfinancialAssets
documentation: The amount of current non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Other current non-financial liabilities
name: OtherCurrentNonfinancialLiabilities
documentation: The amount of current non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

label: Other current payables
name: OtherCurrentPayables
documentation: The amount of current payables that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other current provisions
name: OtherShorttermProvisions
documentation: The amount of current provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

label: Other current receivables
name: OtherCurrentReceivables
documentation: The amount of current other receivables. [Refer: Other receivables]

label: Other debt instruments held
name: OtherDebtInstrumentsHeld
documentation: The amount of debt instruments held by the entity that it does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Debt instruments held]

label: Other decreases, aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
name: OtherDecreasesAggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
documentation: The decrease in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Other differences to cash and cash equivalents in statement of cash flows
name: OtherDifferencesToCashAndCashEquivalentsInStatementOfCashFlows
documentation: The amount of differences between cash and cash equivalents in the statement of cash flows and the statement of financial position that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Cash and cash equivalents]

label: Other disposals of assets [member]
name: OtherDisposalsOfAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for disposals of assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other employee expense
name: OtherEmployeeExpense
documentation: The amount of employee expenses that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other environment related contingent liability [member]
name: OtherEnvironmentRelatedContingentLiabilityMember
documentation: This member stands for an environment-related contingent liability that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Other environment related provision [member]
name: OtherEnvironmentRelatedProvisionMember
documentation: This member stands for an environment-related provision that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other provisions [member]]

label: Other equity interest
name: OtherEquityInterest
documentation: The amount of equity interest of an entity without share capital that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other equity interest [member]
name: OtherEquityInterestMember
documentation: This member stands for equity interest of an entity without share capital that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other equity securities [member]
name: OtherEquitySecuritiesMember
documentation: This member stands for equity instruments that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other expense, by function
name: OtherExpenseByFunction
documentation: The amount of expenses that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note when the entity uses the 'function of expense' form for its analysis of expenses.

label: Other expenses, by nature
name: OtherExpenseByNature
documentation: The amount of expenses that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note when the entity uses the 'nature of expense' form for its analysis of expenses. [Refer: Expenses, by nature]

label: Other fee and commission expense
name: OtherFeeAndCommissionExpense
documentation: The amount of fee and commission expense that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Fee and commission expense]

label: Other fee and commission income
name: OtherFeeAndCommissionIncome
documentation: The amount of fee and commission income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Fee and commission income]

label: Other finance cost
name: OtherFinanceCost
documentation: The amount of finance costs that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Finance costs]

label: Other finance income
name: OtherFinanceIncome
documentation: The amount of finance income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Finance income]

label: Other finance income (cost)
name: OtherFinanceIncomeCost
documentation: The amount of finance income or cost that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Finance income (cost)]

label: Other financial assets
name: OtherFinancialAssets
documentation: The amount of financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Other financial liabilities
name: OtherFinancialLiabilities
documentation: The amount of financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial liabilities]

label: Other gains (losses)
name: OtherGainsLosses
documentation: The gains (losses) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other impaired assets [member]
name: OtherImpairedAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for impaired assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other income
name: OtherIncome
documentation: The amount of operating income that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other income (expense) from subsidiaries, jointly controlled entities and associates
name: OtherIncomeExpenseFromSubsidiariesJointlyControlledEntitiesAndAssociates
documentation: The amount of income or expense from subsidiaries, jointly controlled entities and associates that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Associates [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Other increases, aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss
name: OtherIncreasesAggregateDifferenceBetweenFairValueAtInitialRecognitionAndAmountDeterminedUsingValuationTechniqueYetToBeRecognised
documentation: The increase in the aggregate difference between the fair value at initial recognition and the transaction price of financial instruments yet to be recognised in profit or loss that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Aggregate difference between fair value at initial recognition and transaction price yet to be recognised in profit or loss; Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Other individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income, before tax
name: OtherIndividuallyImmaterialComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeBeforeTax
documentation: The amount of individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income, before tax, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other comprehensive income, before tax]

label: Other individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income, net of tax
name: OtherIndividuallyImmaterialComponentsOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax
documentation: The amount of individually immaterial components of other comprehensive income, net of tax, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Other inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as financing activities
name: OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
documentation: Inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as financing activities, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as investing activities
name: OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: Inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as investing activities, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as operating activities
name: OtherInflowsOutflowsOfCashClassifiedAsOperatingActivities
documentation: Inflows (outflows) of cash, classified as operating activities, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other intangible assets
name: OtherIntangibleAssets
documentation: The amount of intangible assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Other intangible assets [member]
name: OtherIntangibleAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of intangible assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Other liabilities
name: OtherLiabilities
documentation: The amount of liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued
name: OtherLiabilitiesUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued
documentation: The amount of liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Liabilities under insurance contracts and reinsurance contracts issued]

label: Other long-term employee benefits
name: OtherLongtermBenefits
documentation: The amount of long-term employee benefits other than post-employment benefits and termination benefits. Such benefits may include long-term paid absences, jubilee or other long-service benefits, long-term disability benefits, long-term profit-sharing and bonuses and long-term deferred remuneration. [Refer: Employee benefits expense]

label: Other material actuarial assumptions
name: OtherMaterialActuarialAssumptions
documentation: Any other material assumption used as a significant actuarial assumption to determine the present value of a defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Actuarial assumptions [member]; Defined benefit obligation, at present value]

label: Other material actuarial assumptions [member]
name: OtherMaterialActuarialAssumptionsMember
documentation: This member stands for material actuarial assumptions that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Actuarial assumptions [member]]

label: Other material non-cash items
name: OtherMaterialNoncashItems
documentation: The amount of material non-cash items other than depreciation and amortisation.

label: Other non-current assets
name: OtherNoncurrentAssets
documentation: The amount of non-current assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Non-current assets]

label: Other non-current financial assets
name: OtherNoncurrentFinancialAssets
documentation: The amount of non-current financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial assets]

label: Other non-current financial liabilities
name: OtherNoncurrentFinancialLiabilities
documentation: The amount of non-current financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

label: Other non-current liabilities
name: OtherNoncurrentLiabilities
documentation: The amount of non-current liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Non-current liabilities]

label: Other non-current non-financial assets
name: OtherNoncurrentNonfinancialAssets
documentation: The amount of non-current non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Other non-current non-financial liabilities
name: OtherNoncurrentNonfinancialLiabilities
documentation: The amount of non-current non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

label: Other non-current payables
name: OtherNoncurrentPayables
documentation: The amount of non-current payables that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other non-current provisions
name: OtherLongtermProvisions
documentation: The amount of non-current provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Non-current provisions]

label: Other non-current receivables
name: OtherNoncurrentReceivables
documentation: The amount of non-current other receivables. [Refer: Other receivables]

label: Other non-financial assets
name: OtherNonfinancialAssets
documentation: The amount of non-financial assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Other non-financial liabilities
name: OtherNonfinancialLiabilities
documentation: The amount of non-financial liabilities that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Other financial liabilities]

label: Other operating income (expense)
name: OtherOperatingIncomeExpense
documentation: The amount of operating income (expense) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other payables
name: OtherPayables
documentation: Amounts payable that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other price risk [member]
name: OtherPriceRiskMember
documentation: This member stands for a type of market risk representing the risk that the fair value or future cash flows of a financial instrument will fluctuate because of changes in market prices (other than those arising from interest rate risk or currency risk), whether those changes are caused by factors specific to the individual financial instrument or its issuer, or by factors affecting all similar financial instruments traded in the market. [Refer: Currency risk [member]; Interest rate risk [member]; Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Other property, plant and equipment
name: OtherPropertyPlantAndEquipment
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Other property, plant and equipment [member]
name: OtherPropertyPlantAndEquipmentMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing property, plant and equipment that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Other provisions
name: OtherProvisions
documentation: The amount of provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

label: Other provisions [abstract]
name: OtherProvisionsAbstract

label: Other provisions [member]
name: OtherProvisionsMember
documentation: This member stands for provisions other than provisions for employee benefits. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of other provisions' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Provisions]

label: Other receivables
name: OtherReceivables
documentation: The amount receivable by the entity that it does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Other regulatory deferral account credit balances
name: OtherRegulatoryDeferralAccountCreditBalances
documentation: The amount of regulatory deferral account credit balances that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account credit balances]

label: Other regulatory deferral account debit balances
name: OtherRegulatoryDeferralAccountDebitBalances
documentation: The amount of regulatory deferral account debit balances that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account debit balances]

label: Other related parties [member]
name: OtherRelatedPartiesMember
documentation: This member stands for related parties that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Other reserves
name: OtherReserves
documentation: A component of equity representing reserves within equity, not including retained earnings. [Refer: Retained earnings]

label: Other reserves [member]
name: OtherReservesMember
documentation: This member stands for a component of equity representing reserves within equity, not including retained earnings. It also represents the standard value for the 'Reserves within equity' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Retained earnings]

label: Other revenue
name: OtherRevenue
documentation: The amount of revenue arising from sources that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Revenue]

label: Other reversals of provisions
name: OtherReversalsOfProvisions
documentation: The amount of reversals of provisions that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Provisions]

label: Other short-term employee benefits
name: OtherShorttermEmployeeBenefits
documentation: The amount of expense from employee benefits (other than termination benefits), which are expected to be settled wholly within twelve months after the end of the annual reporting period in which the employees render the related services, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Employee benefits expense]

label: Other tangible or intangible assets transferred
name: OtherTangibleOrIntangibleAssetsTransferred
documentation: The fair value, at acquisition date, of other tangible or intangible assets (including a business or subsidiary of the acquirer) transferred as consideration in a business combination, that the entity does not separately disclose in the same note. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill; Business combinations [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Other tax effects for reconciliation between accounting profit and tax expense (income)
name: OtherTaxEffectsForReconciliationBetweenAccountingProfitAndTaxExpenseIncome
documentation: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Accounting profit; Applicable tax rate]

label: Other tax rate effects for reconciliation between accounting profit and tax expense (income)
name: OtherTaxRateEffectsForReconciliationBetweenAccountingProfitAndTaxExpenseIncome
documentation: Tax rate effects, in aggregate, on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate that the entity does not separately disclose in the reconciliation. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]
