label: Other temporary differences [member]
name: OtherTemporaryDifferencesMember
documentation: This member stands for temporary differences that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]]

label: Other trading income (expense)
name: OtherTradingIncomeExpense
documentation: The amount of trading income (expense) that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note. [Refer: Trading income (expense)]

label: Other work performed by entity and capitalised
name: OtherWorkPerformedByEntityAndCapitalised
documentation: The amount of the entity's own work capitalised from items originally classified as costs that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Outflows of cash from investing activities
name: OutflowsOfCashFromInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow for investing activities.

label: Output of agricultural produce
name: OutputOfAgriculturalProduce
documentation: The output of entity's agricultural produce.

label: Outstanding balances for related party transactions [abstract]
name: OutstandingBalancesForRelatedPartyTransactionsAbstract

label: Outstanding commitments made by entity, related party transactions
name: OutstandingCommitmentsMadeByEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of outstanding commitments made by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Outstanding commitments made on behalf of entity, related party transactions
name: OutstandingCommitmentsMadeOnBehalfOfEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of outstanding commitments made on behalf of the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Owner-occupied property measured using investment property fair value model
name: OwneroccupiedPropertyMeasuredUsingInvestmentPropertyFairValueModel
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing owner-occupied property measured using the investment property fair value model applying paragraph 29A of IAS 16. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Owner-occupied property measured using investment property fair value model [member]
name: OwneroccupiedPropertyMeasuredUsingInvestmentPropertyFairValueModelMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing owner-occupied property measured using the investment property fair value model applying paragraph 29A of IAS 16. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Par value per share
name: ParValuePerShare
documentation: The nominal value per share.

label: Parent [member]
name: ParentMember
documentation: This member stands for an entity that controls one or more entities.

label: Participating equity instruments other than ordinary shares [abstract]
name: ParticipatingEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOrdinarySharesAbstract

label: Participation in defined benefit plan that shares risks between group entities, related party transactions
name: ParticipationInDefinedBenefitPlanThatSharesRisksBetweenGroupEntitiesRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of participation by the entity in a defined benefit plan that shares risks between group entities. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]; Related parties [member]]

label: Past due status [axis]
name: PastDueStatusAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Past due status [member]
name: PastDueStatusMember
documentation: This member stands for all past-due statuses. It also represents the standard value for the 'Past due status' axis if no other member is used.

label: Past service cost and gains (losses) arising from settlements, net defined benefit liability (asset) [abstract]
name: PastServiceCostAndGainsLossesArisingFromSettlementsNetDefinedBenefitLiabilityAssetAbstract

label: Past service cost and losses (gains) arising from settlements, defined benefit plans
name: PastServiceCostAndLossesGainsArisingFromSettlementsDefinedBenefitPlans
documentation: The amount of expense (income) resulting from past service cost and losses (gains) arising from settlements. [Refer: Post-employment benefit expense in profit or loss, defined benefit plans; Past service cost, defined benefit plans] [Contrast: Increase (decrease) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from past service cost and losses (gains) arising from settlements]

label: Past service cost and losses (gains) arising from settlements, defined benefit plans [abstract]
name: PastServiceCostAndLossesGainsArisingFromSettlementsDefinedBenefitPlansAbstract

label: Past service cost, defined benefit plans
name: PastServiceCostDefinedBenefitPlans
documentation: The amount of expense (income) resulting from past service cost. Past service cost is the change in the present value of the defined benefit obligation for employee service in prior periods, resulting from a plan amendment (the introduction or withdrawal of, or changes to, a defined benefit plan) or a curtailment (a significant reduction by the entity in the number of employees covered by a plan). [Refer: Post-employment benefit expense in profit or loss, defined benefit plans; Defined benefit plans [member]] [Contrast: Increase (decrease) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from past service cost]

label: Payables for purchase of energy
name: PayablesForPurchaseOfEnergy
documentation: The amount of payables for the purchase of energy.

label: Payables for purchase of non-current assets
name: PayablesForPurchaseOfNoncurrentAssets
documentation: The amount of payables for the purchase of non-current assets. [Refer: Non-current assets]

label: Payables on social security and taxes other than income tax
name: PayablesOnSocialSecurityAndTaxesOtherThanIncomeTax
documentation: The amount of payment due on social security and taxes other than income tax. Income taxes include all domestic and foreign taxes that are based on taxable profits. Income taxes also include taxes, such as withholding taxes, that are payable by a subsidiary, associate or joint arrangement on distributions to the reporting entity.

label: Payables to related parties
name: TradeAndOtherPayablesToRelatedParties
documentation: The amount of payables due to related parties. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Payments for debt issue costs
name: PaymentsForDebtIssueCosts
documentation: The cash outflow for debt issue costs.

label: Payments for development project expenditure
name: PaymentsForDevelopmentProjectExpenditure
documentation: The cash outflow for expenditure related to development projects.

label: Payments for exploration and evaluation expenses
name: PaymentsForExplorationAndEvaluationExpenses
documentation: The cash outflow for expenses incurred by an entity in connection with the exploration for, and evaluation of, mineral resources before the technical feasibility and commercial viability of extracting a mineral resource are demonstrable.

label: Payments for premiums and claims, annuities and other policy benefits
name: PaymentsForPremiumsAndClaimsAnnuitiesAndOtherPolicyBenefits
documentation: The cash outflow for premiums and claims, annuities and other policy benefits.

label: Payments for share issue costs
name: PaymentsForShareIssueCosts
documentation: The cash outflow for share issue costs.

label: Payments from changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control
name: PaymentsFromChangesInOwnershipInterestsInSubsidiaries
documentation: The cash outflow for changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in a loss of control. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Payments from contracts held for dealing or trading purpose
name: PaymentsFromContractsHeldForDealingOrTradingPurpose
documentation: The cash outflow for contracts held for dealing or trading purposes.

label: Payments of lease liabilities, classified as financing activities
name: PaymentsOfLeaseLiabilitiesClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow for payment of lease liabilities, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Lease liabilities]

label: Payments of other equity instruments
name: PaymentsOfOtherEquityInstruments
documentation: The cash outflow for payments for equity instruments that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Payments to acquire or redeem entity's shares
name: PaymentsToAcquireOrRedeemEntitysShares
documentation: The cash outflow to acquire or redeem entity's shares.

label: Payments to and on behalf of employees
name: PaymentsToAndOnBehalfOfEmployees
documentation: The cash outflow to, and on behalf of, employees.

label: Payments to manufacture or acquire assets held for rental to others and subsequently held for sale
name: PaymentsToManufactureOrAcquireAssetsHeldForRentalToOthersAndSubsequentlyHeldForSale
documentation: The cash outflow to manufacture or acquire assets held for rental to others and subsequently held for sale.

label: Payments to suppliers for goods and services
name: PaymentsToSuppliersForGoodsAndServices
documentation: The cash outflow to suppliers for goods and services.

label: Payments to suppliers for goods and services and to and on behalf of employees
name: PaymentsToSuppliersForGoodsAndServicesAndToAndOnBehalfOfEmployees
documentation: The cash outflow for payments to suppliers for goods and services and to, and on behalf of, employees.

label: Pension defined benefit plans [member]
name: PensionDefinedBenefitPlansMember
documentation: This member stands for pension defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Percentage of entity's revenue
name: PercentageOfEntitysRevenue
documentation: The percentage of the entity's revenue. [Refer: Revenue]

label: Percentage of reasonably possible decrease in actuarial assumption
name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleDecreaseInActuarialAssumption
documentation: The reasonably possible percentage of the decrease in the actuarial assumption used to determine the present value of defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Actuarial assumptions [member]]

label: Percentage of reasonably possible decrease in risk variable that arises from contracts within scope of IFRS 17
name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleDecreaseInRiskExposureThatArisesFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS17
documentation: The percentage of the reasonably possible decrease in the risk variable that arises from contracts within scope of IFRS 17.

label: Percentage of reasonably possible decrease in unobservable input, assets
name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleDecreaseInUnobservableInputAssets
documentation: The percentage of a reasonably possible decrease in an unobservable input used in fair value measurement of assets.

label: Percentage of reasonably possible decrease in unobservable input, entity's own equity instruments
name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleDecreaseInUnobservableInputEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The percentage of a reasonably possible decrease in an unobservable input used in fair value measurement of the entity's own equity instruments.

label: Percentage of reasonably possible decrease in unobservable input, liabilities
name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleDecreaseInUnobservableInputLiabilities
documentation: The percentage of a reasonably possible decrease in an unobservable input used in fair value measurement of liabilities.

label: Percentage of reasonably possible increase in actuarial assumption
name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleIncreaseInActuarialAssumption
documentation: The reasonably possible percentage of the increase in the actuarial assumption used to determine the present value of defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Actuarial assumptions [member]]

label: Percentage of reasonably possible increase in risk variable that arises from contracts within scope of IFRS 17
name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleIncreaseInRiskExposureThatArisesFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS17
documentation: The percentage of a reasonably possible increase in the risk variable that arises from contracts within scope of IFRS 17.

label: Percentage of reasonably possible increase in unobservable input, assets
name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleIncreaseInUnobservableInputAssets
documentation: The percentage of a reasonably possible increase in an unobservable input used in fair value measurement of assets.

label: Percentage of reasonably possible increase in unobservable input, entity's own equity instruments
name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleIncreaseInUnobservableInputEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The percentage of a reasonably possible increase in an unobservable input used in fair value measurement of the entity's own equity instruments.

label: Percentage of reasonably possible increase in unobservable input, liabilities
name: PercentageOfReasonablyPossibleIncreaseInUnobservableInputLiabilities
documentation: The percentage of a reasonably possible increase in an unobservable input used in fair value measurement of liabilities.

label: Percentage of voting equity interests acquired
name: PercentageOfVotingEquityInterestsAcquired
documentation: The percentage of voting equity interests acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

label: Performance obligations [axis]
name: PerformanceObligationsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Performance obligations [member]
name: PerformanceObligationsMember
documentation: This member stands for all performance obligations. A performance obligation is a promise in a contract with a customer to transfer to the customer either: (a) a good or service (or a bundle of goods or services) that is distinct; or (b) a series of distinct goods or services that are substantially the same and that have the same pattern of transfer to the customer. This member also represents the standard value for the 'Performance obligations' axis if no other member is used.

label: Performance obligations satisfied at point in time [member]
name: PerformanceObligationsSatisfiedAtPointInTimeMember
documentation: This member stands for performance obligations satisfied at a point in time. An entity satisfies a performance obligation at a point in time, if the performance obligation is not satisfied over time. [Refer: Performance obligations [member]]

label: Performance obligations satisfied over time [member]
name: PerformanceObligationsSatisfiedOverTimeMember
documentation: This member stands for performance obligations satisfied over time. An entity satisfies a performance obligation over time, if one of the following criteria is met: (a) the customer simultaneously receives and consumes the benefits provided by the entity’s performance as the entity performs; (b) the entity’s performance creates or enhances an asset (for example, work in progress) that the customer controls as the asset is created or enhanced; or (c) the entity’s performance does not create an asset with an alternative use to the entity and the entity has an enforceable right to payment for performance completed to date. [Refer: Performance obligations [member]]

label: Period covered by financial statements
name: PeriodCoveredByFinancialStatements
documentation: The description of the period covered by the set of financial statements or notes.

label: Plan assets [member]
name: PlanAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for defined benefit plan assets. Plan assets comprise: (a) assets held by a long-term employee benefit fund; and (b) qualifying insurance policies.

label: Plan assets, at fair value
name: PlanAssetsAtFairValue
documentation: The fair value of defined benefit plan assets. Plan assets comprise assets held by a long-term employee benefit fund and qualifying insurance policies. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Plants [member]
name: PlantsMember
documentation: This member stands for plants.

label: Portfolio and other management fee income
name: PortfolioAndOtherManagementFeeIncome
documentation: The amount of income recognised from portfolio and other management fees.

label: Portion of consideration paid (received) consisting of cash and cash equivalents
name: PortionOfConsiderationPaidReceivedConsistingOfCashAndCashEquivalents
documentation: The portion of consideration paid or received, consisting of cash and cash equivalents, in respect of both obtaining and losing control of subsidiaries or other businesses. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Cash and cash equivalents; Consideration paid (received)]

label: Portion of gains (losses) recognised when control of subsidiary is lost, attributable to derecognising regulatory deferral account balances in former subsidiary
name: PortionOfGainsLossesRecognisedWhenControlOfSubsidiaryIsLostAttributableToDerecognisingRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesInFormerSubsidiary
documentation: The portion of gains (losses) from losing control of a subsidiary that is attributable to derecognising regulatory deferral account balances in the former subsidiary. [Refer: Gains (losses) recognised when control of subsidiary is lost; Regulatory deferral account balances [member]; Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Portion of gains (losses) recognised when control of subsidiary is lost, attributable to recognising investment retained in former subsidiary
name: PortionOfGainsLossesRecognisedWhenControlOfSubsidiaryIsLostAttributableToRecognisingInvestmentRetainedInFormerSubsidiary
documentation: The portion of gains (losses) from losing control of a subsidiary attributable to recognising any investment retained in the former subsidiary at its fair value at the date when control is lost. [Refer: Gains (losses) recognised when control of subsidiary is lost; Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Post-employment benefit expense in profit or loss
name: PostemploymentBenefitExpenseInProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of post-employment benefit expense included in profit or loss

label: Post-employment benefit expense in profit or loss [abstract]
name: PostemploymentBenefitExpenseInProfitOrLossAbstract

label: Post-employment benefit expense in profit or loss, defined benefit plans
name: PostemploymentBenefitExpenseDefinedBenefitPlans
documentation: The amount of post-employment benefit expense included in profit or loss relating to defined benefit plans. [Refer: Profit (loss); Defined benefit plans [member]] [Contrast: Increase (decrease) in net defined benefit liability (asset) resulting from expense (income) in profit or loss]

label: Post-employment benefit expense in profit or loss, defined benefit plans [abstract]
name: PostemploymentBenefitExpenseDefinedBenefitPlansAbstract

label: Post-employment benefit expense, defined contribution plans
name: PostemploymentBenefitExpenseDefinedContributionPlans
documentation: The amount of post-employment benefit expense relating to defined contribution plans. Defined contribution plans are post-employment benefit plans under which an entity pays fixed contributions into a separate entity (a fund) and will have no legal or constructive obligation to pay further contributions if the fund does not hold sufficient assets to pay all employee benefits relating to employee service in the current and prior periods.

label: Post-employment medical defined benefit plans [member]
name: PostemploymentMedicalDefinedBenefitPlansMember
documentation: This member stands for post-employment medical defined benefit plans. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Potential ordinary share transactions [member]
name: PotentialOrdinaryShareTransactionsMember
documentation: This member stands for potential ordinary share transactions. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

label: Power generating assets [member]
name: PowerGeneratingAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing assets that generate power. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Pre-contract costs [member]
name: PrecontractCostsMember
documentation: This member stands for a category of assets recognised from the costs to obtain or fulfil contracts with customers representing the pre-contract costs. [Refer: Assets recognised from costs to obtain or fulfil contracts with customers]

label: Preference shares [member]
name: PreferenceSharesMember
documentation: This member stands for equity instruments that are senior in some aspects to ordinary shares, but subordinate to debt instruments in terms of claim. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

label: Premiums written, net of reinsurance
name: PremiumsWrittenNetOfReinsurance
documentation: The amount of premiums written, net of amounts reinsured with third parties.

label: Prepayment risk [member]
name: PrepaymentRiskMember
documentation: This member stands for the type of risk that one party to a financial asset will incur a financial loss because the other party repays earlier or later than expected. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Prepayments
name: Prepayments
documentation: Receivables that represent amounts paid for goods and services before they have been delivered.

label: Prepayments and accrued income including contract assets
name: PrepaymentsAndAccruedIncomeIncludingContractAssets
documentation: The amount of prepayments and accrued income, including contract assets. [Refer: Prepayments; Accrued income including contract assets]

label: Prepayments and accrued income including contract assets [abstract]
name: PrepaymentsAndAccruedIncomeIncludingContractAssetsAbstract

label: Prepayments and accrued income other than contract assets
name: PrepaymentsAndAccruedIncomeOtherThanContractAssets
documentation: The amount of prepayments and accrued income, other than contract assets. [Refer: Prepayments; Accrued income other than contract assets]

label: Prepayments and accrued income other than contract assets [abstract]
name: PrepaymentsAndAccruedIncomeOtherThanContractAssetsAbstract

label: Present value of defined benefit obligation [member]
name: PresentValueOfDefinedBenefitObligationMember
documentation: This member stands for the present value of a defined benefit obligation. The present value of a defined benefit obligation is the present value, without deducting any plan assets, of expected future payments required to settle the obligation resulting from employee service in the current and prior periods.

label: Presentation of leases for lessee [abstract]
name: PresentationOfLeasesForLesseeAbstract

label: Presentation of overlay approach [abstract]
name: PresentationOfOverlayApproachAbstract

label: Previous GAAP [member]
name: PreviousGAAPMember
documentation: This member stands for the basis of accounting that the entity used immediately before adopting IFRSs. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

label: Previously stated [member]
name: PreviouslyStatedMember
documentation: This member stands for the information previously stated in the financial statements (ie before retrospective application or retrospective restatement).

label: Price index movements
name: PriceIndexMovements
documentation: The movements in the general price index used to restate financial statement information of an entity whose functional currency is the currency of a hyperinflationary economy.

label: Prices specified in forward agreements to purchase financial assets for cash
name: PricesSpecifiedInForwardAgreementsToPurchaseFinancialAssetsForCash
documentation: Prices specified in forward agreements to purchase financial assets for cash.

label: Principal place of business
name: PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness
documentation: The place where an entity principally conducts operations.

label: Principal place of business of associate
name: PrincipalPlaceOfBusinessOfAssociate
documentation: The principal place of business of an associate. [Refer: Principal place of business; Associates [member]]

label: Principal place of business of entity whose consolidated financial statements have been produced for public use
name: PrincipalPlaceOfBusinessOfEntityWhoseConsolidatedFinancialStatementsHaveBeenProducedForPublicUse
documentation: The principal place of business of the entity's ultimate or any intermediate parent whose consolidated financial statements that comply with IFRSs have been produced for public use. [Refer: Consolidated [member]; IFRSs [member]]

label: Principal place of business of joint operation
name: PrincipalPlaceOfBusinessOfJointOperation
documentation: The principal place of business of a joint operation. [Refer: Joint operations [member]; Principal place of business]

label: Principal place of business of joint venture
name: PrincipalPlaceOfBusinessOfJointVenture
documentation: The principal place of business of a joint venture. [Refer: Principal place of business; Joint ventures [member]]

label: Principal place of business of subsidiary
name: PrincipalPlaceOfBusinessOfSubsidiary
documentation: The principal place of business of a subsidiary. [Refer: Principal place of business; Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Probability of default [axis]
name: ProbabilityOfDefaultAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Probability of default [member]
name: ProbabilityOfDefaultMember
documentation: This member stands for all probabilities of default.

label: Probability of default, measurement input [member]
name: ProbabilityOfDefaultMeasurementInputMember
documentation: This member stands for the probability of default used as a measurement input.

label: Proceeds from borrowings, classified as financing activities
name: ProceedsFromBorrowingsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from borrowings obtained. [Refer: Borrowings]

label: Proceeds from changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in loss of control
name: ProceedsFromChangesInOwnershipInterestsInSubsidiaries
documentation: The cash inflow from changes in ownership interests in subsidiaries that do not result in a loss of control. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Proceeds from contributions of non-controlling interests
name: ProceedsFromContributionsOfNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The cash inflow from proceeds from contributions of non-controlling interests. [Refer: Non-controlling interests]

label: Proceeds from current borrowings
name: ProceedsFromCurrentBorrowings
documentation: The cash inflow from current borrowings obtained. [Refer: Current borrowings]

label: Proceeds from disposal of exploration and evaluation assets
name: ProceedsFromDisposalOfExplorationAndEvaluationAssets
documentation: The cash inflow from the disposal of exploration and evaluation assets. [Refer: Exploration and evaluation assets [member]]

label: Proceeds from disposal of mining assets
name: ProceedsFromDisposalOfMiningAssets
documentation: The cash inflow from the disposal of mining assets. [Refer: Mining assets]

label: Proceeds from disposal of non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale and discontinued operations
name: ProceedsFromDisposalOfNoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleAndDiscontinuedOperations
documentation: The cash inflow from the disposal of non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale and discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Disposal groups classified as held for sale [member]; Non-current assets or disposal groups classified as held for sale]

label: Proceeds from disposal of oil and gas assets
name: ProceedsFromDisposalOfOilAndGasAssets
documentation: The cash inflow from disposal of oil and gas assets. [Refer: Oil and gas assets]

label: Proceeds from disposal or maturity of available-for-sale financial assets
name: ProceedsFromDisposalOrMaturityOfAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
documentation: The cash inflow from the disposal or maturity of available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

label: Proceeds from disposals of property, plant and equipment, intangible assets other than goodwill, investment property and other non-current assets
name: ProceedsFromDisposalsOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillInvestmentPropertyAndOtherNoncurrentAssets
documentation: The cash inflow from the disposal of property, plant and equipment, intangible assets other than goodwill, investment property and other non-current assets. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill; Investment property; Other non-current assets; Property, plant and equipment]

label: Proceeds from exercise of options
name: ProceedsFromExerciseOfOptions
documentation: The cash inflow from the exercise of options.

label: Proceeds from exercise of warrants
name: ProceedsFromExerciseOfWarrants
documentation: The cash inflow from the exercise of share purchase warrants.

label: Proceeds from government grants, classified as financing activities
name: ProceedsFromGovernmentGrantsClassifiedAsFinancingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from government grants, classified as financing activities. [Refer: Government [member]; Government grants]

label: Proceeds from government grants, classified as investing activities
name: ProceedsFromGovernmentGrantsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from government grants, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Government [member]; Government grants]

label: Proceeds from issue of bonds, notes and debentures
name: ProceedsFromIssueOfBondsNotesAndDebentures
documentation: The cash inflow from the issuing of bonds, notes and debentures.

label: Proceeds from issue of ordinary shares
name: ProceedsFromIssueOfOrdinaryShares
documentation: The cash inflow from the issuing of ordinary shares. [Refer: Ordinary shares [member]]

label: Proceeds from issue of preference shares
name: ProceedsFromIssueOfPreferenceShares
documentation: The cash inflow from the issuing of preference shares. [Refer: Preference shares [member]]

label: Proceeds from issue of subordinated liabilities
name: ProceedsFromIssueOfSubordinatedLiabilities
documentation: The cash inflow from the issuing of subordinated liabilities. [Refer: Subordinated liabilities]

label: Proceeds from issuing other equity instruments
name: ProceedsFromIssuingOtherEquityInstruments
documentation: The cash inflow from issuing equity instruments that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note.

label: Proceeds from issuing shares
name: ProceedsFromIssuingShares
documentation: The cash inflow from issuing shares.

label: Proceeds from non-current borrowings
name: ProceedsFromNoncurrentBorrowings
documentation: The cash inflow from non-current borrowings obtained. [Refer: Borrowings]

label: Proceeds from sale or issue of treasury shares
name: ProceedsFromSaleOrIssueOfTreasuryShares
documentation: The cash inflow from the sale or issuing of treasury shares. [Refer: Sale or issue of treasury shares; Treasury shares]

label: Proceeds from sales of biological assets
name: ProceedsFromSalesOfBiologicalAssets
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

label: Proceeds from sales of intangible assets, classified as investing activities
name: ProceedsFromSalesOfIntangibleAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of intangible assets, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Proceeds from sales of interests in associates
name: ProceedsFromSalesOfInterestsInAssociates
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of interests in associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

label: Proceeds from sales of investment property
name: ProceedsFromSalesOfInvestmentProperty
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of investment property. [Refer: Investment property]

label: Proceeds from sales of investments accounted for using equity method
name: ProceedsFromSalesOfInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method]

label: Proceeds from sales of investments other than investments accounted for using equity method
name: ProceedsFromSalesOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of investments other than investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method; Investments other than investments accounted for using equity method]

label: Proceeds from sales of other long-term assets, classified as investing activities
name: ProceedsFromOtherLongtermAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of long-term assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Assets]

label: Proceeds from sales of property, plant and equipment, classified as investing activities
name: ProceedsFromSalesOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of property, plant and equipment, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Proceeds from sales or maturity of financial instruments, classified as investing activities
name: ProceedsFromSalesOrMaturityOfFinancialInstrumentsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash inflow from sales or maturity of financial instruments, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Proceeds from transfer activity during period representing greatest transfer activity
name: ProceedsFromTransferActivity
documentation: The amount of proceeds recognised from the transfer of financial assets during the part of the reporting period within which the greatest transfer activity took place when the total amount of proceeds from the transfer activity (that qualifies for derecognition) is not evenly distributed throughout the reporting period. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Proceeds included in profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 20A of IAS 16 that relate to items produced that are not output of entity's ordinary activities
name: ProceedsIncludedInProfitOrLossInAccordanceWithParagraph20AOfIAS16ThatRelateToItemsProducedThatAreNotOutputOfEntitysOrdinaryActivities
documentation: The amount of proceeds included in profit or loss in accordance with paragraph 20A of IAS 16 that relate to items produced that are not an output of the entity's ordinary activities and are produced while bringing an item of property, plant and equipment to the location and condition necessary for it to be capable of operating in the manner intended by management.

label: Products and services [axis]
name: ProductsAndServicesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Products and services [member]
name: ProductsAndServicesMember
documentation: This member stands for the entity's products and services. It also represents the standard value for the 'Products and services' axis if no other member is used.

label: Professional fees expense
name: ProfessionalFeesExpense
documentation: The amount of fees paid or payable for professional services.

label: Profit (loss)
name: ProfitLoss
documentation: The total of income less expenses from continuing and discontinued operations, excluding the components of other comprehensive income. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Profit (loss) [abstract]
name: ProfitLossAbstract

label: Profit (loss) attributable to participating equity instruments other than ordinary shares [abstract]
name: ProfitLossAttributableToParticipatingEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOrdinarySharesAbstract

label: Profit (loss) attributable to participating equity instruments other than ordinary shares, used in calculating basic earnings (loss) per instrument
name: ProfitLossAttributableToParticipatingEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOrdinarySharesUsedInCalculatingBasicEarningsLossPerInstrument
documentation: The profit (loss) used in calculating basic earnings (loss) per instrument attributable to equity instruments that participate in profit with ordinary shares according to a predetermined formula. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss) attributable to participating equity instruments other than ordinary shares, used in calculating diluted earnings (loss) per instrument
name: ProfitLossAttributableToParticipatingEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOrdinarySharesUsedInCalculatingDilutedEarningsLossPerInstrument
documentation: The profit (loss) used in calculating diluted earnings (loss) per instrument attributable to equity instruments that participate in profit with ordinary shares according to a predetermined formula. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss) before tax
name: ProfitLossBeforeTax
documentation: The profit (loss) before tax expense or income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss) from continuing operations
name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperations
documentation: The profit (loss) from continuing operations. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to non-controlling interests
name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Profit (loss) from continuing operations; Non-controlling interests]

label: Profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of parent entity, used in calculating basic earnings per share
name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntity
documentation: The profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity. [Refer: Continuing operations [member]; Profit (loss) from continuing operations]

label: Profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of parent entity, used in calculating diluted earnings per share
name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityIncludingDilutiveEffects
documentation: The profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity, adjusted for the effects of all dilutive potential ordinary shares. [Refer: Profit (loss) from continuing operations]

label: Profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to participating equity instruments other than ordinary shares, used in calculating basic earnings (loss) per instrument
name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToParticipatingEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOrdinarySharesUsedInCalculatingBasicEarningsLossPerInstrument
documentation: The profit (loss) from continuing operations used in calculating basic earnings (loss) per instrument attributable to equity instruments that participate in profit with ordinary shares according to a predetermined formula. [Refer: Profit (loss) from continuing operations]

label: Profit (loss) from continuing operations attributable to participating equity instruments other than ordinary shares, used in calculating diluted earnings (loss) per instrument
name: ProfitLossFromContinuingOperationsAttributableToParticipatingEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOrdinarySharesUsedInCalculatingDilutedEarningsLossPerInstrument
documentation: The profit (loss) from continuing operations used in calculating diluted earnings (loss) per instrument attributable to equity instruments that participate in profit with ordinary shares according to a predetermined formula. [Refer: Profit (loss) from continuing operations]

label: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations
name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperations
documentation: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to non-controlling interests
name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations; Non-controlling interests]

label: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of parent entity, used in calculating basic earnings per share
name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntity
documentation: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity. [Refer: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations]

label: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of parent entity, used in calculating diluted earnings per share
name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityIncludingDilutiveEffects
documentation: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity, adjusted for the effects of all dilutive potential ordinary shares. [Refer: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations]

label: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to participating equity instruments other than ordinary shares, used in calculating basic earnings (loss) per instrument
name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToParticipatingEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOrdinarySharesUsedInCalculatingBasicEarningsLossPerInstrument
documentation: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations used in calculating basic earnings (loss) per instrument attributable to equity instruments that participate in profit with ordinary shares according to a predetermined formula. [Refer: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations]

label: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations attributable to participating equity instruments other than ordinary shares, used in calculating diluted earnings (loss) per instrument
name: ProfitLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsAttributableToParticipatingEquityInstrumentsOtherThanOrdinarySharesUsedInCalculatingDilutedEarningsLossPerInstrument
documentation: The profit (loss) from discontinued operations used in calculating diluted earnings (loss) per instrument attributable to equity instruments that participate in profit with ordinary shares according to a predetermined formula. [Refer: Profit (loss) from discontinued operations]

label: Profit (loss) from operating activities
name: ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities
documentation: The profit (loss) from operating activities of the entity. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss) of acquiree since acquisition date
name: ProfitLossOfAcquiree
documentation: The profit (loss) of the acquiree, since the acquisition date, included in the consolidated statement of comprehensive income. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss) of combined entity as if combination occurred at beginning of period
name: ProfitLossOfCombinedEntity
documentation: The profit (loss) of the combined entity as though the acquisition date for all business combinations that occurred during the year had been as of the beginning of the annual reporting period. [Refer: Business combinations [member]; Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss) on disposal of investments and changes in value of investments
name: ProfitsLossesOnDisposalOfInvestmentsAndChangesInValueOfInvestments
documentation: The profit (loss) on disposal of investments and changes in the value of investments. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss) recognised on exchanging construction services for financial asset
name: ProfitLossRecognisedOnExchangingConstructionServicesForFinancialAsset2011
documentation: The profit (loss) recognised on exchanging construction services for a financial asset in service concession arrangements. [Refer: Service concession arrangements [member]; Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss) recognised on exchanging construction services for intangible asset
name: ProfitLossRecognisedOnExchangingConstructionServicesForIntangibleAsset2011
documentation: The profit (loss) recognised on exchanging construction services for an intangible asset in service concession arrangements. [Refer: Service concession arrangements [member]; Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss), attributable to [abstract]
name: ProfitLossAttributableToAbstract

label: Profit (loss), attributable to non-controlling interests
name: ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The profit (loss) from continuing and discontinued operations attributable to non-controlling interests. [Refer: Profit (loss); Non-controlling interests]

label: Profit (loss), attributable to ordinary equity holders of parent entity [abstract]
name: ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityAbstract

label: Profit (loss), attributable to ordinary equity holders of parent entity, used in calculating basic earnings per share
name: ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntity
documentation: The profit (loss) attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss), attributable to ordinary equity holders of parent entity, used in calculating diluted earnings per share
name: ProfitLossAttributableToOrdinaryEquityHoldersOfParentEntityIncludingDilutiveEffects
documentation: The profit (loss) attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity, adjusted for the effects of all dilutive potential ordinary shares. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss), attributable to owners of parent
name: ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent
documentation: The profit (loss) from continuing and discontinued operations attributable to owners of the parent. [Refer: Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss), including net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss and net movement in related deferred tax
name: ProfitLossIncludingNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToProfitOrLossAndNetMovementInRelatedDeferredTax
documentation: The profit (loss) that includes the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss and the net movement in related deferred tax. [Refer: Net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss; Net movement in deferred tax arising from regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss; Profit (loss)]

label: Profit (loss), including net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss and net movement in related deferred tax, attributable to non-controlling interests
name: ProfitLossIncludingNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToProfitOrLossAndNetMovementInRelatedDeferredTaxAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The profit (loss), attributable to non-controlling interests, that includes the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss and the net movement in related deferred tax. [Refer: Profit (loss), including net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss and net movement in related deferred tax; Non-controlling interests]

label: Profit (loss), including net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss and net movement in related deferred tax, attributable to owners of parent
name: ProfitLossIncludingNetMovementInRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesRelatedToProfitOrLossAndNetMovementInRelatedDeferredTaxAttributableToOwnersOfParent
documentation: The profit (loss), attributable to owners of parent, that includes the net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss and the net movement in related deferred tax. [Refer: Profit (loss), including net movement in regulatory deferral account balances related to profit or loss and net movement in related deferred tax]

label: Profit or loss placeholder - this item MUST be used as a starting point for the statement of profit or loss if the statement of profit or loss is disclosed separately
name: IncomeStatementAbstract

label: Programming assets
name: ProgrammingAssets
documentation: The amount of assets relating to programming. [Refer: Assets]

label: Property development and project management expense
name: PropertyDevelopmentAndProjectManagementExpense
documentation: The amount of expense arising from property development and project management.

label: Property development and project management income
name: PropertyDevelopmentAndProjectManagementIncome
documentation: The amount of income arising from property development and project management.

label: Property intended for sale in ordinary course of business
name: PropertyIntendedForSaleInOrdinaryCourseOfBusiness
documentation: The amount of property intended for sale in the ordinary course of business of the entity. Property is land or a building - or part of a building - or both.

label: Property management expense
name: PropertyManagementExpense
documentation: The amount of expense relating to property management. Property is land or a building - or part of a building - or both.

label: Property occupied by entity included in fair value of plan assets
name: DescriptionOfAmountsOfPropertyOccupiedByEntityIncludedInFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The fair value of property occupied by the entity that are included in the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Property service charge expense
name: PropertyServiceChargeExpense
documentation: The amount of expense arising from charges related to servicing of property.

label: Property service charge income
name: PropertyServiceChargeIncome
documentation: The amount of income arising from charges related to servicing of property.

label: Property service charge income (expense)
name: PropertyServiceChargeIncomeExpense
documentation: The amount of income or expense arising from property service charge. [Refer: Property service charge expense; Property service charge income]

label: Property service charge income (expense) [abstract]
name: PropertyServiceChargeIncomeExpenseAbstract

label: Property tax expense
name: PropertyTaxExpense
documentation: The amount of tax expense levied on property. Property is land or a building - or part of a building - or both.

label: Property, Plant and Equipment-Proceeds before Intended Use [member]
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentProceedsBeforeIntendedUseMember
documentation: This member stands for Property, Plant and Equipment-Proceeds before Intended Use (Amendments to IAS 16) issued in May 2020.

label: Property, plant and equipment
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipment
documentation: The amount of tangible assets that: (a) are held for use in the production or supply of goods or services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes; and (b) are expected to be used during more than one period.

label: Property, plant and equipment [abstract]
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAbstract

label: Property, plant and equipment [member]
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentMember
documentation: This member stands for property, plant and equipment. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of property, plant and equipment' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment by operating lease status [axis]
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByOperatingLeaseStatusAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Property, plant and equipment by operating lease status [member]
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByOperatingLeaseStatusMember
documentation: This member stands for all property, plant and equipment when disaggregated by the operating lease status by a lessor. It also represents the standard value for the 'Property, plant and equipment by operating lease status' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment fair value used as deemed cost
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentFairValueUsedAsDeemedCost
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment, for which fair value was used as their deemed cost in the opening IFRS statement of financial position. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment not subject to operating leases [member]
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNotSubjectToOperatingLeasesMember
documentation: This member stands for property, plant and equipment that is not subject to operating leases. Operating lease is a lease that does not transfer substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment recognised as of acquisition date
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
documentation: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for plant, property and equipment acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Business combinations [member]]

label: Property, plant and equipment subject to operating leases [member]
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentSubjectToOperatingLeasesMember
documentation: This member stands for property, plant and equipment that is subject to operating leases. Operating lease is a lease that does not transfer substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment, assets retired from active use and not classified as held for sale
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentCarryingAmountOfAssetsRetiredFromActiveUse
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment retired from active use and not classified as held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment, expenditures recognised in course of its construction
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentExpendituresRecognisedForConstructions
documentation: The amount of expenditures recognised in the carrying amount of an item of property, plant and equipment in the course of its construction. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment, gross carrying amount of fully depreciated assets still in use
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGrossCarryingAmountFullyDepreciated
documentation: The gross carrying amount of fully depreciated property, plant and equipment that is still in use. [Refer: Gross carrying amount [member]; Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment, pledged as security
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentPledgedAsSecurity
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment pledged as security for liabilities. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment, restrictions on title
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentRestrictionsOnTitle
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment subject to restrictions on title. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment, revaluation [abstract]
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentRevaluationAbstract

label: Property, plant and equipment, revaluation surplus
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentRevaluationSurplus
documentation: The amount of revaluation surplus that relates to property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment; Revaluation surplus]

label: Property, plant and equipment, revalued assets
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentCarryingAmountOfRevaluedAssets
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment stated at revalued amounts. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment, revalued assets, at cost
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentCarryingAmountAtCostOfRevaluedAssets
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment that would have been recognised had the revalued assets been carried under the cost model. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Property, plant and equipment, temporarily idle
name: PropertyPlantAndEquipmentTemporarilyIdle
documentation: The amount of temporarily idle property, plant and equipment. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Proportion of ownership interest in associate
name: ProportionOfOwnershipInterestInAssociate
documentation: The proportion of ownership interest in an associate attributable to the entity. [Refer: Associates [member]]

label: Proportion of ownership interest in joint operation
name: ProportionOfOwnershipInterestInJointOperation
documentation: The proportion of ownership interest in a joint operation attributable to the entity. [Refer: Joint operations [member]]

label: Proportion of ownership interest in joint venture
name: ProportionOfOwnershipInterestInJointVenture
documentation: The proportion of ownership interest in a joint venture attributable to the entity. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Proportion of ownership interest in subsidiary
name: ProportionOfOwnershipInterestInSubsidiary
documentation: The proportion of ownership interest in a subsidiary attributable to the entity. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Proportion of ownership interests held by non-controlling interests
name: ProportionOfOwnershipInterestsHeldByNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The proportion of ownership interests in a subsidiary held by non-controlling interests. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Non-controlling interests]

label: Proportion of voting rights held by non-controlling interests
name: ProportionOfVotingRightsHeldByNoncontrollingInterests
documentation: The proportion of the voting rights in a subsidiary held by non-controlling interests. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Non-controlling interests]

label: Proportion of voting rights held in associate
name: ProportionOfVotingPowerHeldInAssociate
documentation: The proportion of the voting rights in an associate held by the entity. [Refer: Associates [member]]

label: Proportion of voting rights held in joint operation
name: ProportionOfVotingRightsHeldInJointOperation
documentation: The proportion of the voting rights in a joint operation held by the entity. [Refer: Joint operations [member]]

label: Proportion of voting rights held in joint venture
name: ProportionOfVotingRightsHeldInJointVenture
documentation: The proportion of the voting rights in a joint venture held by the entity. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Proportion of voting rights held in subsidiary
name: ProportionOfVotingPowerHeldInSubsidiary
documentation: The proportion of the voting rights in a subsidiary held by the entity. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Provision for credit commitments [member]
name: ProvisionForCreditCommitmentsMember
documentation: This member stands for a provision for credit commitments entered into by the entity. [Refer: Other provisions [member]]

label: Provision for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs
name: ProvisionForDecommissioningRestorationAndRehabilitationCosts
documentation: The amount of provision for costs related to decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation. [Refer: Other provisions]

label: Provision for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs [abstract]
name: ProvisionForDecommissioningRestorationAndRehabilitationCostsAbstract

label: Provision for decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs [member]
name: ProvisionForDecommissioningRestorationAndRehabilitationCostsMember
documentation: This member stands for a provision relating to decommissioning, restoration and rehabilitation costs. [Refer: Other provisions [member]]

label: Provision for taxes other than income tax [member]
name: ProvisionForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxMember
documentation: This member stands for a provision for taxes other than income tax. Income taxes include all domestic and foreign taxes which are based on taxable profits. Income taxes also include taxes, such as withholding taxes, which are payable by a subsidiary, associate or joint arrangement on distributions to the reporting entity. [Refer: Other provisions [member]]

label: Provision of guarantees or collateral by entity, related party transactions
name: ProvisionOfGuaranteesOrCollateralByEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of guarantees or collateral provided by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Guarantees [member]; Related parties [member]]

label: Provision of guarantees or collateral to entity, related party transactions
name: ProvisionOfGuaranteesOrCollateralToEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of guarantees or collateral provided to the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Guarantees [member]; Related parties [member]]

label: Provision used, other provisions
name: ProvisionUsedOtherProvisions
documentation: The amount used (ie incurred and charged against the provision) for other provisions. [Refer: Other provisions]

label: Provisions
name: Provisions
documentation: The amount of liabilities of uncertain timing or amount, including provisions for employee benefits.

label: Provisions [abstract]
name: ProvisionsAbstract

label: Provisions arising from liability adequacy tests
name: ProvisionsArisingFromLiabilityAdequacyTests
documentation: The amount of provisions arising from an assessment of whether the carrying amount of an insurance liability needs to be increased (or the carrying amount of related deferred acquisition costs or related intangible assets decreased), based on a review of future cash flows. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]; Provisions]

label: Provisions for doubtful debts related to outstanding balances of related party transaction
name: ProvisionsForDoubtfulDebtsRelatedToOutstandingBalancesOfRelatedPartyTransaction
documentation: The amount of provisions for doubtful debts related to the amount of outstanding balances in related party transactions. [Refer: Provisions]

label: Provisions for employee benefits
name: ProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits
documentation: The amount of provisions for employee benefits. [Refer: Employee benefits expense; Provisions]

label: Provisions for future non-participating benefits
name: ProvisionsForFutureNonparticipatingBenefits
documentation: The amount of provisions for future non-participating benefits. [Refer: Provisions]

label: Purchase of available-for-sale financial assets
name: PurchaseOfAvailableforsaleFinancialAssets
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of available-for-sale financial assets. [Refer: Financial assets available-for-sale]

label: Purchase of biological assets
name: PurchaseOfBiologicalAssets
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of biological assets. [Refer: Biological assets]

label: Purchase of exploration and evaluation assets
name: PurchaseOfExplorationAndEvaluationAssets
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of exploration and evaluation assets. [Refer: Exploration and evaluation assets [member]]

label: Purchase of financial instruments, classified as investing activities
name: PurchaseOfFinancialInstrumentsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of financial instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Purchase of intangible assets, classified as investing activities
name: PurchaseOfIntangibleAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchases of intangible assets, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Purchase of interests in associates
name: PurchaseOfInterestsInAssociates
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of interests in associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

label: Purchase of interests in investments accounted for using equity method
name: PurchaseOfInterestsInInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of interests in investments accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method]

label: Purchase of investment property
name: PurchaseOfInvestmentProperty
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of investment property. [Refer: Investment property]

label: Purchase of investments other than investments accounted for using equity method
name: PurchaseOfInvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of investments other than investments accounted for using equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method; Investments other than investments accounted for using equity method]

label: Purchase of mining assets
name: PurchaseOfMiningAssets
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of mining assets. [Refer: Mining assets]

label: Purchase of oil and gas assets
name: PurchaseOfOilAndGasAssets
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of oil and gas assets. [Refer: Oil and gas assets]

label: Purchase of other long-term assets, classified as investing activities
name: PurchaseOfOtherLongtermAssetsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchases of long-term assets that the entity does not separately disclose in the same statement or note, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Assets]

label: Purchase of property, plant and equipment, classified as investing activities
name: PurchaseOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentClassifiedAsInvestingActivities
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchases of property, plant and equipment, classified as investing activities. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Purchase of property, plant and equipment, intangible assets other than goodwill, investment property and other non-current assets
name: PurchaseOfPropertyPlantAndEquipmentIntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwillInvestmentPropertyAndOtherNoncurrentAssets
documentation: The cash outflow for the purchase of property, plant and equipment, intangible assets other than goodwill, investment property and other non-current assets. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill; Investment property; Other non-current assets; Property, plant and equipment]

label: Purchase of treasury shares
name: PurchaseOfTreasuryShares
documentation: The decrease in equity resulting from the purchase of treasury shares. [Refer: Treasury shares]

label: Purchased call options [member]
name: PurchasedCallOptionsMember
documentation: This member stands for derivative financial contracts purchased that give the entity the right, but not the obligation, to purchase an underlying asset at a specified strike price. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

label: Purchases of goods, related party transactions
name: PurchasesOfGoodsRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of goods purchased by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Purchases of property and other assets, related party transactions
name: PurchasesOfPropertyAndOtherAssetsRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of property and other assets purchased by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Purchases, fair value measurement, assets
name: PurchasesFairValueMeasurementAssets
documentation: The increase in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from purchases of those assets. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Purchases, fair value measurement, entity's own equity instruments
name: PurchasesFairValueMeasurementEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The increase in the fair value measurement of the entity's own equity instruments resulting from purchases of those equity instruments. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Entity's own equity instruments [member]]

label: Purchases, fair value measurement, liabilities
name: PurchasesFairValueMeasurementLiabilities
documentation: The increase in the fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from purchases of those liabilities. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Qualifying insurance policies, amount contributed to fair value of plan assets
name: QualifyingInsurancePoliciesAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The amount qualifying insurance policies contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Qualifying insurance policies, percentage contributed to fair value of plan assets
name: QualifyingInsurancePoliciesPercentageContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The percentage qualifying insurance policies contribute to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]] [Contrast: Qualifying insurance policies, amount contributed to fair value of plan assets]

label: Qualitative assessment of estimated effect of practical expedients used when applying IFRS 15 retrospectively
name: QualitativeAssessmentOfEstimatedEffectOfPracticalExpedientsUsedWhenApplyingIFRS15Retrospectively
documentation: The qualitative assessment of the estimated effect of the practical expedients used when applying IFRS 15 retrospectively.

label: Qualitative description of effect on financial statements of change in activities that permitted insurer to reassess whether its activities are predominantly connected with insurance
name: QualitativeDescriptionOfEffectOnFinancialStatementsOfChangeInActivitiesThatPermittedInsurerToReassessWhetherItsActivitiesArePredominantlyConnectedWithInsurance
documentation: Qualitative description of the effect on the financial statements of the change in activities that permitted an insurer to reassess whether its activities are predominantly connected with insurance.

label: Qualitative description of effect on financial statements of change in activities that resulted in insurer no longer qualifying to apply temporary exemption from IFRS 9
name: QualitativeDescriptionOfEffectOnFinancialStatementsOfChangeInActivitiesThatResultedInInsurerNoLongerQualifyingToApplyTemporaryExemptionFromIFRS9
documentation: Qualitative description of the effect on the financial statements of change in activities that resulted in an insurer no longer qualifying to apply the temporary exemption from IFRS 9.

label: Qualitative information about continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets
name: QualitativeInformationAboutContinuingInvolvementInDerecognisedFinancialAssets
documentation: Qualitative information about the entity's continuing involvement in derecognised financial assets that explains and supports required quantitative disclosures. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Qualitative information about entity's objectives, policies and processes for managing capital
name: QualitativeInformationAboutEntitysObjectivesPoliciesAndProcessesForManagingCapital
documentation: Qualitative information about the entity's objectives, policies and processes for managing capital. This should include a description of what it manages as capital, the nature of externally imposed capital requirements and how those requirements are managed, and how the entity is meeting its objectives for managing capital. [Refer: Capital requirements [member]]

label: Qualitative information about sensitivity and information about those terms and conditions of insurance contracts that have material effect
name: QualitativeInformationAboutSensitivityAndInformationAboutThoseTermsAndConditionsOfInsuranceContractsThatHaveMaterialEffect
documentation: Qualitative information about sensitivity to insurance risk, and information about those terms and conditions of insurance contracts that have a material effect on the amount, timing and uncertainty of the insurer's future cash flows. [Refer: Types of insurance contracts [member]]

label: Quantitative information about derivatives that have yet to transition to alternative benchmark rate [text block]
name: QuantitativeInformationAboutDerivativesThatHaveYetToTransitionToAlternativeBenchmarkRateExplanatory
documentation: The quantitative information about derivatives that have yet to transition to an alternative benchmark rate.

label: Quantitative information about non-derivative financial assets that have yet to transition to alternative benchmark rate [text block]
name: QuantitativeInformationAboutNonderivativeFinancialAssetsThatHaveYetToTransitionToAlternativeBenchmarkRateExplanatory
documentation: The quantitative information about non-derivative financial assets that have yet to transition to an alternative benchmark rate.

label: Quantitative information about non-derivative financial liabilities that have yet to transition to alternative benchmark rate [text block]
name: QuantitativeInformationAboutNonderivativeFinancialLiabilitiesThatHaveYetToTransitionToAlternativeBenchmarkRateExplanatory
documentation: The quantitative information about non-derivative financial liabilities that have yet to transition to an alternative benchmark rate.

label: Range [axis]
name: RangeAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Range of estimates within which fair value is likely to lie for biological assets, at cost
name: RangeOfEstimatesWithinWhichFairValueIsLikelyToLieForBiologicalAssetsAtCost
documentation: The range of estimates within which fair value is highly likely to lie for biological assets when their fair value cannot be measured reliably and the entity measures them at cost less any accumulated depreciation and accumulated impairment losses. [Refer: Biological assets]

label: Range of estimates within which fair value is likely to lie for investment property, at cost or in accordance with IFRS 16 within fair value model
name: RangeOfEstimatesWithinWhichFairValueIsLikelyToLieForInvestmentPropertyAtCostOrInAccordanceWithIFRS16WithinFairValueModel
documentation: The range of estimates within which fair value is highly likely to lie for investment property when the entity measures investment property at cost or in accordance with IFRS 16 within the fair value model, because fair value is not reliably determinable on a continuing basis. [Refer: At cost or in accordance with IFRS 16 within fair value model [member]; Investment property]

label: Range of estimates within which fair value is likely to lie for investment property, cost model
name: RangeOfEstimatesWithinWhichFairValueIsLikelyToLieForInvestmentPropertyCostModel
documentation: The range of estimates within which fair value is highly likely to lie for investment property measured using the cost model. [Refer: Investment property]

label: Ranges [member]
name: RangesMember
documentation: This member stands for aggregate ranges. It also represents the standard value for the 'Range' axis if no other member is used.

label: Ranges of exercise prices for outstanding share options [axis]
name: RangesOfExercisePricesForOutstandingShareOptionsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Ranges of exercise prices for outstanding share options [member]
name: RangesOfExercisePricesForOutstandingShareOptionsMember
documentation: This member stands for aggregated ranges of exercise prices for outstanding share options that are meaningful for assessing the number and timing of additional shares that may be issued and the cash that may be received upon exercise of those options. It also represents the standard value for the 'Ranges of exercise prices for outstanding share options' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Ranges [member]]

label: Rate of return used to reflect time value of money, regulatory deferral account balances
name: RateOfReturnUsedToReflectTimeValueOfMoneyRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalances
documentation: The rate of return used to reflect the time value of money that is applicable to regulatory deferral account balances. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]]

label: Rate-regulated activities [member]
name: RateregulatedActivitiesMember
documentation: This member stands for an entity’s activities that are subject to rate regulation. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of rate-regulated activities' axis if no other member is used.

label: Rated credit exposures
name: RatedCreditExposures
documentation: The amount of credit exposure that has been rated by external rating agencies. [Refer: Credit exposure]

label: Raw materials and consumables used
name: RawMaterialsAndConsumablesUsed
documentation: The amount of raw materials and consumables used in the production process or in the rendering of services. [Refer: Current raw materials]

label: Real estate, amount contributed to fair value of plan assets
name: PropertyAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The amount real estate contributes to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Real estate, percentage contributed to fair value of plan assets
name: RealEstatePercentageContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The percentage real estate contributes to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]] [Contrast: Real estate, amount contributed to fair value of plan assets]

label: Receipts from contracts held for dealing or trading purposes
name: ReceiptsFromContractsHeldForDealingOrTradingPurpose
documentation: The cash inflow from contracts held for dealing or trading purposes.

label: Receipts from premiums and claims, annuities and other policy benefits
name: ReceiptsFromPremiumsAndClaimsAnnuitiesAndOtherPolicyBenefits
documentation: The cash inflow from premiums and claims, annuities and other policy benefits.

label: Receipts from rents and subsequent sales of assets held for rental to others and subsequently held for sale
name: ReceiptsFromRentsAndSubsequentSalesOfSuchAssets
documentation: The cash inflow from rents and subsequent sales relating to assets initially held for rental to others and subsequently held for sale.

label: Receipts from royalties, fees, commissions and other revenue
name: ReceiptsFromRoyaltiesFeesCommissionsAndOtherRevenue
documentation: The cash inflow from royalties, fees, commissions and other revenue. [Refer: Other revenue]

label: Receipts from sales of goods and rendering of services
name: ReceiptsFromSalesOfGoodsAndRenderingOfServices
documentation: The cash inflow from sales of goods and rendering of services.

label: Receivables and payables related to insurance contracts
name: ReceivablesAndPayablesRelatedToInsuranceContracts
documentation: The amount of receivables and payables related to insurance contracts (amounts currently due to and from agents, brokers and policyholders related to insurance contracts).

label: Receivables due from associates
name: ReceivablesDueFromAssociates
documentation: The amount of receivables due from associates. [Refer: Associates [member]]

label: Receivables due from joint ventures
name: ReceivablesDueFromJointVentures
documentation: The amount of receivables due from joint ventures. [Refer: Joint ventures [member]]

label: Receivables due from related parties
