documentation: The amount of right-of-use assets for which fair value was used as their deemed cost in the opening IFRS statement of financial position. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

label: Right-of-use assets
name: RightofuseAssets
documentation: The amount of assets that represent a lessee's right to use an underlying asset for the lease term. Underlying asset is an asset that is the subject of a lease, for which the right to use that asset has been provided by a lessor to a lessee.

label: Right-of-use assets [member]
name: RightofuseAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for right-of-use assets. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

label: Right-of-use assets that do not meet definition of investment property
name: RightofuseAssetsThatDoNotMeetDefinitionOfInvestmentProperty
documentation: The amount of right-of-use assets that do not meet the definition of investment property. [Refer: Right-of-use assets; Investment property]

label: Right-of-use assets, increase (decrease) in revaluation surplus
name: RightofuseAssetsIncreaseDecreaseInRevaluationSurplus
documentation: The increase (decrease) in the revaluation surplus that relates to right-of-use assets. [Refer: Revaluation surplus; Right-of-use assets]

label: Right-of-use assets, revaluation surplus
name: RightofuseAssetsRevaluationSurplus
documentation: The amount of the revaluation surplus that relates to right-of-use assets. [Refer: Revaluation surplus; Right-of-use assets]

label: Right-of-use assets, revalued assets, at cost
name: RightofuseAssetsRevaluedAssetsAtCost
documentation: The amount of right-of-use assets that would have been recognised had the revalued assets been carried under the cost model. [Refer: Right-of-use assets]

label: Rights, preferences and restrictions attaching to class of share capital
name: RightsPreferencesAndRestrictionsAttachingToClassOfShareCapital
documentation: The description of the rights, preferences and restrictions attaching to a class of share capital including restrictions on the distribution of dividends and the repayment of capital. [Refer: Share capital [member]]

label: Risk adjustment for non-financial risk [member]
name: RiskAdjustmentForNonfinancialRiskMember
documentation: This member stands for the compensation an entity requires for bearing the uncertainty about the amount and timing of the cash flows that arises from non-financial risk as the entity fulfils insurance contracts.

label: Risk diversification effect [member]
name: RiskDiversificationEffectMember
documentation: This member stands for the effect of the diversification of risks arising from financial instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Risk exposure associated with instruments sharing characteristic
name: RiskExposureAssociatedWithInstrumentsSharingCharacteristic
documentation: The amount of risk exposure associated with financial instruments with a shared characteristic that identifies a concentration of risks. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Risk free interest rate, share options granted
name: DescriptionOfRiskFreeInterestRateShareOptionsGranted
documentation: The implied yield currently available on zero-coupon government issues of the country in whose currency the exercise price for share options granted is expressed, with a remaining term equal to the expected term of the option being valued (based on the option's remaining contractual life and taking into account the effects of expected early exercise). [Refer: Government [member]]

label: Risk variables [axis]
name: RiskExposuresAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Risk variables [member]
name: RiskExposuresMember
documentation: This member stands for the risk variables. It also represents the standard value for the 'Risk variables' axis if no other member is used.

label: Risks [member]
name: TypesOfRisksMember
documentation: This member stands for all types of risks. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of risks' axis if no other member is used.

label: Royalty expense
name: RoyaltyExpense
documentation: The amount of expense arising from royalties.

label: Royalty income
name: RevenueFromRoyalties
documentation: The amount of income arising from royalties.

label: Sale or issue of treasury shares
name: SaleOrIssueOfTreasuryShares
documentation: The increase in equity resulting from the sale or issue of treasury shares. [Refer: Treasury shares]

label: Sales and marketing expense
name: SalesAndMarketingExpense
documentation: The amount of expense relating to the marketing and selling of goods or services.

label: Sales channels [axis]
name: SalesChannelsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Sales channels [member]
name: SalesChannelsMember
documentation: This member stands for all sales channels. It also represents the standard value for the 'Sales channels' axis if no other member is used.

label: Sales of property and other assets, related party transactions
name: SalesOfPropertyAndOtherAssetsRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of property and other assets sold by the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Sales, fair value measurement, assets
name: SalesFairValueMeasurementAssets
documentation: The decrease in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from sales. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Sales, fair value measurement, entity's own equity instruments
name: SalesFairValueMeasurementEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The decrease in the fair value measurement of entity's own equity instruments resulting from sales. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Entity's own equity instruments [member]]

label: Sales, fair value measurement, liabilities
name: SalesFairValueMeasurementLiabilities
documentation: The decrease in the fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from sales. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Secured bank loans received
name: SecuredBankLoansReceived
documentation: The amount of loans received from banks that have been secured by collateral. [Refer: Loans received]

label: Securities lending [member]
name: SecuritiesLendingMember
documentation: This member stands for the lending of securities in which the lender transfers securities in exchange for collateral provided by the borrower.

label: Securitisation vehicles [member]
name: SecuritisationVehiclesMember
documentation: This member stands for vehicles used for the process of securitisation, whereby individual assets are pooled together and sold to a special purpose vehicle that issues debt instruments backed by the pool of assets.

label: Securitisations [member]
name: SecuritisationsMember
documentation: This member stands for securitisations, whereby individual assets are pooled together and sold to an entity that issues debt instruments backed by the pool of assets.

label: Segment consolidation items [axis]
name: SegmentConsolidationItemsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Segments [axis]
name: SegmentsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Segments [member]
name: SegmentsMember
documentation: This member stands for all segments of an entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Segments' axis if no other member is used.

label: Selling expense
name: SellingExpense
documentation: The amount of expense relating to selling activities of the entity.

label: Selling profit (loss) on finance leases
name: SellingProfitLossOnFinanceLeases
documentation: The selling profit (loss) on finance leases. Finance lease is a lease that transfers substantially all the risks and rewards incidental to ownership of an underlying asset.

label: Selling, general and administrative expense
name: SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense
documentation: The amount of expense relating to selling, general and administrative activities of the entity.

label: Selling, general and administrative expense [abstract]
name: SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpenseAbstract

label: Selling, general and administrative expense [member]
name: SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpenseMember
documentation: This member stands for the amount of expense relating to selling, general and administrative activities of the entity. This member is used to attribute an expense by nature to a functional line item in the statement of profit or loss.

label: Sensitivity analysis for types of market risk [text block]
name: SensitivityAnalysisForEachTypeOfMarketRisk
documentation: The disclosure of the sensitivity analysis for types of market risk to which the entity is exposed, showing how profit or loss and equity would have been affected by changes in the relevant risk variable that were reasonably possible at that date. [Refer: Market risk [member]]

label: Sensitivity analysis to insurance risk
name: SensitivityAnalysisToInsuranceRisk
documentation: The description of a sensitivity analysis that shows how profit (loss) and equity would have been affected if changes in the relevant insurance risk variable that were reasonably possible at the end of the reporting period had occurred, the methods and assumptions used in preparing the sensitivity analysis and any changes from the previous period in the methods and assumptions used.

label: Separate [member]
name: SeparateMember
documentation: This member stands for separate financial statements. Separate financial statements are those presented by an entity in which the entity could elect, subject to the requirements in IAS 27, to account for its investments in subsidiaries, joint ventures and associates either at cost, in accordance with IFRS 9, or using the equity method as described in IAS 28.

label: Separate management entities [axis]
name: SeparateManagementEntitiesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Separate management entities [member]
name: SeparateManagementEntitiesMember
documentation: This member stands for separate entities that provide key management personnel services to the entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Separate management entities' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

label: Service concession arrangements [axis]
name: ServiceConcessionArrangementsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Service concession arrangements [member]
name: ServiceConcessionArrangementsMember
documentation: This member stands for arrangements in which an entity (the operator) may enter into an arrangement with another entity (the grantor) to provide services that give the public access to major economic and social facilities. The grantor may be a public or private sector entity, including a governmental body. Examples of service concession arrangements involve water treatment and supply facilities, motorways, car parks, tunnels, bridges, airports and telecommunication networks. Examples of arrangements that are not service concession arrangements include an entity outsourcing the operation of its internal services (for example, employee cafeteria, building maintenance, and accounting or information technology functions). It also represents the standard value for the 'Service concession arrangements' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Government [member]]

label: Service concession rights [member]
name: ServiceConcessionRightsMember
documentation: This member stands for service concession rights. [Refer: Service concession arrangements [member]]

label: Services expense
name: ServicesExpense
documentation: The amount of expense arising from services.

label: Services received, related party transactions
name: ServicesReceivedRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of services received in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Settled liabilities, contingent liabilities recognised in business combination
name: SettledLiabilitiesContingentLiabilitiesRecognisedInBusinessCombination
documentation: The amount of contingent liabilities recognised in a business combination that were settled. [Refer: Contingent liabilities recognised in business combination]

label: Settlement of liabilities by entity on behalf of related party, related party transactions
name: SettlementOfLiabilitiesByEntityOnBehalfOfRelatedPartyRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of liabilities settled by the entity on behalf of a related party in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Settlement of liabilities on behalf of entity by related party, related party transactions
name: SettlementOfLiabilitiesOnBehalfOfEntityByRelatedPartyRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of liabilities settled on behalf of the entity by a related party in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Settlements, fair value measurement, assets
name: SettlementsFairValueMeasurementAssets
documentation: The decrease in the fair value measurement of assets resulting from settlements. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Settlements, fair value measurement, entity's own equity instruments
name: SettlementsFairValueMeasurementEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The decrease in the fair value measurement of the entity's own equity instruments resulting from settlements. [Refer: At fair value [member]; Entity's own equity instruments [member]]

label: Settlements, fair value measurement, liabilities
name: SettlementsFairValueMeasurementLiabilities
documentation: The decrease in the fair value measurement of liabilities resulting from settlements. [Refer: At fair value [member]]

label: Setup costs [member]
name: SetupCostsMember
documentation: This member stands for a category of assets recognised from the costs to obtain or fulfil contracts with customers representing the setup costs. [Refer: Assets recognised from costs to obtain or fulfil contracts with customers]

label: Seven years before reporting year [member]
name: SevenYearsBeforeReportingYearMember
documentation: This member stands for a year that ended seven years before the end of the reporting year.

label: Share capital [member]
name: ClassesOfShareCapitalMember
documentation: This member stands for share capital of the entity. It also represents the standard value for the 'Classes of share capital' axis if no other member is used.

label: Share issue related cost
name: ShareIssueRelatedCost
documentation: The amount of cost related to the issuance of shares.

label: Share of amount reclassified from profit or loss to other comprehensive income applying overlay approach, newly designated financial assets
name: ShareOfAmountReclassifiedFromProfitOrLossToOtherComprehensiveIncomeApplyingOverlayApproachNewlyDesignatedFinancialAssets
documentation: The entity's share of the amount reclassified from profit or loss to other comprehensive income relating to newly designated financial assets applying the overlay approach.

label: Share of amount reported in profit or loss applying IFRS 9, financial assets to which overlay approach is applied
name: ShareOfAmountReportedInProfitOrLossApplyingIFRS9FinancialAssetsToWhichOverlayApproachIsApplied
documentation: The entity's share of the amount reported in profit or loss applying IFRS 9 for financial assets to which the overlay approach is applied.

label: Share of amount that would have been reclassified from profit or loss to other comprehensive income applying overlay approach if financial assets had not been de-designated
name: ShareOfAmountThatWouldHaveBeenReclassifiedFromProfitOrLossToOtherComprehensiveIncomeApplyingOverlayApproachIfFinancialAssetsHadNotBeenDedesignated
documentation: The entity's share of the amount that would have been reclassified from profit or loss to other comprehensive income if financial assets had not been de-designated from the overlay approach.

label: Share of amount that would have been reported in profit or loss if IAS 39 had been applied, financial assets to which overlay approach is applied
name: ShareOfAmountThatWouldHaveBeenReportedInProfitOrLossIfIAS39HadBeenAppliedFinancialAssetsToWhichOverlayApproachIsApplied
documentation: The entity's share of the amount that would have been reported in profit or loss for financial assets to which the overlay approach is applied if IAS 39 had been applied.

label: Share of contingent liabilities of associates [member]
name: ShareOfContingentLiabilitiesOfAssociatesMember
documentation: This member stands for share of contingent liabilities of associates. [Refer: Associates [member]; Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Share of contingent liabilities of associates incurred jointly with other investors
name: ShareOfContingentLiabilitiesOfAssociatesIncurredJointlyWithOtherInvestors
documentation: The entity's share of contingent liabilities incurred jointly with other investors with significant influence over associates. [Refer: Associates [member]; Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Share of contingent liabilities of joint ventures incurred jointly with other investors
name: ShareOfContingentLiabilitiesIncurredJointlyWithOtherVenturers
documentation: The entity's share of contingent liabilities incurred jointly with other investors with joint control of the joint ventures. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]; Joint ventures [member]]

label: Share of debt instruments issued that are included in insurer's regulatory capital
name: ShareOfDebtInstrumentsIssuedThatAreIncludedInInsurersRegulatoryCapital
documentation: The entity's share of the amount of debt instruments issued that are included in the insurer's regulatory capital.

label: Share of deferred tax liabilities on liabilities arising from contracts within scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts
name: ShareOfDeferredTaxLiabilitiesOnLiabilitiesArisingFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS4AndNonderivativeInvestmentContracts
documentation: The entity's share of the amount of deferred tax liabilities on liabilities arising from the contracts within the scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts. [Refer: Deferred tax liabilities]

label: Share of derivative liabilities used to mitigate risks arising from assets backing contracts within scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts
name: ShareOfDerivativeLiabilitiesUsedToMitigateRisksArisingFromAssetsBackingContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS4AndNonderivativeInvestmentContracts
documentation: The entity's share of the amount of derivative liabilities used to mitigate risks arising from the assets backing the contracts within the scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

label: Share of derivative liabilities used to mitigate risks arising from contracts within scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts
name: ShareOfDerivativeLiabilitiesUsedToMitigateRisksArisingFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS4AndNonderivativeInvestmentContracts
documentation: The entity's share of the amount of derivative liabilities used to mitigate risks arising from the contracts within the scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

label: Share of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4 that do not have low credit risk, carrying amount applying IAS 39
name: ShareOfFinancialAssetsDescribedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4ThatDoNotHaveLowCreditRiskCarryingAmountApplyingIAS39
documentation: The entity's share of the carrying amount applying IAS 39 of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4 that do not have low credit risk. In case of financial assets measured at amortised cost, the amount should be before adjusting for any impairment allowances. [Refer: Financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value]

label: Share of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4 that do not have low credit risk, fair value
name: ShareOfFinancialAssetsDescribedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4ThatDoNotHaveLowCreditRiskFairValue
documentation: The entity's share of the fair value of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4 that do not have low credit risk. [Refer: Financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value]

label: Share of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, carrying amount applying IAS 39
name: ShareOfFinancialAssetsDescribedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4CarryingAmountApplyingIAS39
documentation: The entity's share of the carrying amount applying IAS 39 of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4. In case of financial assets measured at amortised cost, the amount should be before adjusting for any impairment allowances. [Refer: Financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value]

label: Share of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value
name: ShareOfFinancialAssetsDescribedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4FairValue
documentation: The entity's share of the fair value of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4. [Refer: Financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value]

label: Share of financial assets other than those specified in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value
name: ShareOfFinancialAssetsOtherThanThoseSpecifiedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4FairValue
documentation: The entity's share of the fair value of financial assets other than those described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4. [Refer: Financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value]

label: Share of financial assets to which overlay approach is applied
name: ShareOfFinancialAssetsToWhichOverlayApproachIsApplied
documentation: The entity's share of the amount of financial assets to which the overlay approach is applied. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Share of increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4
name: ShareOfIncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfFinancialAssetsDescribedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4
documentation: The entity's share of the increase (decrease) in the fair value of financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4. [Refer: Financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value]

label: Share of increase (decrease) in fair value of financial assets other than those specified in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4
name: ShareOfIncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfFinancialAssetsOtherThanThoseSpecifiedInParagraph39EaOfIFRS4
documentation: The entity's share of the increase (decrease) in the fair value of financial assets other than those described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4. [Refer: Financial assets described in paragraph 39E(a) of IFRS 4, fair value]

label: Share of liabilities that arise because insurer issues or fulfils obligations arising from contracts within scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts
name: ShareOfLiabilitiesThatAriseBecauseInsurerIssuesOrFulfilsObligationsArisingFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS4AndNonderivativeInvestmentContracts
documentation: The entity's share of the amount of liabilities that arise because an insurer issues, or fulfils obligations arising from, the contracts within the scope of IFRS 4 and non-derivative investment contracts.

label: Share of non-derivative investment contract liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss applying IAS 39
name: ShareOfNonderivativeInvestmentContractLiabilitiesMeasuredAtFairValueThroughProfitOrLossApplyingIAS39
documentation: The entity's share of the amount of non-derivative investment contract liabilities measured at fair value through profit or loss applying IAS 39. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

label: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax
name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
documentation: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax.

label: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax
name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
documentation: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax.

label: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax
name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossBeforeTax
documentation: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, before tax.

label: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax
name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodThatWillNotBeReclassifiedToProfitOrLossNetOfTax
documentation: Share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method that will not be reclassified to profit or loss, net of tax.

label: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, before tax
name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodBeforeTax
documentation: The entity's share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, before tax. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Other comprehensive income]

label: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, before tax [abstract]
name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodBeforeTaxAbstract

label: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, net of tax
name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The entity's share of the other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method, net of tax. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Other comprehensive income]

label: Share of other comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method, net of tax [abstract]
name: ShareOfOtherComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodNetOfTaxAbstract

label: Share of post-tax profit (loss) from discontinued operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
name: ShareOfProfitLossOfDiscontinuedOperationsOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The entity's share of the post-tax profit (loss) from discontinued operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Discontinued operations [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss) from discontinued operations]

label: Share of profit (loss) from continuing operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
name: ShareOfProfitLossOfContinuingOperationsOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The entity's share of the profit (loss) from continuing operations of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Continuing operations [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss) from continuing operations]

label: Share of profit (loss) of associates accounted for using equity method
name: ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of associates accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Profit (loss)]

label: Share of profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
name: ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss)]

label: Share of profit (loss) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method [abstract]
name: ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethodAbstract

label: Share of profit (loss) of joint ventures accounted for using equity method
name: ShareOfProfitLossOfJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The entity's share of the profit (loss) of joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Investments accounted for using equity method; Joint ventures [member]; Profit (loss)]

label: Share of reclassification adjustments on financial assets that have been de-designated from overlay approach, before tax
name: ShareOfReclassificationAdjustmentsOnFinancialAssetsThatHaveBeenDedesignatedFromOverlayApproachBeforeTax
documentation: The entity's share of the amount of reclassification adjustments related to financial assets that have been de-designated from the overlay approach during the reporting period, before tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Share of reclassification adjustments on financial assets that have been de-designated from overlay approach, net of tax
name: ShareOfReclassificationAdjustmentsOnFinancialAssetsThatHaveBeenDedesignatedFromOverlayApproachNetOfTax
documentation: The entity's share of the amount of reclassification adjustments related to financial assets that have been de-designated from the overlay approach during the reporting period, net of tax. Reclassification adjustments are amounts reclassified to profit (loss) in the current period that were recognised in other comprehensive income in the current or previous periods. [Refer: Other comprehensive income]

label: Share of total comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
name: ShareOfTotalComprehensiveIncomeOfAssociatesAndJointVenturesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod
documentation: The entity's share of the total comprehensive income of associates and joint ventures accounted for using the equity method. [Refer: Associates [member]; Joint ventures [member]; Investments accounted for using equity method]

label: Share premium
name: SharePremium
documentation: The amount received or receivable from the issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value.

label: Share premium [member]
name: SharePremiumMember
documentation: This member stands for the amount received or receivable from issuance of the entity's shares in excess of nominal value.

label: Share-based payment arrangements [member]
name: SharebasedPaymentArrangementsMember
documentation: This member stands for an agreement between the entity or another group entity or any shareholder of the group entity and another party (including an employee) that entitles the other party to receive (a) cash or other assets of the entity for amounts that are based on the price (or value) of equity instruments (including shares or share options) of the entity or another group entity; or (b) equity instruments (including shares or share options) of the entity or another group entity, provided that the specified vesting conditions, if any, are met. It also represents the standard value for the 'Types of share-based payment arrangements' axis if no other member is used.

label: Ships
name: Ships
documentation: The amount of property, plant and equipment representing seafaring or other maritime vessels used in the entity's operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Ships [member]
name: ShipsMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing seafaring vessels used in the entity's operations. [Refer: Property, plant and equipment]

label: Short-term borrowings [member]
name: ShorttermBorrowingsMember
documentation: This member stands for short-term borrowings. [Refer: Borrowings]

label: Short-term contracts [member]
name: ShorttermContractsMember
documentation: This member stands for short-term contracts with customers.

label: Short-term deposits, classified as cash equivalents
name: ShorttermDepositsClassifiedAsCashEquivalents
documentation: A classification of cash equivalents representing short-term deposits. [Refer: Cash equivalents]

label: Short-term deposits, not classified as cash equivalents
name: ShorttermDepositsNotClassifiedAsCashEquivalents
documentation: The amount of short-term deposits held by the entity that are not classified as cash equivalents. [Refer: Cash equivalents]

label: Short-term employee benefits accruals
name: ShorttermEmployeeBenefitsAccruals
documentation: The amount of accruals for employee benefits (other than termination benefits) that are expected to be settled wholly within twelve months after the end of the annual reporting period in which the employees render the related services. [Refer: Accruals classified as current]

label: Short-term employee benefits expense
name: ShorttermEmployeeBenefitsExpense
documentation: The amount of expense from employee benefits (other than termination benefits) that are expected to be settled wholly within twelve months after the end of the annual reporting period in which the employees render the related services.

label: Short-term employee benefits expense [abstract]
name: ShorttermEmployeeBenefitsExpenseAbstract

label: Short-term investments, classified as cash equivalents
name: ShorttermInvestmentsClassifiedAsCashEquivalents
documentation: A classification of cash equivalents representing short-term investments. [Refer: Cash equivalents]

label: Significant interest rate benchmarks subject to interest rate benchmark reform [member]
name: SignificantInterestRateBenchmarksSubjectToInterestRateBenchmarkReformMember
documentation: This member stands for all significant interest rate benchmarks that are subject to interest rate benchmark reform.

label: Significant unobservable input, assets
name: SignificantUnobservableInputAssets
documentation: The value of significant unobservable input used in the measurement of the fair value of assets.

label: Significant unobservable input, entity's own equity instruments
name: SignificantUnobservableInputEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The value of significant unobservable input used in the measurement of the fair value of entity's own equity instruments.

label: Significant unobservable input, liabilities
name: SignificantUnobservableInputLiabilities
documentation: The value of significant unobservable input used in the measurement of the fair value of liabilities.

label: Six years before reporting year [member]
name: SixYearsBeforeReportingYearMember
documentation: This member stands for a year that ended six years before the end of the reporting year.

label: Social security contributions
name: SocialSecurityContributions
documentation: A class of employee benefits expense that represents social security contributions. [Refer: Employee benefits expense]

label: State defined benefit plans [member]
name: StateDefinedBenefitPlansMember
documentation: This member stands for defined benefit plans that are established by legislation to cover all entities (or all entities in a particular category) and are operated by national or local government or by another body that is not subject to control or influence by the reporting entity. [Refer: Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Statement of IFRS compliance [text block]
name: StatementOfIFRSCompliance
documentation: An explicit and unreserved statement of compliance with all the requirements of IFRSs.

label: Statement of cash flows placeholder - this item MUST be used as a starting point for the statement of cash flows
name: StatementOfCashFlowsAbstract

label: Statement of changes in equity [line items]
name: StatementOfChangesInEquityLineItems
documentation: Line items represent concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with members defined in one or many axes of the table.

label: Statement of changes in equity [table]
name: StatementOfChangesInEquityTable
documentation: Schedule disclosing information related to changes in equity.

label: Statement of changes in equity placeholder - this item MUST be used as a starting point for the statement of changes in equity
name: StatementOfChangesInEquityAbstract

label: Statement of changes in net assets available for benefits [abstract]
name: StatementOfChangesInNetAssetsAvailableForBenefitsAbstract

label: Statement of comprehensive income placeholder - this item MUST be used as a starting point for the statement of comprehensive income if it is disclosed separately or when the statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income statements are combined in a single statement
name: StatementOfComprehensiveIncomeAbstract

label: Statement of financial position placeholder - this item MUST be used as a starting point for the statement of financial position
name: StatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract

label: Statement of profit or loss and other comprehensive income [abstract]
name: StatementOfProfitOrLossAndOtherComprehensiveIncomeAbstract

label: Statement that comparative information does not comply with IFRS 7 and IFRS 9
name: StatementThatComparativeInformationDoesNotComplyWithIFRS7AndIFRS9
documentation: The statement that comparative information does not comply with IFRS 7 and IFRS 9.

label: Statement that entity applies paragraph 20 of IFRS 17 in determining groups of insurance contracts
name: StatementThatEntityAppliesParagraph20OfIFRS17InDeterminingGroupsOfInsuranceContracts
documentation: The statement that the entity applies paragraph 20 of IFRS 17 in determining the groups of insurance contracts to which it applies the recognition and measurement requirements in IFRS 17. [Refer: Insurance contracts [member]]

label: Statement that entity does not disclose previously unpublished information about claims development that occurred earlier than five years before end of annual reporting period in which it first applies IFRS 17
name: StatementThatEntityDoesNotDisclosePreviouslyUnpublishedInformationAboutClaimsDevelopmentThatOccurredEarlierThanFiveYearsBeforeEndOfAnnualReportingPeriodInWhichItFirstAppliesIFRS17
documentation: The statement that the entity does not disclose previously unpublished information about claims development that occurred earlier than five years before the end of the annual reporting period in which it first applies IFRS 17.

label: Statement that entity elected to use exemption that permits entity to retain accounting policies for financial instruments applied by associate or joint venture when applying equity method
name: StatementThatEntityElectedToUseExemptionThatPermitsEntityToRetainAccountingPoliciesForFinancialInstrumentsAppliedByAssociateOrJointVentureWhenApplyingEquityMethod
documentation: The statement that an entity elected to use the exemption that permits the entity to retain the accounting policies for financial instruments applied by an associate or joint venture when applying the equity method.

label: Statement that entity has chosen practical expedient when assessing whether contract is, or contains, lease at date of initial application of IFRS 16
name: StatementThatEntityHasChosenPracticalExpedientWhenAssessingWhetherContractIsOrContainsLeaseAtDateOfInitialApplicationOfIFRS16
documentation: The statement that the entity has chosen the practical expedient in paragraph C3 of IFRS 16 when assessing whether a contract is, or contains, a lease at the date of initial application of IFRS 16.

label: Statement that insurer is applying overlay approach
name: StatementThatInsurerIsApplyingOverlayApproach
documentation: The statement that an insurer is applying the overlay approach.

label: Statement that insurer is applying temporary exemption from IFRS 9
name: StatementThatInsurerIsApplyingTemporaryExemptionFromIFRS9
documentation: The statement that an insurer is applying the temporary exemption from IFRS 9.

label: Statement that insurer no longer qualifies to apply temporary exemption from IFRS 9
name: StatementThatInsurerNoLongerQualifiesToApplyTemporaryExemptionFromIFRS9
documentation: The statement that an insurer no longer qualifies to apply the temporary exemption from IFRS 9.

label: Statement that investment entity is required to apply exception from consolidation
name: StatementThatInvestmentEntityIsRequiredToApplyExceptionFromConsolidation
documentation: The statement that the investment entity is required to apply an exception from consolidation. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]]

label: Statement that investment entity prepares separate financial statements as its only financial statements
name: StatementThatInvestmentEntityPreparesSeparateFinancialStatementsAsItsOnlyFinancialStatements
documentation: The statement that an investment entity prepares separate financial statements as its only financial statements. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Separate [member]]

label: Statement that lessee accounts for leases of low-value assets using recognition exemption
name: StatementThatLesseeAccountsForLeasesOfLowvalueAssetsUsingRecognitionExemption
documentation: The statement that the lessee accounts for leases of low-value assets using the recognition exemption in paragraph 6 of IFRS 16.

label: Statement that lessee accounts for short-term leases using recognition exemption
name: StatementThatLesseeAccountsForShorttermLeasesUsingRecognitionExemption
documentation: The statement that the lessee accounts for short-term leases using the recognition exemption in paragraph 6 of IFRS 16. Short-term lease is a lease that, at the commencement date, has a lease term of 12 months or less. A lease that contains a purchase option is not a short-term lease.

label: Statement that lessee applied practical expedient in paragraph 46A of IFRS 16 to all rent concessions occurring as direct consequence of covid-19 pandemic that meet conditions in paragraph 46B of IFRS 16
name: StatementThatLesseeAppliedPracticalExpedientInParagraph46AOfIFRS16ToAllRentConcessionsOccurringAsDirectConsequenceOfCovid19PandemicThatMeetConditionsInParagraph46BOfIFRS16
documentation: The statement that the lessee has applied the practical expedient in paragraph 46A of IFRS 16 to all the rent concessions occurring as direct consequence of covid-19 pandemic that meet the conditions in paragraph 46B of IFRS 16.

label: Statement that lessee uses practical expedients when applying IFRS 16 retrospectively to leases classified as operating leases applying IAS 17
name: StatementThatLesseeUsesPracticalExpedientsWhenApplyingIFRS16RetrospectivelyToLeasesClassifiedAsOperatingLeasesApplyingIAS17
documentation: The statement that the lessee uses one or more of the specified practical expedients in paragraph C10 of IFRS 16 when applying IFRS 16 retrospectively in accordance with paragraph C5(b) to leases classified as operating leases applying IAS 17.

label: Statement that practical expedient about existence of significant financing component has been used
name: StatementThatPracticalExpedientAboutExistenceOfSignificantFinancingComponentHasBeenUsed
documentation: The statement that the practical expedient about the existence of a significant financing component in a contract with a customer has been used.

label: Statement that practical expedient about incremental costs of obtaining contract has been used
name: StatementThatPracticalExpedientAboutIncrementalCostsOfObtainingContractHasBeenUsed
documentation: The statement that the practical expedient about the incremental costs of obtaining a contract with a customer has been used.

label: Statement that rate regulator is related party
name: StatementThatRateRegulatorIsRelatedParty
documentation: The statement that the rate regulator is a related party to the entity. [Refer: Description of identity of rate regulator(s); Related parties [member]]

label: Statement that regulatory deferral account balance is no longer fully recoverable or reversible
name: StatementThatRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalanceIsNoLongerFullyRecoverableOrReversible
documentation: The statement that a regulatory deferral account balance is no longer fully recoverable or reversible. [Refer: Regulatory deferral account balances [member]]

label: Statement that there were no transfers between Level 1 and Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, assets
name: StatementThatThereWereNoTransfersBetweenLevel1AndLevel2OfFairValueHierarchyAssets
documentation: The statement that there were no transfers between Level 1 and Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of assets during the year.

label: Statement that there were no transfers between Level 1 and Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments
name: StatementThatThereWereNoTransfersBetweenLevel1AndLevel2OfFairValueHierarchyEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The statement that there were no transfers between Level 1 and Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of the entity's own equity instruments during the year.

label: Statement that there were no transfers between Level 1 and Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
name: StatementThatThereWereNoTransfersBetweenLevel1AndLevel2OfFairValueHierarchyLiabilities
documentation: The statement that there were no transfers between Level 1 and Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of liabilities during the year.

label: Statement that there were no transfers between Level 1, Level 2 or Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, assets
name: StatementThatThereWereNoTransfersBetweenLevel1Level2OrLevel3OfFairValueHierarchyAssets
documentation: The statement that there were no transfers between Level 1, Level 2 or Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy of assets during the year.

label: Statement that there were no transfers between Level 1, Level 2 or Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments
name: StatementThatThereWereNoTransfersBetweenLevel1Level2OrLevel3OfFairValueHierarchyEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The statement that there were no transfers between Level 1, Level 2 or Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy of the entity's own equity instruments during the year.

label: Statement that there were no transfers between Level 1, Level 2 or Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
name: StatementThatThereWereNoTransfersBetweenLevel1Level2OrLevel3OfFairValueHierarchyLiabilities
documentation: The statement that there were no transfers between Level 1, Level 2 or Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy of liabilities during the year.

label: Statement that unadjusted comparative information has been prepared on different basis
name: StatementThatUnadjustedComparativeInformationHasBeenPreparedOnDifferentBasis
documentation: The statement that unadjusted comparative information in the financial statements has been prepared on a different basis.

label: Statutory reserve
name: StatutoryReserve
documentation: A component of equity representing reserves created based on legal requirements.

label: Statutory reserve [member]
name: StatutoryReserveMember
documentation: This member stands for a component of equity representing reserves created based on legal requirements.

label: Structured debt, amount contributed to fair value of plan assets
name: StructuredDebtAmountContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The amount debt that has been structured to meet a particular investment objective contributes to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]]

label: Structured debt, percentage contributed to fair value of plan assets
name: StructuredDebtPercentageContributedToFairValueOfPlanAssets
documentation: The percentage debt that has been structured to meet a particular investment objective contributes to the fair value of defined benefit plan assets. [Refer: Plan assets, at fair value; Defined benefit plans [member]] [Contrast: Structured debt, amount contributed to fair value of plan assets]

label: Subclassifications of assets, liabilities and equities [abstract]
name: SubclassificationsOfAssetsLiabilitiesAndEquitiesAbstract

label: Subordinated liabilities
name: SubordinatedLiabilities
documentation: The amount of liabilities that are subordinate to other liabilities with respect to claims.

label: Subordinated liabilities [abstract]
name: SubordinatedLiabilitiesAbstract

label: Subscription circulation revenue
name: SubscriptionCirculationRevenue
documentation: The amount of circulation revenue derived from subscriptions. [Refer: Revenue; Circulation revenue]

label: Subsequent recognition of deferred tax assets, goodwill
name: SubsequentRecognitionOfDeferredTaxAssetsGoodwill
documentation: The decrease in goodwill resulting from the subsequent recognition of deferred tax assets during the measurement period for a business combination. [Refer: Goodwill; Deferred tax assets; Business combinations [member]]

label: Subsidiaries [axis]
name: SignificantInvestmentsInSubsidiariesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Subsidiaries [member]
name: SubsidiariesMember
documentation: This member stands for entities that are controlled by another entity.

label: Subsidiaries with material non-controlling interests [member]
name: SubsidiariesWithMaterialNoncontrollingInterestsMember
documentation: This member stands for subsidiaries that have non-controlling interests that are material to the reporting entity. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Non-controlling interests]

label: Summary quantitative data about entity's exposure to risk [text block]
name: SummaryQuantitativeDataAboutEntitysExposureToRisk
documentation: The disclosure of summary quantitative data about the entity's exposure to risks arising from financial instruments. This disclosure shall be based on the information provided internally to key management personnel of the entity, for example, the entity’s board of directors or chief executive officer. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]; Key management personnel of entity or parent [member]]

label: Summary quantitative data about puttable financial instruments classified as equity instruments
name: SummaryQuantitativeDataAboutPuttableFinancialInstrumentsClassifiedAsEquityInstruments
documentation: Summary quantitative data about puttable financial instruments classified as equity instruments. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Summary quantitative data about what entity manages as capital
name: SummaryOfQuantitativeDataAboutWhatEntityManagesAsCapital
documentation: Summary quantitative data about what the entity manages as capital.

label: Summary quantitative information about exposure to risk that arises from contracts within scope of IFRS 17 [text block]
name: SummaryQuantitativeInformationAboutExposureToRiskThatArisesFromContractsWithinScopeOfIFRS17Explanatory
documentation: The disclosure of summary quantitative information about an entity's exposure to risk that arises from contracts within the scope of IFRS 17.

label: Support provided to structured entity without having contractual obligation to do so
name: SupportProvidedToStructuredEntityWithoutHavingContractualObligationToDoSo
documentation: The amount of financial or other support (for example, purchasing assets of, or instruments issued by, the structured entity) provided to a structured entity without having a contractual obligation to do so, including assistance in obtaining financial support. [Refer: Subsidiaries [member]; Unconsolidated structured entities [member]]

label: Support provided to subsidiary by investment entity or its subsidiaries without having contractual obligation to do so
name: SupportProvidedToSubsidiaryWithoutHavingContractualObligationToDoSo
documentation: The amount of support provided to a subsidiary by the investment entity or its subsidiaries without having a contractual obligation to do so. [Refer: Disclosure of investment entities [text block]; Subsidiaries [member]]

label: Surplus (deficit) in plan
name: SurplusDeficitInPlan
documentation: The fair value of any plan assets, less the present value of the defined benefit obligation. [Refer: Plan assets [member]]

label: Surplus (deficit) in plan [abstract]
name: SurplusDeficitInPlanAbstract

label: Swap contract [member]
name: SwapContractMember
documentation: This member stands for a derivative financial instrument that involves the exchange of cash flow streams between the parties of the contract over a specified period. [Refer: Derivatives [member]]

label: Tangible exploration and evaluation assets
name: TangibleExplorationAndEvaluationAssets
documentation: The amount of exploration and evaluation assets recognised as tangible assets in accordance with the entity's accounting policy. [Refer: Exploration and evaluation assets [member]]

label: Tangible exploration and evaluation assets [member]
name: TangibleExplorationAndEvaluationAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of property, plant and equipment representing tangible exploration and evaluation assets. [Refer: Exploration and evaluation assets [member]]

label: Tax benefit arising from previously unrecognised tax loss, tax credit or temporary difference of prior period used to reduce current tax expense
name: TaxBenefitArisingFromPreviouslyUnrecognisedTaxLossTaxCreditOrTemporaryDifferenceOfPriorPeriodUsedToReduceCurrentTaxExpense
documentation: The amount of benefit arising from a previously unrecognised tax loss, tax credit or temporary difference of a prior period that is used to reduce current tax expense. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax losses [member]; Unused tax credits [member]]

label: Tax benefit arising from previously unrecognised tax loss, tax credit or temporary difference of prior period used to reduce deferred tax expense
name: TaxBenefitArisingFromPreviouslyUnrecognisedTaxLossTaxCreditOrTemporaryDifferenceOfPriorPeriodUsedToReduceDeferredTaxExpense
documentation: The amount of benefit arising from a previously unrecognised tax loss, tax credit or temporary difference of a prior period that is used to reduce deferred tax expense. [Refer: Deferred tax expense (income); Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax losses [member]; Unused tax credits [member]]

label: Tax contingent liability [member]
name: TaxContingentLiabilityMember
documentation: This member stands for a contingent liability for taxes. [Refer: Contingent liabilities [member]]

label: Tax effect from change in tax rate
name: TaxEffectFromChangeInTaxRate
documentation: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to changes in the tax rate. [Refer: Accounting profit]

label: Tax effect of expense not deductible in determining taxable profit (tax loss)
name: TaxEffectOfExpenseNotDeductibleInDeterminingTaxableProfitTaxLoss
documentation: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to expenses not deductible in determining taxable profit (tax loss). [Refer: Accounting profit]

label: Tax effect of foreign tax rates
name: TaxEffectOfForeignTaxRates
documentation: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to foreign tax rates. [Refer: Accounting profit]

label: Tax effect of impairment of goodwill
name: TaxEffectOfImpairmentOfGoodwill
documentation: The amount representing the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to impairment of goodwill. [Refer: Accounting profit; Goodwill]

label: Tax effect of revenues exempt from taxation
name: TaxEffectOfRevenuesExemptFromTaxation2011
documentation: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to revenues that are exempt from taxation. [Refer: Accounting profit]

label: Tax effect of tax losses
name: TaxEffectOfTaxLosses
documentation: The amount that represents the difference between the tax expense (income) and the product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s) that relates to tax losses. [Refer: Accounting profit]

label: Tax expense (income)
name: IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations
documentation: The aggregate amount included in the determination of profit (loss) for the period in respect of current tax and deferred tax. [Refer: Current tax expense (income); Deferred tax expense (income)]

label: Tax expense (income) at applicable tax rate
name: TaxExpenseIncomeAtApplicableTaxRate
documentation: The product of the accounting profit multiplied by the applicable tax rate(s). [Refer: Accounting profit; Applicable tax rate]

label: Tax expense (income) of discontinued operation [abstract]
name: TaxExpenseOfDiscontinuedOperationAbstract

label: Tax expense (income) relating to changes in accounting policies and errors included in profit or loss
name: TaxExpenseIncomeRelatingToChangesInAccountingPoliciesAndErrorsIncludedInProfitOrLoss
documentation: The amount of tax expense or income relating to changes in accounting policies and errors that are included in profit or loss in accordance with IAS 8, because they cannot be accounted for retrospectively.

label: Tax expense (income) relating to gain (loss) on discontinuance
name: TaxExpenseRelatingToGainLossOnDiscontinuance
documentation: The tax expense (income) relating to the gain (loss) on discontinuance when operations are discontinued. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]]

label: Tax expense (income) relating to profit (loss) from ordinary activities of discontinued operations
name: TaxExpenseRelatingToProfitLossFromOrdinaryActivitiesOfDiscontinuedOperations
documentation: The tax expense (income) relating to the profit (loss) arising from ordinary activities of discontinued operations. [Refer: Discontinued operations [member]; Profit (loss)]

label: Tax expense other than income tax expense
name: TaxExpenseOtherThanIncomeTaxExpense
documentation: The amount of tax expense exclusive of income tax expense.

label: Tax rate effect from change in tax rate
name: TaxRateEffectFromChangeInTaxRate
documentation: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from a change in tax rate. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

label: Tax rate effect of adjustments for current tax of prior periods
name: TaxRateEffectOfAdjustmentsForCurrentTaxOfPriorPeriods
documentation: Tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from adjustments for the current tax of prior periods. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate; Adjustments for current tax of prior periods]

label: Tax rate effect of expense not deductible in determining taxable profit (tax loss)
name: TaxRateEffectOfExpenseNotDeductibleInDeterminingTaxableProfitTaxLoss
documentation: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from the expenses not deductible in determining taxable profit. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

label: Tax rate effect of foreign tax rates
name: TaxRateEffectOfForeignTaxRates
documentation: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from the application of foreign tax rates. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

label: Tax rate effect of impairment of goodwill
name: TaxRateEffectOfImpairmentOfGoodwill
documentation: Tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from the impairment of goodwill. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate; Goodwill]

label: Tax rate effect of revenues exempt from taxation
name: TaxRateEffectOfRevenuesExemptFromTaxation
documentation: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from revenue that is exempt from taxation. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

label: Tax rate effect of tax losses
name: TaxRateEffectOfTaxLosses
documentation: The tax rate effect on the reconciliation between the average effective tax rate and the applicable tax rate resulting from tax losses. [Refer: Average effective tax rate; Applicable tax rate]

label: Taxation-related regulatory deferral account balances [member]
name: TaxationrelatedRegulatoryDeferralAccountBalancesMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of regulatory deferral account balances that relates to taxation. [Refer: Classes of regulatory deferral account balances [member]]

label: Technology-based intangible assets [member]
name: TechnologybasedIntangibleAssetsMember
documentation: This member stands for a class of intangible assets representing assets based on technology. Such assets may include patented and unpatented technology, databases as well as trade secrets. [Refer: Intangible assets other than goodwill]

label: Technology-based intangible assets recognised as of acquisition date
name: TechnologybasedIntangibleAssetsRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
documentation: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for technology-based intangible assets acquired in a business combination. [Refer: Technology-based intangible assets [member]; Business combinations [member]]

label: Temporary difference, unused tax losses and unused tax credits [axis]
name: TemporaryDifferenceUnusedTaxLossesAndUnusedTaxCreditsAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Temporary difference, unused tax losses and unused tax credits [member]
name: TemporaryDifferenceUnusedTaxLossesAndUnusedTaxCreditsMember
documentation: This member stands for temporary differences, unused tax losses and unused tax credits. It also represents the standard value for the 'Temporary difference, unused tax losses and unused tax credits' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Temporary differences [member]; Unused tax credits [member]; Unused tax losses [member]]

label: Temporary differences [member]
name: TemporaryDifferenceMember
documentation: This member stands for differences between the carrying amount of an asset or liability in the statement of financial position and its tax base. Temporary differences may be either: (a) taxable temporary differences; or (b) deductible temporary differences. [Refer: Carrying amount [member]]

label: Temporary differences associated with investments in subsidiaries, branches and associates and interests in joint arrangements for which deferred tax liabilities have not been recognised
name: TemporaryDifferencesAssociatedWithInvestmentsInSubsidiariesBranchesAndAssociatesAndInterestsInJointVentures
documentation: The aggregate amount of temporary differences associated with investments in subsidiaries, branches and associates and interests in joint arrangements, for which deferred tax liabilities have not been recognised as a result of satisfying both of the following conditions: (a) the parent, investor, joint venturer or joint operator is able to control the timing of the reversal of the temporary difference; and (b) it is probable that the temporary difference will not reverse in the foreseeable future. [Refer: Associates [member]; Subsidiaries [member]; Temporary differences [member]; Investments in subsidiaries reported in separate financial statements]

label: Termination benefits expense
name: TerminationBenefitsExpense
documentation: The amount of expense in relation to termination benefits. Termination benefits are employee benefits provided in exchange for the termination of an employee's employment as a result of either: (a) an entity's decision to terminate an employee's employment before the normal retirement date; or (b) an employee's decision to accept an offer of benefits in exchange for the termination of employment. [Refer: Employee benefits expense]

label: Three years before reporting year [member]
name: ThreeYearsBeforeReportingYearMember
documentation: This member stands for a year that ended three years before the end of the reporting year.

label: Time-and-materials contracts [member]
name: TimeandmaterialsContractsMember
documentation: This member stands for time-and-materials contracts with customers.

label: Timing of transfer of goods or services [axis]
name: TimingOfTransferOfGoodsOrServicesAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Timing of transfer of goods or services [member]
name: TimingOfTransferOfGoodsOrServicesMember
documentation: This member stands for all timings of the transfer of goods or services in contracts with customers. It also represents the standard value for the 'Timing of transfer of goods or services' axis if no other member is used.

label: Title of initially applied IFRS
name: TitleOfInitiallyAppliedIFRS
documentation: The title of an initially applied IFRS. [Refer: IFRSs [member]]

label: Title of new IFRS
name: TitleOfNewIFRS
documentation: The title of a new IFRS that has been issued but is not yet effective.

label: Top of range [member]
name: TopOfRangeMember
documentation: This member stands for top of a range.

label: Trade and other current payables
name: TradeAndOtherCurrentPayables
documentation: The amount of current trade payables and current other payables. [Refer: Current trade payables; Other current payables]

label: Trade and other current payables [abstract]
name: TradeAndOtherCurrentPayablesAbstract

label: Trade and other current receivables
name: TradeAndOtherCurrentReceivables
documentation: The amount of current trade receivables and current other receivables. [Refer: Current trade receivables; Other current receivables]

label: Trade and other current receivables [abstract]
name: TradeAndOtherCurrentReceivablesAbstract

label: Trade and other non-current payables
name: NoncurrentPayables
documentation: The amount of non-current trade payables and non-current other payables. [Refer: Other non-current payables; Non-current trade payables]

label: Trade and other non-current payables [abstract]
name: NoncurrentPayablesAbstract

label: Trade and other non-current receivables
name: NoncurrentReceivables
documentation: The amount of non-current trade receivables and non-current other receivables. [Refer: Non-current trade receivables; Other non-current receivables]

label: Trade and other non-current receivables [abstract]
name: NoncurrentReceivablesAbstract

label: Trade and other payables
name: TradeAndOtherPayables
documentation: The amount of trade payables and other payables. [Refer: Trade payables; Other payables]

label: Trade and other payables [abstract]
name: TradeAndOtherPayablesAbstract

label: Trade and other payables recognised as of acquisition date
name: TradeAndOtherPayablesRecognisedAsOfAcquisitionDate
documentation: The amount recognised as of the acquisition date for trade and other payables assumed in a business combination. [Refer: Trade and other payables; Business combinations [member]]

label: Trade and other payables, undiscounted cash flows
name: TradeAndOtherPayablesUndiscountedCashFlows
documentation: The amount of contractual undiscounted cash flows in relation to trade and other payables. [Refer: Trade and other payables]

label: Trade and other receivables
name: TradeAndOtherReceivables
documentation: The amount of trade receivables and other receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables; Other receivables]

label: Trade and other receivables [abstract]
name: TradeAndOtherReceivablesAbstract

label: Trade payables
name: TradeAndOtherPayablesToTradeSuppliers
documentation: The amount of payment due to suppliers for goods and services used in the entity's business.

label: Trade receivables
name: TradeReceivables
documentation: The amount due from customers for goods and services sold.

label: Trade receivables [member]
name: TradeReceivablesMember
documentation: This member stands for trade receivables. [Refer: Trade receivables]

label: Trading equity securities [member]
name: TradingEquitySecuritiesMember
documentation: This member stands for equity instruments that (a) are acquired or incurred principally for the purpose of selling or repurchasing it in the near term; or (b) on initial recognition are part of a portfolio of identified financial instruments that are managed together and for which there is evidence of a recent actual pattern of short-term profit-taking.

label: Trading income (expense)
name: TradingIncomeExpense
documentation: The amount of income (expense) relating to trading assets and liabilities.

label: Trading income (expense) [abstract]
name: TradingIncomeExpenseAbstract

label: Trading income (expense) on debt instruments
name: TradingIncomeExpenseOnDebtInstruments
documentation: The amount of trading income (expense) relating to debt instruments. [Refer: Debt instruments held; Trading income (expense)]

label: Trading income (expense) on derivative financial instruments
name: TradingIncomeExpenseOnDerivativeFinancialInstruments
documentation: The amount of trading income (expense) relating to derivative financial instruments. [Refer: Derivatives [member]; Trading income (expense)]

label: Trading income (expense) on equity instruments
name: TradingIncomeExpenseOnEquityInstruments
documentation: The amount of trading income (expense) relating to equity instruments. [Refer: Equity instruments held; Trading income (expense)]

label: Trading income (expense) on foreign exchange contracts
name: TradingIncomeExpenseOnForeignExchangeContracts
documentation: The amount of trading income (expense) relating to foreign exchange contracts. [Refer: Trading income (expense)]

label: Trading securities [member]
name: TradingSecuritiesMember
documentation: This member stands for financial instruments that (a) are acquired or incurred principally for the purpose of selling or repurchasing it in the near term; or (b) on initial recognition are part of a portfolio of identified financial instruments that are managed together and for which there is evidence of a recent actual pattern of short-term profit-taking. [Refer: Financial instruments, class [member]]

label: Transaction price allocated to remaining performance obligations
name: TransactionPriceAllocatedToRemainingPerformanceObligations
documentation: The amount of the transaction price allocated to the performance obligations that are unsatisfied (or partially unsatisfied) as of the end of the reporting period. The transaction price is the amount of consideration to which an entity expects to be entitled in exchange for transferring promised goods or services to a customer, excluding amounts collected on behalf of third parties (for example, some sales taxes). [Refer: Performance obligations [member]]

label: Transactions recognised separately from acquisition of assets and assumption of liabilities in business combination [axis]
name: TransactionsRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombinationAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Transactions recognised separately from acquisition of assets and assumption of liabilities in business combination [member]
name: TransactionsRecognisedSeparatelyFromAcquisitionOfAssetsAndAssumptionOfLiabilitiesInBusinessCombinationMember
documentation: This member stands for transactions that are recognised separately from the acquisition of assets and assumption of liabilities in business combinations. It also represents the standard value for the 'Transactions recognised separately from acquisition of assets and assumption of liabilities in business combination' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Business combinations [member]]

label: Transfer between financial liabilities and equity attributable to change in redemption prohibition
name: TransferBetweenFinancialLiabilitiesAndEquityAttributableToChangeInRedemptionProhibition
documentation: The amount transferred between financial liabilities and the equity attributable to a change in the redemption prohibition.

label: Transfer from (to) inventories and owner-occupied property, investment property
name: TransferFromToInventoriesAndOwnerOccupiedPropertyInvestmentProperty
documentation: The amount transferred from (to) inventories and owner-occupied property to (from) investment property. [Refer: Inventories; Investment property]

label: Transfer from investment property under construction or development, investment property
name: TransferFromInvestmentPropertyUnderConstructionOrDevelopmentInvestmentProperty
documentation: The amount transferred from investment property under construction or development to completed investment property. [Refer: Investment property]

label: Transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety [axis]
name: FinancialAssetsWhichDoNotQualifyForDerecognitionAxis
documentation: The axis of a table defines the relationship between the members in the table and the line items or concepts that complete the table.

label: Transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety [member]
name: FinancialAssetsWhichDoNotQualifyForDerecognitionMember
documentation: This member stands for transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety. It also represents the standard value for the 'Transferred financial assets that are not derecognised in their entirety' axis if no other member is used. [Refer: Financial assets]

label: Transfers from (to) other retirement benefit plans
name: TransfersFromToOtherRetirementBenefitPlans
documentation: The increase (decrease) in net assets available for benefits resulting from transfers from (to) other retirement benefit plans. [Refer: Assets (liabilities) of benefit plan]

label: Transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, assets
name: TransfersIntoLevel3OfFairValueHierarchyAssets
documentation: The amount of transfers of assets into Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

label: Transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments
name: TransfersIntoLevel3OfFairValueHierarchyEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The amount of transfers of the entity's own equity instruments into Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Entity's own equity instruments [member]; Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

label: Transfers into Level 3 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities
name: TransfersIntoLevel3OfFairValueHierarchyLiabilities
documentation: The amount of transfers of liabilities into Level 3 of the fair value hierarchy. [Refer: Level 3 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

label: Transfers of cumulative gain (loss) within equity when changes in liability's credit risk are presented in other comprehensive income
name: TransfersOfCumulativeGainLossWithinEquity
documentation: The amount of transfers within equity of the cumulative gain (loss) on financial liabilities designated as at fair value through profit or loss for which changes in the liability's credit risk are presented in other comprehensive income. [Refer: Financial liabilities at fair value through profit or loss]

label: Transfers of research and development from entity, related party transactions
name: TransfersOfResearchAndDevelopmentFromEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of transfers of research and development from the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Transfers of research and development to entity, related party transactions
name: TransfersOfResearchAndDevelopmentToEntityRelatedPartyTransactions
documentation: The amount of transfers of research and development to the entity in related party transactions. [Refer: Related parties [member]]

label: Transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, assets held at end of reporting period
name: TransfersOutOfLevel1IntoLevel2OfFairValueHierarchyAssets
documentation: The amount of transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of assets held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

label: Transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, entity's own equity instruments held at end of reporting period
name: TransfersOutOfLevel1IntoLevel2OfFairValueHierarchyEntitysOwnEquityInstruments
documentation: The amount of transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of the entity's own equity instruments held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Entity's own equity instruments [member]; Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

label: Transfers out of Level 1 into Level 2 of fair value hierarchy, liabilities held at end of reporting period
name: TransfersOutOfLevel1IntoLevel2OfFairValueHierarchyLiabilities
documentation: The amount of transfers out of Level 1 and into Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy of liabilities held at the end of the reporting period. [Refer: Level 1 of fair value hierarchy [member]; Level 2 of fair value hierarchy [member]]

label: Transfers out of Level 2 into Level 1 of fair value hierarchy, assets held at end of reporting period
